name: Charming Loft in Historic Center! Prime location!
summary:
Come & stay in this cozy loft located in the Santo Domingo neighbourhood within the lively and charming Historic Center! Just steps away from many historic monuments & plazas, don’t miss the chance to experience the authenticity & warmth of Cartagena’s native people!

Te damos la bienvenida a disfrutar del encantador y vibrante Centro Histórico de Cartagena; y así experimentar la autenticidad y candor de su gente. Este acogedor Loft será el lugar perfecto para una pareja o máximo 3 personas.
amenities: Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Single level home,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Freezer,Microwave,Nespresso machine,Refrigerator,Stove,Lockbox,Luggage dropoff allowed,Bed linens,Body soap,Extra pillows and blankets,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
Come & stay in this cozy loft located in the Santo Domingo neighbourhood within the lively and charming Historic Center! Just steps away from many historic monuments & plazas, don’t miss the chance to experience the authenticity & warmth of Cartagena’s native people!

Te damos la bienvenida a disfrutar del encantador y vibrante Centro Histórico de Cartagena; y así experimentar la autenticidad y candor de su gente. Este acogedor Loft será el lugar perfecto para una pareja o máximo 3 personas.

This exceptional loft is newly renovated and designed to give our guests a beautiful and comfy place to stay. 

The bedroom is partially enclosed furnished with a queen bed, 2 nightstands, 43” smart tv, open closet and bathroom included with plush towels, hot water, hair dryer as well as shampoo and soap!

In the open Living Room area you can find a comfortable couch that houses a single bed drawer style, a Dining table and a fully equipped Kitchen; including fridge, stove, microwave, blender, sandwich press and a coffee maker to start your day with a fantastic complementary cup of Colombian coffee!

The Laundry Room, includes a washer/dryer unit, iron and ironing board, drying area and cleaning supplies if you need them!

EL ESPACIO

Este excepcional apartamento recién renovado está diseñado para dar a nuestros huéspedes un maravilloso y confortable lugar durante su estadía.

La habitación es parcialmente cerrada y está dotada con una cama queen, smart TV de 43”, closet y baño privado con agua caliente, toallas, secador de pelo y shampoo y jabón!

En el Salón principal encontrarás un Comedor, una Cocina abierta y la Sala.
El sofá guarda una cama single de estilo cajón y la cocina está completamente equipada con nevera, estufa, microondas, licuadora, sanduchera y cafetera para empezar el día con un buen café Colombiano; todo lo que necesitas para una estadía inolvidable!

El cuarto de Lavandería está equipado con una lavadora/secadora de ropa, una plancha y su mesita, tendedero y con productos de limpieza.

I love helping out my guests so feel free to contact me if you need any suggestions for reservations, day trips, transportation, etc! It will be my pleasure making your trip to Cartagena an unforgettable one!

The Loft is located in one of the most iconic streets of the Historic Center, just steps away from the St Catherine Cathedral and the Plaza of Bolivar where they used to burn witches during the Spanish Inquisition! The area is very lively and filled with the most iconic restaurants, cafes, bars and shops!

El Loft está ubicado en una de las calles más famosas del Centro Histórico y a pasos de la Catedral de Santa Catalina de Alejandría y la Plaza de Bolivar donde quemaban las brujas durante la Inquisición Española! El area es muy vivaz y llena de icónicos restaurantes, bares, cafés y almacenes!

Parking in Cartagena’s Historic Center is a nightmare, so the best way to move around is by TAXI, renting a bike or even a guided horse carriage tour where you can learn more about the history of this beautiful city!

Parqueo en el Centro Histórico de Cartagena es muy complicado así que la mejor forma de moverse es vía TAXI, arrendando una bicicleta o hasta en los famosos carruajes donde podrás aprender más acerca de esta hermosa ciudad llena de cultura!
neighborhood_overview:
The Loft is located in one of the most iconic streets of the Historic Center, just steps away from the St Catherine Cathedral and the Plaza of Bolivar where they used to burn witches during the Spanish Inquisition! The area is very lively and filled with the most iconic restaurants, cafes, bars and shops!

El Loft está ubicado en una de las calles más famosas del Centro Histórico y a pasos de la Catedral de Santa Catalina de Alejandría y la Plaza de Bolivar donde quemaban las brujas durante la Inquisición Española! El area es muy vivaz y llena de icónicos restaurantes, bares, cafés y almacenes!
interaction: I love helping out my guests so feel free to contact me if you need any suggestions for reservations, day trips, transportation, etc! It will be my pleasure making your trip to Cartagena an unforgettable one!
transit:
Parking in Cartagena’s Historic Center is a nightmare, so the best way to move around is by TAXI, renting a bike or even a guided horse carriage tour where you can learn more about the history of this beautiful city!

Parqueo en el Centro Histórico de Cartagena es muy complicado así que la mejor forma de moverse es vía TAXI, arrendando una bicicleta o hasta en los famosos carruajes donde podrás aprender más acerca de esta hermosa ciudad llena de cultura!

name: Spacious apartment overlooking the old town
summary: We are @casachambacu. Apartment 202 - Two-story apartment just fifteen minutes from the historical center and airport. Also close to one of the largest shopping malls in Cartagena, with a variety of restaurants and shops. Although it is located on the second level of our house (we live on the first floor), it has private access, 2 rooms with double beds and a view of the walled city, 1 bathroom, balcony, kitchen, living room and The wifi has a download speed of 100 megas.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Paid parking on premises,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Patio or balcony
description:
We are @casachambacu. Apartment 202 - Two-story apartment just fifteen minutes from the historical center and airport. Also close to one of the largest shopping malls in Cartagena, with a variety of restaurants and shops. Although it is located on the second level of our house (we live on the first floor), it has private access, 2 rooms with double beds and a view of the walled city, 1 bathroom, balcony, kitchen, living room and The wifi has a download speed of 100 megas.

Is a cool and spacious place. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need. The apartment has an interan staircase that divides the rooms from the living room.

The common areas are, terrace overlooking the walled city and the patio, which can be used to rest, watch the sunset, have a beer, read a good book, cook a roast, talk or work with the computer..

Always attentive to any need.

This is an authentic neighborhood of the city, the people are very friendly and cheerful, on weekends people gather to listen to the music of the caribe: salsa or champeta. Is a safe neighborhood and close to San Felipe Castle and the shopping center. You can walk from the historic center to the apartment in a few minutes.

Moving from here is very simple, we have many ways to transport us. From the uber, a taxi, the bicycle or just walking. There are also public transport buses. The apartment has a space to park a car, also two blocks we have private parking and guarded.

Cerca del Centro de Cartagena

INCLUYE wifi, cuotas de administración y servicios públicos de agua, energía eléctrica y gas natural.

A 5 minutos  de la playa, 7 minutos del Centro de la ciudad, 7 minutos del aeropuerto internacional.

Buena ubicación, cerca de los lugares históricos y turísticos. 
Cercano a Supermercados, centros comerciales, restaurantes, cafeterías y asaderos.

Las áreas comunes como el Gym y la piscina cuentan con un horario de disponibilidad de 9:00 AM hasta las 5:00 PM, y pueden estar ocupados por otros vecinos.

Nuestro Equipo de trabajo estará en la propiedad para el momento del ingreso y para mostrarle al rededor. 

Tenemos un Numero disponible 24/7 en caso de emergencia o que necesite alguna ayuda. 

Tenemos también servicio de planes turísticos y transporte.

El edificio AQUALINA queda a 15 minutos caminando o a tan solo 3US en Taxi del Centro Histórico de Cartagena.
Si cruzas la calle podrá disfrutar de un hermoso atardecer en las playas de Marbella, caminar o hacer un poco de ejercicio.

La Propiedad está localizada cerca al Centro Histórico. Usted puede llegar caminando, carro o en taxi.

El apartamento se puede limpiar bajo petición por un costo adicional.

name: Suite 8 en Bocagrande, Cerca de todo.
summary:
Disfruta Cartagena en una suite nueva con todas las comodidades, en el mejor barrio Bocagrande. Muy cerca del Centro historico.
Desde tu suite Podrás ir caminando a las mejores playas,  al paseo peatonal de la bahía, A los mejores centros comerciales, a supermercados y a una gran variedad de restaurantes para todos los gustos y presupuestos. las 24 horas.
Enfrente del edificio tendras todo tipo de transporte publico las 24 horas. Adicionalmente podras usar área de labores y parqueadero.
amenities: Gym,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Cable TV,Dryer,Hangers,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Pocket wifi,Paid parking off premises,Paid parking on premises,Free street parking,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Dishwasher,Microwave,Refrigerator,Stove,Lockbox,Private entrance,Cleaning before checkout,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens
description:
Disfruta Cartagena en una suite nueva con todas las comodidades, en el mejor barrio Bocagrande. Muy cerca del Centro historico.
Desde tu suite Podrás ir caminando a las mejores playas,  al paseo peatonal de la bahía, A los mejores centros comerciales, a supermercados y a una gran variedad de restaurantes para todos los gustos y presupuestos. las 24 horas.
Enfrente del edificio tendras todo tipo de transporte publico las 24 horas. Adicionalmente podras usar área de labores y parqueadero.

Suite privada, Nuevo , Excelente ubicación,  entrada independiente., con baño privado  TV, Cable Wifi, ACC. ventilador  de techo. Mesa auxiliar.

Disponible area con cocina, lavadora , secadora

En lo posible podré atender tus inquietudes de forma remota (Whatsap o por la Aplicación). Mi coanfitrión MAICOL podría estar disponible en horas laborales si necesitas ayuda en algo que no puedas resolver  o para aclarar alguna duda. durante tu estadía.

Bocagrande es un barrio turístico de Cartagena, preferido por los visitantes por su tranquilidad, seguridad y por sus lindas playas.  Podrás encontrar a pocos metros de las suites todo lo que necesitas para tu estancia en la ciudad.
Ubicación inmejorable, 
Las playas están a solo 100 metros y  a 10 minutos esta el centro histórico,  la bahía y su paseo peatonal, lugar ideal para caminar  ver la entrada y salida de los barcos así como hacer ejercicio está a menos de 3 cuadras.

-Si quieres hacer compras, hay varios centros comerciales en la zona. Uno muy cerca (100 metros) que se llama NAO, uno más antiguo a 400 metros que se llama CENTRO COMERCIAL BOCAGRANDE y uno un poco más alejado a 800 metros que se llama BOCAGRANDE PLAZA (más nuevo de todos y tiene cinemas).

-A pocos metros de distancia encontrarás: supermercados, droguerías, Fedex, tiendas de ropa, restaurantes, joyerías entre otros.

-Saliendo del inmueble 200 metros hacia la derecha se encuentra el CAI de la policía, frente al parque Flanagan.

-El cajero automático (ATM) más cercano está en el supermercado Olímpica, al lado de los aparta estudios. Sin embargo, en la zona hay muchos más.

-Un taxi desde el apartamento hasta Boca grande, Castillo grande o centro histórico puede costar $8.000 (3 usd aprox).

-Cruzando la calle puedes tener múltiple transporte público.

-Tenga mucha precaución con los vendedores ambulantes cuando esté en la playa o caminando, negociar los precios SIEMPRE con anterioridad antes de recibir cualquier producto o servicio.

TE RECOMENDAMOS VISITAR:

-Caminar por la Bahía de Cartagena. Queda en Bocagrande y esta a 2 cuadras del apartamento.

-Caminar y comer por el centro histórico. Conocer Getsemaní.

-Visitar el Castillo San Felipe.

-Ir en lancha y conocer las Islas de Rosario y Barú. Recomendamos una isla que se llama Isla del Sol y tiene pasadía o para dormir con todo incluido (Agencia Caliente Tours).

Todo tipo de transporte publico en frente del inmueble, taxis, buses , adicionalmente cuentas con parqueaderos gratis en el edificio y en la calle

Disfruta de unos días maravillosos en la playa... conoce la variedad gastronómica de la ciudad, El centro historico y deléitate con unos atardeceres de ensueño...

name: Cozy studio near the beach!
summary:
My small and cozy studio apartment located in "El Laguito" neighborhood, is a space created to provide tranquility and rest. Its location is ideal since it is just a few steps from the Castillogrande and Bocagrande beaches, with direct access to the little lake that is named after it. The old city is about 10 minutes by transport!
I want you to know that cleanliness has always been important and to ensure the safety that the moment deserves, I follow Airbnb's Advanced Protocol.
amenities: Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Laundromat nearby,Portable fans,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Dishwasher,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Beachfront,Lake access
description:
My small and cozy studio apartment located in "El Laguito" neighborhood, is a space created to provide tranquility and rest. Its location is ideal since it is just a few steps from the Castillogrande and Bocagrande beaches, with direct access to the little lake that is named after it. The old city is about 10 minutes by transport!
I want you to know that cleanliness has always been important and to ensure the safety that the moment deserves, I follow Airbnb's Advanced Protocol.

The compact unit of the studio apartment has what it takes to make your stay a cozy and relaxing experience. Its proximity to the sea gives it that touch of freshness! It is a perfect solution for a person or a couple, giving the maximum of autonomy and independence.

The studio apartment is on the fourth and last floor of the building, with access only through stairs. It has Wi-fi connection, TV, air conditioning and a portable fan. It has a bathroom and kitchen with all the basics. It also offers a small room with masonry furniture. The touch of love and the little details give to it, that cozy and pleasant energy.
Clothes washing and drying service is offered at a moderate additional cost; however if you prefer, in the area there are also nearby laundries.

The building has two convenient access doors, one main and one secondary. The main one directs you towards Bocagrande beach and the secondary one towards the small lake and beach of Castillogrande and its surroundings.

You will be in your own space with total independence, however if you need help, the person who collaborates with me will be available to assist you.

The neighborhood "El laguito" owes its name to a small lake that houses mangroves and birds, surrounded by a paved path popular with runners, skaters and cyclists; it denotes a very beautiful, clean and safe area, ideal to live even for a few nights in beautiful Cartagena.

El Laguito has one of the most popular beaches in the city, with calm waters and a relaxed environment that attract families and lovers of water sports. The dining scene is casual, encompassing beach bars, barbecue restaurants, and oceanfront pizzerias, in addition to the more modern and luxurious options found in Bocagrande and Castillogrande.

The neighborhood has access to public transport. From any of the two access doors to the building you can take a taxi or bus. Additionally, just 3 minutes walking around the lake you will find a Transcaribe public transport station.
You can move on foot within the neighborhood and its surroundings and enjoy the scenarios it offers.
The old city or historic center is about 10 minutes by transport, more if you are a lover of walks, this is an excellent option and it will take you approx. 45 min.
Outside the building there are secure parking lots on the street.

The safety of our guests and of the space we provide them is very important for us, therefore, we hope that you'll use it with love and respect. Only the person hosted is allowed to enter the space.

Se espera limpieza por parte de los huéspedes y respeto por la convivencia.
Solo se pueden hospedar quienes hayan hecho la reserva. No se aceptan visitas.
Si eres fumador, es preferible que lo hagas fuera del estudio, en zonas abiertas, al aire libre.
No se permiten fiestas o invitados adicionales.
Cuando salgas del estudio, asegurarte de apagar el A/C, pongamos nuestro granito de arena para cuidar el planeta :)
Se debe cuidar las llaves, la pérdida de estas ocasionará gastos que serán asumidos por el huésped.

name: Apartamento nuevo en el cabrero. Vista al mar.
summary: Apartamento en el sector exclusivo del cabrero, a 5 minutos del aeropuerto y a 2 minutos del centro amurallado. Vista frente al mar, cuenta con área social con piscina, asador y baño turco. El apto además tiene balcón interno para apreciar el mar caribe.

Apartamento en el sector exclusivo del cabrero, a 5 minutos del aeropuerto y a 2 minutos del centro amurallado. Vista frente al mar, cuenta con área social con piscina, asador y baño turco. El apto además tiene balcón interno para apreciar el mar caribe.

El apartamento está amoblado, con utensilios de cocina, nevera, estufa, horno, lavadora/secadora, Internet wifi, la entrada es privada a través de ascensor, también tiene parqueadero propio interno. 

El apartamento es perfecto para una familia grande o para un grupo máximo de 7 personas. 

Las camas grandes miden 1,40 cms de ancho y la sencilla mide 1 metro de ancho. La sala cuenta con sofá cama y también tienen a su disposición una colchoneta adicional.

El edificio cuenta con área social privada y exclusiva para uso de residentes del edificio en el último piso. El área social tiene piscina, jacuzzi, bañó turco, piscina para niños, BB&Q o asador, excelente vista al mar y a la ciudad.

Estamos siempre disponibles para atender cualquier inquietud o duda al celular 3008368961 o por mensaje privado en WhatsApp o a través de la página de Airbnb.

name: Ocean Breezes
summary: The perfect place to relax and re-energize and enjoy the ocean breezes. There is a lovely terrace where you can soak in our stunning sunsets and tropical evenings. Literally surrounded by beaches and it’s just a short taxi ride to the old city. Perfect kitchen, good internet, air conditioning and television. There are beaches on all sides of the peninsula and a lovely malecon for an evening stroll along Castillo Grande. The building has a pool and laundry facilities on the main level.
amenities: Elevator,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Ethernet connection,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Refrigerator,Stove,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm
description:
The perfect place to relax and re-energize and enjoy the ocean breezes. There is a lovely terrace where you can soak in our stunning sunsets and tropical evenings. Literally surrounded by beaches and it’s just a short taxi ride to the old city. Perfect kitchen, good internet, air conditioning and television. There are beaches on all sides of the peninsula and a lovely malecon for an evening stroll along Castillo Grande. The building has a pool and laundry facilities on the main level.

It's really a space like no other. It feels like if you hang your toes over the terrace you could dip them in the Caribbean Sea.  The views are stunning, and the apartment is furnished to encourage tranquility and relaxation.  The best features of this apartment are that you can leave the windows open (no mosquitoes at all) to catch the delicious ocean breezes, and watching the sun setting from the terrace ... it's simply glorious! The apartment is perfectly situated to allow you to enjoy the energy of El Laguito yet looks out onto the beach so is still a tranquil space. Secure building with 24-hour reception desk, air-conditioned, with good internet and television.  A one-time fee of 15,000 pesos per person is required upon check-in, paid directly to the building administration.

The whole apartment is yours.  Social areas in the building are a small reception room and pool area.  There are also laundry facilities on the reception level of the building.

Co-host Kimberley is Canadian living with her Colombian husband Mario in el Laguito.  Kimberley and Mario are both bilingual and available 24/7 to answer your questions, provide recommendations and assist however possible.

Situated right at the tip of the Bocagrande Peninsula, the neighbourhood of El Laguito is a small, but colorful one.  It's bordered on one end by the historic Caribe Hotel and on the other end by the Hilton.  We have restaurants, ice-cream shops, pharmacy and grocery stores, shopping malls, casinos, bank machines and lots of spots to sit and enjoy a cold beer.  El Laguito is a fascinating mix of locals, fishermen, vacationing Colombian families, tourists and expats from all over the world. There are outdoor cafes and restaurants, and little markets and shops literally every 10 steps.  You can just pull up a chair, open a beer and people watch for hours.  The neighborhood is well policed, safe and completely enjoyable.

There are always taxis waiting in front of the building, and if you're feeling brave you can catch one of the private local buses. It's a 5-minute taxi ride to the Walled Old City ($10 000 pesos or $3 USD) and 15 minutes to the Airport ($20 000 pesos or $6). The stop for TransCaribe, the public transit system is a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

name: Elegant Oceanside
summary: The perfect place to relax, re-energize and enjoy the ocean breezes. There is a lovely bench terrace where you can soak in our stunning sunsets and tropical evenings. Literally surrounded by beaches and it’s just a short taxi ride to the old city. Open kitchen, good internet, air conditioning and television. There are beaches on all sides of the peninsula and a malecon for an evening stroll along Castillo Grande. The building's main level has a pool, relaxation area and laundry facilities.
amenities: Elevator,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Refrigerator,Stove,Private entrance,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Beachfront,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
The perfect place to relax, re-energize and enjoy the ocean breezes. There is a lovely bench terrace where you can soak in our stunning sunsets and tropical evenings. Literally surrounded by beaches and it’s just a short taxi ride to the old city. Open kitchen, good internet, air conditioning and television. There are beaches on all sides of the peninsula and a malecon for an evening stroll along Castillo Grande. The building's main level has a pool, relaxation area and laundry facilities.

It's really a space like no other. It feels like if you hang your toes over the terrace you could dip them in the Caribbean Sea.  The views are stunning, and the apartment is furnished to encourage tranquility and relaxation.  The best features of this apartment are that you can leave the windows open (no mosquitoes at all) to catch the delicious ocean breezes, and watching the sun setting from the terrace ... it's simply glorious! The apartment is perfectly situated to allow you to enjoy the energy of El Laguito yet looks out onto the beach so is still a tranquil space. Secure building with 24-hour reception desk, air-conditioned, with good internet and television.  A one-time fee of 15,000 pesos per person is required upon check-in, paid directly to the building administration.

The whole apartment is yours.  Social areas in the building are a small reception room and pool area.  There are also laundry facilities on the reception level of the building.

Co-host Kimberley is Canadian living with her Colombian husband Mario in el Laguito.  Kimberley and Mario are both bilingual and available 24/7 to answer your questions, provide recommendations and assist however possible.

Situated right at the tip of the Bocagrande Peninsula, the neighbourhood of El Laguito is a small, but colorful one.  It's bordered on one end by the historic Caribe Hotel and on the other end by the Hilton.  We have restaurants, ice-cream shops, pharmacy and grocery stores, shopping malls, casinos, bank machines and lots of spots to sit and enjoy a cold beer.  El Laguito is a fascinating mix of locals, fishermen, vacationing Colombian families, tourists and expats from all over the world. There are outdoor cafes and restaurants, and little markets and shops literally every 10 steps.  You can just pull up a chair, open a beer and people watch for hours.The neighborhood is well policed, safe and completely enjoyable.

There are always taxis waiting in front of the building, and if you're feeling brave you can catch one of the private local buses. It's a 5-minute taxi ride to the Walled Old City ($10 000 pesos or $3 USD) and 15 minutes to the Airport ($20 000 pesos or $6). The stop for TransCaribe, the public transit system is a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

name: 1102 Comfortable&Spacious Apartment Near the Beach
summary:
Excellent apartment with the best location in Cartagena, is just a few steps from Bocagrande beach.
The apartment has a privileged view of one side overlooking the beach and the other side of the bay.
The building's pool is on the top floor (17) with an excellent view of the city.
The laundry area is common, you just have to go between the hours 7:00 to 9:00 am and buy your detergent.
The reception and surveillance of the building is 24 hours every day.

name: Old City Apartment,Cartagena de Indias
summary: Apartamento Centro Histórico de Cartagena de Indias, en una bella calle, tranquila y segura. Estrictamente limpio, con protocolos de bioseguiridad, iluminado , ventilado, y cómodo. Desde su balcón pueden observar la belleza y encanto  que la calle tiene. El apartamento tiene 2 habitaciones , una con dos camas sencillas unidas, que juntas hacen una cama king, la otra habitación con una cama doble y sofá cama doble. Sala con  sofá-cama doble , baño, comedor , balcón , cocina y área de labores.

description:
Apartamento Centro Histórico de Cartagena de Indias, en una bella calle, tranquila y segura. Estrictamente limpio, con protocolos de bioseguiridad, iluminado , ventilado, y cómodo. Desde su balcón pueden observar la belleza y encanto  que la calle tiene. El apartamento tiene 2 habitaciones , una con dos camas sencillas unidas, que juntas hacen una cama king, la otra habitación con una cama doble y sofá cama doble. Sala con  sofá-cama doble , baño, comedor , balcón , cocina y área de labores.

Es un apartamento con una excelente ubicación, muy confortable , en una calle muy tranquila y segura, del exclusivo y residencial  Centro Histórico, a unos pasos de monumentos y sitios de interés, como lo son: las murallas,  bóvedas , Plaza de Bolívar , museo del oro , Palacio de la inquisición , museo de arte moderno , plazas de San Diego, San Pedro, Santo Domingo y Fernández de Madrid, teatro Adolfo Mejía, iglesia la catedral , San Pedro, Santo Domingo y Santo Toribio.

A todas las áreas descritas del apartamento.

Estoy dispuesta a atender a los huéspedes en cuanto a cualquier recomendación que requerían de la ciudad , como recomendación de sitios de interés, tarifas etc.

Es un apartamento con excelente ubicacion, en una bella calle, muy tranquila y segura del Centro Histórico, barrio en donde podemos destacar su arquitectura colonial y Repúblicana, patrimonio artístico , histórico y cultural, a unos pasos de los principales sitios de interes. El apartamento es muy limpio, bien iluminado , ventilado, fresco y cómodo, desde su balcon se puede contemplar la belleza y encanto  que la calle tiene.

Al alojamiento puedes llegar en taxi, el cual te dejara en la puerta del alojamiento, tambien puedes llegar en bus, y te dejara a pocas calles. Desde el alojamiento encuentras todo caminando a corta distancia, como: restaurantes para disfrutar lo mejor de nuestra gastronomia , bares, sitios de interés, tales como: Palacio de la Inquisicion, Museo del Oro, Iglesias principales.  Plazas de: San Pedro, San Diego, Santo Domingo y Fernández de Madrid, Murallas, Bóvedas , Teatro Adolfo Mejia etc. Hay circulacion frecuente de taxis por todas la calles, y del alojamiento puedes acceder caminando a varias estaciones  de buses transcaribe, tambien tenemos dos estacionamientos para vehiculos particuales muy cerca, en el parque de la marina y en el edificio ganem, ubicado en la calle de la universidad.

Si necesitan servicio de niñera o enfermera , alquiler de vehículo , recomendaciones de restaurantes o lugares, sitios de interes , con mucho gusto les puedo guiar.

name: 6A2 One bed room apartment,  couples/familiy
summary:
Cozy and modern 1-bedroom flat with all amenities included: AC, WiFi, 4k TV, fully equipped kitchen (incl.: coffe machine, sandwich maker, microwave, mixer), bathroom, washing and drying machine, iron, clean bedding, beach towels, etc. 
Flat is located in El Laguito, 50 meters away from the Hilton Hotel Cartagena with restaurants, tourist info packages and great public transportation connectivity

description:
Cozy and modern 1-bedroom flat with all amenities included: AC, WiFi, 4k TV, fully equipped kitchen (incl.: coffe machine, sandwich maker, microwave, mixer), bathroom, washing and drying machine, iron, clean bedding, beach towels, etc. 
Flat is located in El Laguito, 50 meters away from the Hilton Hotel Cartagena with restaurants, tourist info packages and great public transportation connectivity

The flat is located in El Laguito neighborhood in Cartagena, 50 m away from the Hilton hotel. You have a direct access to the beach though the rear side of the building.
You can find in the surrounding all sort of restaurants, tourist packages, sky diving and kite surfing lessons, bars within waling distance. Great transportation opportunities to the colonial city center (4 km away).
The dining room consists of two sofa beds, which once deployed are 120 centimeters by 190 centimeters.

We also provide to/from airport shuttle if you are staying longer than 10 days.

Your reservation is for the whole flat, so you will have a private room with kitchen,  bathroom and other amenities for you

As described it is a private flat. I will be available anytime over the phone should you have any questions or need help/assistance.

El Laguito neighborhood is a very active tourist area where you can find a wide range of attractions available in the city. It is the route for the "Chivas" which are tourist buses with Caribbean music that is heard everywhere.

There is great transportation connectivity of the flat: taxis and public transportation just in the front of the building. 
City centre is 4 km away. 
Bocagrande is within 5 minutes walking distance.

The building, where the apartment is, has a family atmosphere which must be maintained, because of this prostitution is not allowed and whoever generates a scandal with prostitutes must pay a thousand dollars.

additional_house_rules:
---------------------------- ENGLISH BELOW ----------------------------
Acerca de la reservación:
Solo usuarios con una foto en su perfil airbnb que sean mayores de 18 años son elegibles para hacer la reserva
El Check-in lo debe hacer la persona que hizo la reserva y esta será la responsable de todo lo que pase en el apartamento
El apartamento se encuentra en un edificio que cuenta con seguridad las 24   horas, es por esto que el huésped al registrarse en portería debe pagar un monto de COP 20.000, no incluidos dentro de la tarifa airbnb
Acerca del apartamento: 
Nos  esforzamos mucho por proporcionar a nuestros huéspedes con instalaciones cómodas, modernas y limpias, es por esto que te pedimos por favor:  
No exceder el cupo máximo del apartamento (Para el estudio 2 personas, para el apartamento de 1 alcoba de 2 a 4 personas)
Cuidar de todas las instalaciones del apartamento, en especial: 
    a. No botar papel higiénico o toallas sanitarias en el sanitario
    b. No acostarse con ropa mojada o húmeda en las camas o en los sofás.
    c. Estarás frente a una playa, así que asegurate de no ingresar con arena al 
         apartamento, para tal fin encontraras una ducha en el estacionamiento del  
        edificio  para remover la arena al regresar de la playa.
    d. Si estás más de dos días,  seguro necesitaras sacar alguna basura. 
        Puedes hacer uso del Chute de basura que se encuentra en el descanso entrepisos 
        de la escalera
    e. Asegúrate que la puerta de acceso al apartamento quede debidamente
        cerrada.
     f. El anfitrión les provee para su comodidad un kit de bienvenida gratis que   
        consta de:shampoo ,acondicionador, gel de ducha, gel lavamanos, crema de
        manos, jabón de platos, jabón líquido y suavizante para lavadora, papel 
        higiénico, café, azúcar, te, crema, botella de agua para tomar.  
        si esto se   agotare, debera adquirir lo que necesite por cuenta del huésped.  

Somos conscientes del medio ambiente: si vas a salir del apartamento, por favor,  apaga los aires acondicionados y las luces.
Prohiobido hacer ruido excesivo después de las 11 pm que perturbe a los vecinos.
Está totalmente prohibido fumar en el edificio y dentro del apartamento. Si el huésped deja el apartamento con olor a cigarro deberá pagar una multa de US$500 dólares americanos.
Acerca de visitas:
Con gusto puedes recibir visitas en el apartamento, considerando:
El huésped debe proporcionar una identificación oficial de la visita en recepción
Solo visitas mayores de 18 años son permitidas
El huésped (persona que hace la reserva) es responsables por las visitas en el apartamento
Para estadías a dormir, no exceder el cupo máximo del apartamento: (Para el estudio 2 personas, para los apartamentos de 1 alcoba de 2 a 4 personas)
El edificio, en donde están nuestros apartamentos, tiene un ambiente familiar, el cual se debe mantener, debido a esto quien genere un problema o escandalo con prostitutas deberá pagar mil dólares.

                       ---------------------------- ENGLISH       ----------------------------

About booking the flat:
Only users with a photo in their airbnb profile and over 18 years old are eligible to book the flat
Check-in must be made by the person who made the reservation, who is the person responsible for everything in the flat 
The building has a 24 h security desk, therefore it is required a 1 time per reservation period fee of 20.000, COP (about 7 USD subject to rates) at the buildings front desk upon arrival, not included in the listed price
House rules: 
We strive to provide you with modern and comfortable installations as well as a clean place to enjoy your stay, that’s why we require:  
Do not exceed the maximum guests number: (For the study 2 people, for 1 bedroom apartments 2 to 4 people)
Take care of all the amenities included, especially: 
a. Not to dispose toilet paper or sanitary pads in the toilets
b. Lay or sit on the beds or sofas with wet clothes
c. You’ll be located in front of the beach, so make sure you don’t enter with still sand on you to the apartment. The building disposes of a shower next to the beach entrance door
d. If you are there more than 2 days, you may need to take some trash out. You can do that using the garbage chute next to the flats main entrance door 
e. Make sure that the access door to the apartment is properly closed.
We are aware of the environment: please turn off the AC if you are not in the flat
f. The host provides a free welcome kit for your convenience of: shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, hand wash gel, cream hands, dish soap, liquid soap and fabric softener, paper hygienic, coffee, sugar, tea, cream, bottle of water to drink. If this is exhausted, it will be borne by the guest.
Keep silence after 11 pm 
It is totally forbidden to smoke in the building and inside the apartment. If the guest leaves the apartment with the smell of cigarettes, he will have to pay a fine of US $ 500.

Regarding visits:
You are welcome to receive visits, just consider:
Your visiting person needs to provide a valid ID at the buildings front desk
Only visits over 18 years old are allowed
You are responsible for the people who visit you in the flat
Your visits are welcome to stay over the night as long as you don’t exceed the flats max guests number: ¬(For the study 2 people, for 1 bedroom apartments 2 to 4 people)
The building, where the apartment is, has a family atmosphere which must be maintained, because of this whoever generates an issue with prostitutes must pay a thousand american dollars fine.

Bocagrande is within 5 minutes walking distance.

Cozy and modern estudio with all amenities included: AC, WiFi, HD TV, fully equipped kitchen (incl.: coffe machine, sandwich maker, mixer), bathroom, washing and drying machine, iron, clean bedding, beach towels, etc. 
Flat is located in El Laguito, 50 meters away from the Hilton Hotel Cartagena with restaurants, tourist info packages and great public transportation connectivity

The flat is located in El Laguito neighborhood in Cartagena, 50 m away from the Hilton hotel. You have a direct access to the beach though the rear side of the building.
You can find in the surrounding all sort of restaurants, tourist packages, sky diving and kite surfing lessons, bars within waling distance. Great transportation opportunities to the colonial city center (4 km away).

We also provide to/from airport shuttle if you are staying longer than 10 days.

Your reservation is for the whole flat, so you will have a private room with kitchen,  bathroom and other amenities for you

As described it is a private flat. I will be available anytime over the phone should you have any questions or need help/assistance.

El Laguito neighborhood is a very active tourist area where you can find a wide range of attractions available in the city. It is the route for the "Chivas" which are tourist buses with Caribbean music that is heard everywhere.

El Laguito neighborhood is a well connected zone in Cartagena, you can reach it by taxi or any public transportation from everywhere in Cartagena.
 taxis and public transportation are available just in the front of the building. 
City centre is 4 km away. 
Bocagrande is within 5 minutes walking distance.

The building, where the apartment is, has a family atmosphere which must be maintained, because of this prostitution is not allowed and whoever generates a il with pssue with prostitutes must pay a thousand dollars.

additional_house_rules:
------------------------------------English below-------------------------------
Acerca de la reservación:
Solo usuarios con una foto en su perfil airbnb que sean mayores de 18 años son elegibles para hacer la reserva
El Check-in lo debe hacer la persona que hizo la reserva y esta será la responsable de todo lo que pase en el apartamento
El apartamento se encuentra en un edificio que cuenta con seguridad las 24   horas, es por esto que el huésped al registrarse en portería debe pagar un monto de COP 20.000, no incluidos dentro de la tarifa airbnb
Acerca del apartamento: 
Nos  esforzamos mucho por proporcionar a nuestros huéspedes con instalaciones cómodas, modernas y limpias, es por esto que te pedimos por favor:  
No exceder el cupo máximo del apartamento (Para el estudio 2 personas, para el apartamento de 1 alcoba de 2 a 4 personas)
Cuidar de todas las instalaciones del apartamento, en especial: 
    a. No botar papel higiénico o toallas sanitarias en el sanitario
    b. No acostarse con ropa mojada o húmeda en las camas o en los sofás.
    c. Estarás frente a una playa, así que asegurate de no ingresar con arena al 
         apartamento, para tal fin encontraras una ducha en el estacionamiento del  
        edificio  para remover la arena al regresar de la playa.
    d. Si estás más de dos días,  seguro necesitaras sacar alguna basura. 
        Puedes hacer uso del Chute de basura que se encuentra en el descanso entrepisos 
        de la escalera
    e. Asegúrate que la puerta de acceso al apartamento quede debidamente
        cerrada.
     f. El anfitrión les provee para su comodidad un kit de bienvenida gratis que   
        consta de:shampoo ,acondicionador, gel de ducha, gel lavamanos, crema de
        manos, jabón de platos, jabón líquido y suavizante para lavadora, papel 
        higiénico, café, azúcar, te, crema, botella de agua para tomar.  
        si esto se   agotare, debera adquirir lo que necesite por cuenta del huésped.  

Somos conscientes del medio ambiente: si vas a salir del apartamento, por favor,  apaga los aires acondicionados y las luces.
Prohiobido hacer ruido excesivo después de las 11 pm que perturbe a los vecinos.
Está totalmente prohibido fumar en el edificio y dentro del apartamento. Si el huésped deja el apartamento con olor a cigarro deberá pagar una multa de US$500 dólares americanos.
Acerca de visitas:
Con gusto puedes recibir visitas en el apartamento, considerando:
El huésped debe proporcionar una identificación oficial de la visita en recepción
Solo visitas mayores de 18 años son permitidas
El huésped (persona que hace la reserva) es responsables por las visitas en el apartamento
Para estadías a dormir, no exceder el cupo máximo del apartamento: (Para el estudio 2 personas, para los apartamentos de 1 alcoba de 2 a 4 personas)
El edificio, en donde están nuestros apartamentos, tiene un ambiente familiar, el cual se debe mantener, debido a esto quien genere un problema o escandalo con prostitutas deberá pagar mil dólares.

                       ---------------------------- ENGLISH       ----------------------------

About booking the flat:
Only users with a photo in their airbnb profile and over 18 years old are eligible to book the flat
Check-in must be made by the person who made the reservation, who is the person responsible for everything in the flat 
The building has a 24 h security desk, therefore it is required a 1 time per reservation period fee of 20.000, COP (about 7 USD subject to rates) at the buildings front desk upon arrival, not included in the listed price
House rules: 
We strive to provide you with modern and comfortable installations as well as a clean place to enjoy your stay, that’s why we require:  
Do not exceed the maximum guests number: (For the study 2 people, for 1 bedroom apartments 2 to 4 people)
Take care of all the amenities included, especially: 
a. Not to dispose toilet paper or sanitary pads in the toilets
b. Lay or sit on the beds or sofas with wet clothes
c. You’ll be located in front of the beach, so make sure you don’t enter with still sand on you to the apartment. The building disposes of a shower next to the beach entrance door
d. If you are there more than 2 days, you may need to take some trash out. You can do that using the garbage chute next to the flats main entrance door 
e. Make sure that the access door to the apartment is properly closed.
We are aware of the environment: please turn off the AC if you are not in the flat
f. The host provides a free welcome kit for your convenience of: shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, hand wash gel, cream hands, dish soap, liquid soap and fabric softener, paper hygienic, coffee, sugar, tea, cream, bottle of water to drink. If this is exhausted, it will be borne by the guest.
Keep silence after 11 pm 
It is totally forbidden to smoke in the building and inside the apartment. If the guest leaves the apartment with the smell of cigarettes, he will have to pay a fine of US $ 500.

Regarding visits:
You are welcome to receive visits, just consider:
Your visiting person needs to provide a valid ID at the buildings front desk
Only visits over 18 years old are allowed
You are responsible for the people who visit you in the flat
Your visits are welcome to stay over the night as long as you don’t exceed the flats max guests number: ¬(For the study 2 people, for 1 bedroom apartments 2 to 4 people)
The building, where the apartment is, has a family atmosphere which must be maintained, because of this whoever generates an issue with prostitutes must pay a thousand american dollars fine.

name: CASA OLA - Bocagrande 'Beach Cottage' 1BR on OCEAN
summary: Our apartment on the ocean has magnificent views of Bocagrande's beaches on one side and of Centro, Getsemani, and Manga on the other. This one bedroom 'beach cottage' is in the very best location to fully experience what Cartagena has to offer. Located in a well-run high-rise building near the Old City, it is also right across the street from Plaza Bocagrande, a luxury mall full of great shops, restaurants, cinemas, and a world class gym. Also steps away from 3 grocery stores.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Room-darkening shades,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Host greets you,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,First aid kit
description:
Our apartment on the ocean has magnificent views of Bocagrande's beaches on one side and of Centro, Getsemani, and Manga on the other. This one bedroom 'beach cottage' is in the very best location to fully experience what Cartagena has to offer. Located in a well-run high-rise building near the Old City, it is also right across the street from Plaza Bocagrande, a luxury mall full of great shops, restaurants, cinemas, and a world class gym. Also steps away from 3 grocery stores.

We call our apartment Casa Ola (or 'Wave House') because of the restful sound of the ocean that makes falling asleep here a breeze. In keeping with this theme, we opted for a clean modern feel with splashes of retro surf style, like cushions made from vintage 1960's tiki fabric and a custom 'surfboard' coffee table made by a local carpenter. The non-vintage items such as the TV, couch, bed, fridge, oven, water heater, and most of the furniture is brand new. Plus there's high-speed internet for 'digital nomads' (and people who just hate slow internet!) Our washer/dryer is definitely not new - an ancient stacked Whirlpool - but it works so well we couldn't bear to replace it, even though its dryer door is held shut with duct tape! Throughout the apartment, Luis and I have done our very best to make Casa Ola an unpretentious, comfortable and incredibly serene place to be. Our previous guests seem to agree and we hope you will too!

Guests will have the full apartment to themselves. Our personal items will be locked away in an armoire (that is also perfect for putting your suitcase on top of) so the full bedroom closet and a pair of double drawer side tables will be at your disposal.

If we are in town to greet our guests, we will be there to answer any questions they may have (and we'll always be available to do so by email, whatsapp or through this site). When we are not in town, guests will be met by friendly and responsible Ricardo, a native 'Cartagenero' who lives in our building year round. He speaks both English and Spanish, and also comes from a family experienced in local tourist industry. If you like (and only if you are interested) they can arrange for any excursions or tours you might be interested in.

The Bocagrande neighbourhood combines fun, sun, beach culture, and excellent shopping. Our apartment is especially well located because it is right at the entrance to Bocagrande, making it a 3 minute cab ride (or pleasant 15 minute walk) to the historic Old City (Centro) and bustling hipster haven, Getsemani. It's also right across the street from Cartagena's best mall (ask anyone!) - Plaza Bocagrande - which features great shopping and restaurants ('Crepes and Waffles' is highly recommended and there's a 'Juan Valdez' - Colombia's Starbucks - for high quality coffee), state of the art cinemas, a Play Land for families, and Bodytech, a world class gym (we have helped arrange temporary memberships for many of our guests and they have all been extremely happy with the staff and facility.) Because of Casa Ola's unique location, it is one of the only buildings in town that has views of both Bocagrande beaches (from the balcony) and Centro, Getsemani, Manga and the Popa (from the front entrance and kitchen). Food shopping is also a breeze with 2 grocery stores within 2 minutes of the apartment - Olimpica and newly opened discount grocer, Ara, just 50 yards from our building's front door.

Cabs are very reasonable in Cartagena. They are also quite easy to hail (although during the high seasons - especially between Dec 15th to January 15th - they can be a bit more scarce because the city gets quite crowded). A cab to the Old City or Getsemani from our place is usually around 8 thousand pesos, or approximately 3 - 4 U.S. dollars. For this reason, most travellers to Cartagena do not rent cars (we would certainly not suggest it). However, if you are a Colombian traveler arriving here by car, we DO have a parking space associated with the apartment but require at least 5 days advanced notice from you to arrange for its use. As mentioned earlier, because there are so many great things to see and do that are just a lovely walk away from our place, we believe (and have been told by many of our guests) that Casa Ola's location can't be beat.

Because there is security in the building's front lobby, prior to arrival guests will be required to provide us with their FULL NAMES (as they appear on their passports) and their PASSPORT NUMBERS so they can be entered into the access log at the front desk. (Colombian citizens can provide their government issued ID number if they would prefer). You may be asked to show your passports when you first arrive as well but after that there will be no problem.
neighborhood_overview: The Bocagrande neighbourhood combines fun, sun, beach culture, and excellent shopping. Our apartment is especially well located because it is right at the entrance to Bocagrande, making it a 3 minute cab ride (or pleasant 15 minute walk) to the historic Old City (Centro) and bustling hipster haven, Getsemani. It's also right across the street from Cartagena's best mall (ask anyone!) - Plaza Bocagrande - which features great shopping and restaurants ('Crepes and Waffles' is highly recommended and there's a 'Juan Valdez' - Colombia's Starbucks - for high quality coffee), state of the art cinemas, a Play Land for families, and Bodytech, a world class gym (we have helped arrange temporary memberships for many of our guests and they have all been extremely happy with the staff and facility.) Because of Casa Ola's unique location, it is one of the only buildings in town that has views of both Bocagrande beaches (from the balcony) and Centro, Getsemani, Manga and the Popa (from the front entrance and kitchen). Food shopping is also a breeze with 2 grocery stores within 2 minutes of the apartment - Olimpica and newly opened discount grocer, Ara, just 50 yards from our building's front door.
notes: Because there is security in the building's front lobby, prior to arrival guests will be required to provide us with their FULL NAMES (as they appear on their passports) and their PASSPORT NUMBERS so they can be entered into the access log at the front desk. (Colombian citizens can provide their government issued ID number if they would prefer). You may be asked to show your passports when you first arrive as well but after that there will be no problem.
interaction: If we are in town to greet our guests, we will be there to answer any questions they may have (and we'll always be available to do so by email, whatsapp or through this site). When we are not in town, guests will be met by friendly and responsible Ricardo, a native 'Cartagenero' who lives in our building year round. He speaks both English and Spanish, and also comes from a family experienced in local tourist industry. If you like (and only if you are interested) they can arrange for any excursions or tours you might be interested in.
access: Guests will have the full apartment to themselves. Our personal items will be locked away in an armoire (that is also perfect for putting your suitcase on top of) so the full bedroom closet and a pair of double drawer side tables will be at your disposal.
transit: Cabs are very reasonable in Cartagena. They are also quite easy to hail (although during the high seasons - especially between Dec 15th to January 15th - they can be a bit more scarce because the city gets quite crowded). A cab to the Old City or Getsemani from our place is usually around 8 thousand pesos, or approximately 3 - 4 U.S. dollars. For this reason, most travellers to Cartagena do not rent cars (we would certainly not suggest it). However, if you are a Colombian traveler arriving here by car, we DO have a parking space associated with the apartment but require at least 5 days advanced notice from you to arrange for its use. As mentioned earlier, because there are so many great things to see and do that are just a lovely walk away from our place, we believe (and have been told by many of our guests) that Casa Ola's location can't be beat.

summary:

description:
Disfruta de Cartagena de Indias y alójate en Bocagrande, la zona más segura de la ciudad. Hazlo en uno de los edificios más exclusivos en primera línea de playa, Palmetto Eliptic.
Desde este lujoso apartamento de 74m2,  podrás disfrutar de increíbles vistas a la ciudad histórica y al mar desde su estratégico piso 24, ya que además de tener una privilegiada vista, podrás dormir o despertar con el sonido del mar !
Seguridad 24 h, parking privado gratuito, piscina infinitum, infantiles y jacuzzi.

Ahora podrás vivir una experiencia inigualable y alojarte en un alojamiento turístico completamente nuevo, dentro de la zona más exclusiva de Cartagena de Indias, Bocagrande.
Cerca de los mejores restaurantes, centros comerciales, tiendas, discotecas y casinos.
Nos encontramos a pie de playa, en primerísima línea, en el prestigioso edificio turístico, Palmetto Eliptic.
La ubicación de nuestro apartamento está en un estratégico nivel 24, perfecto para tener una vista panorámica del centro histórico y el mar, además de tener el privilegio de dormirte o despertarte con el sonido de las olas.

Los 74m2 se distribuyen en salón-cocina, baño social, alcoba de matrimonio, alcoba individual, cuarto de baño y espectacular terraza.

La  cocina está equipada con todos los electrodomésticos de primeras marcas.
Frigorífico americano Whirpool de 2 puertas en acero inoxidable, con dispensador de agua/hielo, horno acabado en inox, microondas, cocina de gas, campana extractora. Además tenemos una gran representación de pequeño aparato electrodoméstico y menaje, así como sandwichera, tostador, exprimidor, batidora, máquina de perritos calientes, etc...

Espectacular salón con cocina americana. Climatizado con aire acondicionado y ventiladores. Muy luminoso.
Equipado con la más alta tecnología, lo preside una increíble televisión pantalla LED 60 pulgadas 4K, con smart tv y acceso gratuito a las principales plataformas digitales de pago como Netflix.

Frente al equipo de imagen y sonido, tenemos un cómodo y amplio sofá-chaisselongue convertible en cama. Pieza de más de 2 metros, sin duda el summum de la comodidad y el relax. Se hace una king size de 2 por 2.

Junto al salón/cocina se encuentra el baño social; con lavabo e inodoro. También se encuentra una lavadora y una secadora de gran capacidad. Contamos con mesa de plancha y plancha.
 
En la alcoba principal está equipada con un espectacular cama súper king size 200x200, con colchón de alta gama viscoláctico. Dispone de ventilador y aire acondicionado. Además podrás disfrutar de una espectacular televisión led curva 4K de 50”.
Acceso desde la alcoba principal al completo baño en suite con ducha.
En la alcoba individual hay una cama de 90x190 y un armario con caja fuerte.

Uno de los mejores lugares de la casa sin duda, es la espectacular terraza con vistas increíbles al mar y al centro histórico de Cartagena de Indias. Al balcón se accede desde el salón y desde la alcoba principal.
Está equipado equipado con mesa, sillas y hamacas. 

En la vivienda podrá disfrutar de internet de alta velocidad a través de wifi fibra óptica con 50 Mb de velocidad. Además tendrá a su disposición 170 canales de TV premium gratuitos, 62 de ellos en alta definición, para disfrutar de películas, series y deportes en la más alta calidad, con la tecnología 4K.


Incluimos parking subterráneo con vigilancia 24h.

Superaremos todas sus expectativas Sin duda la excelencia del lujo.

Atención. Por la pandemia del COVID-19, están totalmente prohibidas las visitas de huéspedes. El número de personas que registran el apartamento por la plataforma, son las que podrán acceder sin excepción. 
Los horarios de visitas fuera de pandemia serán informados durante el Check-in.
additional_house_rules:
Solo aceptamos huéspedes que sean cuidados y responsables. Se firmará un decálogo de normas antes del ingreso al apartamento y el incumpliendo de las mismas podrá hacer perder el importe de fianza.
Solo podrán ingresar al apartamento las perdonas que seleccionen la reserva inicialmente, a excepción de invitados dentro del horario indicado al Check-in, en 2020 para evitar la prolongación del COVID no se podrán subir invitados.

Decoración moderna y práctica de nuestro apartamento ubicado en un exclusivo sector de Cartagena, se encuentra equipado con todo lo necesario par una estadía memorable.

Apartamento completo totalmente equipado.

additional_house_rules:
ENGLISH
- Is strictly prohibited to bring guests inside the building. Failure to comply with this rule has a penalty of $300 USD and qualifies as a reason to end stay
- Check in is at 2:30PM and check out is at 11:00am, we appreciate your consideration with this hours as it takes time to get the space clean and ready
- Parties and loud music are not allowed
- Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment
- Follow pool rules (Smoking or drinking in glass bottles in the pool are not allowed)
- Pool is subject to availability if your reservation has short notice you might not find availability in this area, after Covid-19 only small groups can be in the pool area

ESPAÑOL
- Al edificio solo pueden ingresar los invitados previamente registrados, el ingreso de personas no autorizadas tiene una multa de 300 USD y da lugar a la terminación de la estadía
- El ingreso al apartamento -check in- es a partir de las 2:30pm, la salida del apartamento -check out- es a las 11:00am
- En la piscina no se puede fumar ni consumir bebidas en envases de vidrio.

additional_house_rules:
English:

1. All guests must show their ID  at the entrance of the building for check in.
2. Check in after 15:00, unless the apartment is available before. If you arrive before, we can keep your luggage.
3. Check out at 12:00 or before, otherwise, a fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged.
4. Whenever you leave the apartment, make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, lights and close the windows.
5. Please limit the noise. After 22:00 it is prohibited to play loud music.
6. Smoking is prohibited.
7. No drugs or prostitution.
8. Visitors are not allowed.
9. It is not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies.
10. If you are not satisfied with something of the apartment, you must inform it immediately. We can fix it in the shortest possible time.
11. If you break something of the apartment or building, you must pay for that.
12. We are not responsable for any loss of personal belongings or accidents in the apartment.
13. All other rules of the building or local policies must be respected.

Español:

1. Todos los huéspedes deberán mostrar un documento de identificación válido en la portería al momento de registrarse.
2. El Check in se realizará luego de las 15:00. El ingreso previo podrá realizarse siempre y cuando el apartamento esté disponible y limpio.
3. El Check out será a más tardar a las 12:00, de lo contrario, una multa equivalente al valor de una noche será cargado.
4. Siempre que salga del apartamento, asegúrese de apagar el aire acondicionado, luces y cerrar las ventanas.
5. Por favor limitar el ruido. Después de las 22:00 se encuentra prohibido poner música con alto volumen. 
6. Fumar está prohibido. Ignorar esta regla causará una penalización del valor de una noche.
7. No se permiten drogas o prostitución en el apartamento.
8. No se permiten invitados en el apartamento.
9. No está permitido arrojar papeles, cigarrillos, basura u otros objetos desde las ventanas o balcones del apartamento.
10. Si no te encuentras satisfecho con algo del apartamento, deberás informarlo inmediatamente. Intentaremos arreglarlo en el menor tiempo posible.
11. Si algún huésped daña algo del apartamento o edificio, deberán pagar antes del check out.
12. No somos responsables por pérdidas de objetos personales o accidentes al interior del apartamento.
13. Todas las demás reglas del edificio o las políticas locales deberán ser respetadas.

description:
Lujoso y nuevo apartamento con Jacuzzi privado en el piso 5to del Edificio Martinique con todos los detalles para una estancia espectacular en la exclusiva zona de Cielomar en la ciudad de Cartagena, cerca a las hermosas playas de la zona norte (Hotel las Américas y Morros), a 5min del aeropuerto y 10m del centro histórico. El edificio tiene todas con las comodidades de un club; una espectacular terraza en el último piso con piscinas, zona de masajes y baño turco, gimnasio, BBQ y salas sociales.

El apartamento tiene un dormitorio con una cama King size, baño privado y un TV LCD. Sala con 02 dos sofás cama dobles y un TV LCD. Balcón con jacuzzi, Baño social, agua caliente en ambos baños y cocina integral totalmente equipada.

El edificio tiene todas con las comodidades de un club; una espectacular terraza en el último piso con piscinas, zona de masajes y baño turco, gimnasio, BBQ y salas sociales.

Estaremos atentos a su estancia para cualquier solicitud o ayuda que necesite durante su viaje.

Ubicado en el barrio Cielomar, Martinique está a solo 200 metro de la mejor y más exclusiva playa de la zona norte, contigua al hotel Las Américas, y en el corazón de la recuperada Ciénaga de la virgen.

Estratégicamente ubicado en el barrio Cielomar, Martinique está a solo 200 metro de la mejor y más exclusiva playa de la zona norte, contigua al hotel y Centro de convenciones Las Américas, y en el corazón de la recuperada Ciénaga de la virgen.
A 5 min del Aeropuerto Rafael Nuñez, a 10 min del Centro Histórico de Cartagena. Ademas de estar en la principal vía de la costa norte de Colombia con salida directa a la ciudad de Barranquilla.

Es importante saber que por normas nacionales y del edificio, es obligatorio registrar la totalidad del grupo con documentos de identidad en recepción a la llegada. Adicionalmente, el proceso de registro tiene un costo de 25.000 COP (8-9 USD pagables directamente al portero) para todo el grupo y toda la estadía (este precio es fijo independientemente del número de personas o de la duración de la estadía)

Maximum 4 guests in total can stay in the apartment.

It is prohibited to remove any object from the apartment without previous authorization.
LOOKING AFTER THE APARTMENT . When returning from the beach in particular, please be sure to remove any wet or damp clothing before using the furniture and to remove sand from your feet.
Please don't bring to the beach white towels provided in the apartment, only the ones provided specially for the beach (colored ones).
Have fun, relax and enjoy

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 7-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

When you register you will be given a bracelet. Please do not remove this. If you loose it you'll have to pay $20,000 for each bracelet lost. Only people registered in the apartment will be the ones allowed in the building. To register someone you must send me full names 24 hours before arrival.  Remember a maximum of 4 registered guests are allowed in this apartment in total. The building doesn't allow other visitors.

4. Whenever you leave the apartment, make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, lights and close the windows.
5. Please limit the noise. After 22:00 it is prohibited to play loud music.
6. Smoking is prohibited.
7. No drugs or prostitution.
8. Visitors are not allowed.
9. It is not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies.
10. If you are not satisfied with something of the apartment, you must inform it immediately. We can fix it in the shortest possible time.
11. If you break something of the apartment or building, you must pay for that.
12. We are not responsable for any loss of personal belongings or accidents in the apartment.
13. All other rules of the building or local policies must be respected.

Español:

1. Todos los huéspedes deberán mostrar un documento de identificación válido en la portería al momento de registrarse.
2. El Check in se realizará luego de las 15:00. El ingreso previo podrá realizarse siempre y cuando el apartamento esté disponible y limpio.
3. El Check out será a más tardar a las 12:00, de lo contrario, una multa equivalente al valor de una noche será cargado.
4. Siempre que salga del apartamento, asegúrese de apagar el aire acondicionado, luces y cerrar las ventanas.
5. Por favor limitar el ruido. Después de las 22:00 se encuentra prohibido poner música con alto volumen. 
6. Fumar está prohibido. Ignorar esta regla causará una penalización del valor de una noche.
7. No se permiten drogas o prostitución en el apartamento.
8. No se permiten invitados en el apartamento.
9. No está permitido arrojar papeles, cigarrillos, basura u otros objetos desde las ventanas o balcones del apartamento.
10. Si no te encuentras satisfecho con algo del apartamento, deberás informarlo inmediatamente. Intentaremos arreglarlo en el menor tiempo posible.
11. Si algún huésped daña algo del apartamento o edificio, deberán pagar antes del check out.
12. No somos responsables por pérdidas de objetos personales o accidentes al interior del apartamento.
13. Todas las demás reglas del edificio o las políticas locales deberán ser respetadas.

-Unregistered names won’t be allowed in until next day of check in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres que no estén registrados no podrán ingresar sino hasta el día siguiente del check in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Full names and passport/ID number of all guests must be sent or changed at least 24 hours before check-in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres completos de todos los huéspedes y el número de documento con el que viaja (ID/pasaporte) deben ser enviados o cambiados al menos 24 horas antes del check-in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-It is compulsory to have your ID to register at the front desk of the building to be granted access even for kids and toddlers // Es indispensable la presentación de documentos de identificación de cada uno de los huéspedes para el registro de acceso al edificio incluso para niños y bebés 
-Both at check in and check out an inventory checklist will be performed // Se hará inventario de check in y check out de los elementos del apartamento 
-You will be charged EVERY broken item // Se cobrarán TODOS los elementos rotos 
-When you register at the building you are going to be given a free bracelet that you have to wear during all your stay, if you take it off you will be charged 10.000COP for a new one // Al registrarte en el edificio te pondrán una manilla sin costo que debes llevar puesta durante toda tu estadía, si te la quitas debes pagar 10.000COP por una nueva  
-Last names of guests under 18 must match with those of adults (checked at reception) if under 18 guests travel without their parents they must have a notarized permit signed by parents (WITHOUT THIS GUESTS WILL NOT BE ALLOWED IN) // Los apellidos de menores de edad deben coincidir con los de los adultos si los menores de edad viajan sin sus padres deben presentar un permiso notariado de los padres (SIN ESTO NO SE DARÁ INGRESO)
- If interested in daily cleaning, please specify in advance. A daily cleaning charge of 50.000COP per day will apply // Si se necesita aseo diario solicitarlo con antelación. Costo de 50.000 por día
-You will be given 2 towels per guest // Se entregan 2 toallas por huésped
-It is TOTALLY forbidden any form of prostitution involving children and/or teenagers (Law 679 of 2001) // Se prohibe ESTRICTAMENTE cualquier forma de prostitución contra niños y/o adolescentes (Ley 679 del 2001) 
-If you cannot respect these rules please do not book

I hate rules too !
interaction: Upon arrival I will make sure everything is perfect for your stay, me and my staff will be at your entire disposition 24/7 ✅
access: Beautiful gym 💪🏻, sauna 🧖‍♂, pool 🏊‍♂ and jacuzzi for no extra charge. Make sure you enjoy all building’s great facilities 🏢 !
transit: Very easy to find cabs 🚕 anytime or to take bus 🚌. Cartagena is a small city everything is close. Cab ride to airport ✈ takes 15 minutes

name: Home sweet home by the beach.
summary:
My place is near Hotel Las Américas, Karibana Golf Condominium, the airport, old city (10 mins away by car), Castillo San Felipe (4.2 km away), and other relevant places. 
You’ll love my apartment´s view from its balcony, its location in Cartagena's most attractive beach, the building's facilities (big pool, children playground, beach downstairs, massages by the beach, gym), the coziness and its safety. 
My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Room-darkening shades,Window guards,Building staff,Private entrance,Beachfront
description:
My place is near Hotel Las Américas, Karibana Golf Condominium, the airport, old city (10 mins away by car), Castillo San Felipe (4.2 km away), and other relevant places. 
You’ll love my apartment´s view from its balcony, its location in Cartagena's most attractive beach, the building's facilities (big pool, children playground, beach downstairs, massages by the beach, gym), the coziness and its safety. 
My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families.

NOTE: The building will charge a 20,000 COP fare per person at the entrance. This ensures security, since they'll give you a bracelet to wear during your stay.

I (Orietta, host) don't live in Cartagena. However, I will be pleased to help in any of your needs. You can call me or text me anytime during your stay. 
Besides, there's a person you can hire to cook typical Cartagena food! She is in charge of cleaning the apartment before your stay. If you wish to try some of her dishes or want an extra cleaning during your stay, you can let me know about it and I'll be pleased to call her for her to be there.

If you go downstairs you'll get to the beach. 
Running or hiking around early in the morning or at sunset will be great! It's safe during the day and there are many other buildings nearby. However, tt's better not to walk by the beach after 6:00 noon. 
The building's pool is open all day (until 8:00 pm).

The apartment has its own indoor parking space, plus a private outdoor parking lot for visitors. 
To get to the city center you'll have to grab a cab. The doorman will help you to request it, without having to do previous reservations. Finding cabs is usually very easy.

You'll love waking up and glancing by the balcony. Sunrise is beautiful at the apartment, and the sunset and vibes by the beach are pretty charming.

Perfect 1 bedroom apartment in the 36th floor of one of the newest, most representative building in Cartagena. Has a living room, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, and a balcony with a spectacular view over the Cartagena beach and the city center on the far right. 
Perfect for a couple vacation or a business trip. Apt is suitable for 1 - 4 guests maximum. There are two double beds in the main bedroom (Joined form a king bed) and 2 sofa beds in the living room. 
We look forward to hosting you!

It's one of the most beautiful, elegant and perfectly located building and apartment in Cartagena. Everything in the apartment is completely new and thought especially to make your stay here perfect!
You will love staying here!

The apartment has: Full equipped kitchen, washer, towels, sheets, and very nice carefully selected furniture in the entire apartment. You can enter the gym, pool, jacuzzi, etc.

I have staff that helps me with everything in Cartagena. I'll be always on top of what is happening. So you can call me or write me and I'll send someone to check in case you need help with anything.

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 7-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

When you register you will be given a bracelet. Please do not remove this. If you loose it you'll have to pay $20,000 for each bracelet lost. Only people registered in the apartment will be the ones allowed in the building. For registration you must send me the names of the people that will be staying at least 24 hours before their arrival. Max of 4 people registered in total.

Amoblado con un estilo moderno. Cuenta con 1 habitación con cama doble y un sofacama, aire acondicionado y terraza. En la cocina, hallarás todos los utensilios. La habitación cuenta con su propio juego de sabanas y toalla personal.

El complejo cuenta con vigilancia privada las 24 horas del día.
Es un sector exclusivo de la ciudad, muy bien ubicado, a 4 km del centro Histórico y las murallas de Cartagena, y a 2km del aeropuerto Rafael Núñez.

El edifico es nuevo, por lo cual el ascensor está disponible y en funcionamiento pero aún tiene la estructura de protección, adicionalmente las escaleras están disponibles pero aún no se ha terminado el enchape y hay un espacio que se va a terminar con decoración de piedritas de colores en agua.

El apartamento tiene acceso directo al mar.
Cuenta con 2 piscinas. 
Tiene gimnasio, cancha de tenis, turco, sauna, supermercado, peluquería y restaurante.

El apartamento se encuentra dentro del complejo hotelero Sonesta.
Estamos en una zona exclusiva de la ciudad.
También encontraras en esta misma zona el hotel las Americas, Holiday Inn, Radisson.

Tienes acceso a transporte público como taxis y buses que pasan por el edificio donde está ubicado el apartamento.

additional_house_rules:
1- Por tema de COVID se debe diligenciar y mandar formato de declaración de estado de salud. 

2- Se debe presentar documentos de identidad o pasaporte con foto para el registro de huéspedes al momento del ingreso al complejo y enviar información antes de la llegada.

3- La hora de llegada es a las 3 de la tarde (3:00 pm), antes no se recibe al huésped, la hora de salida es a las 12 del mediodía en punto (12:00 pm).

4- Se debe pagar el costo de la manilla de ingreso al complejo por un valor de $30.000 por persona.

5- Solo pueden estar en el apartamento y las instalaciones del complejo, las personas registradas en la reserva.

6- Solo se aceptan menores de edad acompañados por sus padres.

7- No se aceptan mascotas. 

8- En caso de llegarse a presentar un inconveniente dentro del apartamento y se deba hacer un arreglo dentro del mismo, por lo que se requeriría la salida de los huéspedes del apartamento inmediatamente; se les devolverá ya sea por transferencia bancaria o en efectivo, el mismo día o en su defecto al día siguiente, lo correspondiente al pago de las noches que le queden faltando en su reservación, por el mismo dinero que lo reservaron.

Gracias
