additional_house_rules:
-VERY IMPORTANT: For all guests staying at this listing please send full names/document number/document type/nationality/date of birth (Colombia’s authorities requirement) // MUY IMPORTANTE: Para todos los huéspedes que se hospeden en este apartamento por favor enviar nombres completos/número de documentos/tipo de documento/nacionalidad/fecha nacimiento (requerimiento de la policía colombiana)  
-NO VISITORS ALLOWED (building's STRICT rule) // NO SE ADMITEN INVITADOS (regla ESTRICTA del edificio)  
-Full names and passport/ID number of all guests must be sent or changed at least 24 hours before check-in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres completos de todos los huéspedes y el número de documento con el que viaja (ID/pasaporte) deben ser enviados o cambiados al menos 24 horas antes del check-in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Unregistered names won’t be allowed in until next day of check in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres que no estén registrados no podrán ingresar sino hasta el día siguiente del check in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Strict maximum number of guests for this apartment is 4 people (toddlers and/or underage kids count as persons as well) // El número máximo estricto de huéspedes de este apartamento es 4 personas (los bebes y/o menores de edad cuentan también como personas)  
-It is compulsory to have your ID to register at the front desk of the building to be granted access even for kids and toddlers // Es indispensable la presentación de documentos de identificación de cada uno de los huéspedes para el registro de acceso al edificio incluso para niños y bebés 
-Both at check in and check out an inventory checklist will be performed // Se hará inventario de check in y check out de los elementos del apartamento 
-You will be charged EVERY broken item // Se cobrarán TODOS los elementos rotos 
-When you register at the building you are going to be given a free bracelet that you have to wear during all your stay, if you take it off you will be charged 10.000COP for a new one // Al registrarte en el edificio te pondrán una manilla sin costo que debes llevar puesta durante toda tu estadía, si te la quitas debes pagar 10.000COP por una nueva  
-Last names of guests under 18 must match with those of adults (checked at reception) // Los apellidos de menores de edad deben coincidir con los de los adultos 
- If interested in daily cleaning, please specify in advance. A daily cleaning charge of 50.000COP per day will apply // Si se necesita aseo diario solicitarlo con antelación. Costo de 50.000 por día
-You will be given 2 towels per guest // Se entregan 2 toallas por huésped
-It is TOTALLY forbidden any form of prostitution involving children and/or teenagers (Law 679 of 2001) // Se prohibe ESTRICTAMENTE cualquier forma de prostitución contra niños y/o adolescentes (Ley 679 del 2001) 
-If you cannot respect these rules please do not book

I hate rules too !

name: Hollywood Beach 1306
summary: Apartamento amplio y soñador con una vista preciosa de la zona más turística de la ciudad. Cartagena de Indias es una ciudad privilegiada rodeada por playas exóticas. Aquí en El Laguito se encuentra la playa Hollywood a pocos pasos del edificio donde está nuestro apartamento, y se encuentra el centro histórico a tan solo 10 minutos en taxi. Si viene a Cartagena para conocer sus playas y su cultura nuestro apartamento de lujo ofrece la mejor comodidad de la zona.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Crib,Game console,High chair,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Waterfront,Fire extinguisher
description:
Apartamento amplio y soñador con una vista preciosa de la zona más turística de la ciudad. Cartagena de Indias es una ciudad privilegiada rodeada por playas exóticas. Aquí en El Laguito se encuentra la playa Hollywood a pocos pasos del edificio donde está nuestro apartamento, y se encuentra el centro histórico a tan solo 10 minutos en taxi. Si viene a Cartagena para conocer sus playas y su cultura nuestro apartamento de lujo ofrece la mejor comodidad de la zona.

Nuestro apartamento de lujo está completamente dotado y cuenta con aire acondicionado en las habitaciones, WiFi rápido, televisor plasma y servicio de Direct TV, habitaciones confortables con camas amplias y suaves, cocina integral, lavadora y baños limpios con agua caliente y un balcón amplio con vistas hermosas al mar y lago.

El apartamento hace parte de un edificio moderno con todas las facilidades de acceso, bahía para autos, rampas, ascensores, escaleras. Cuenta con amplios pasillos donde corre libremente la brisa de mar, en el piso cuarto está ubicada la piscina, y el Jaccuzi, en este piso hay un mirador con mesas y sillas donde puede sentarse a leer, tomarse una agradable bebida o simplemente meditar, y la sala de recepción que es amplia con aire acondicionado y recepción 24 horas. Tener en cuenta que es en la recepción del hotel Hollywood Beach Suite que queda al lado del edificio donde se atiende todos sus solicitudes y inquietudes al respeto al apartamento.

La llave se recoge en la recepción de nuestro negocio Hollywood Beach Suite en el edificio al lado.
Ustedes nuestros huéspedes contaran con nuestro recibimiento y atención de lo que requieran las 24 horas del día, nos complace mucho tenerlos y nos interesa que su estancia sea muy cómoda. Nuestro equipo de mantenimiento estaré disponible de 9 de la mañana a las 4 de la tarde. 
Puede solicitar aseos a un costo adicional (favor avisar un día antes)

Nuestro edificio está ubicado en El Laguito, la zona más Turística y más visitada en Cartagena por sus playas exóticas y su belleza natural. Los turistas de todo el mundo caminan libremente por sus calles y su ambiente es festivo. En su alrededor se consigue todo clase de restaurantes y tours para conocer la zona. El lugar tiene su nombre por el cuerpo circular de agua de mar que da forma de media luna a este lugar llamado cariñosamente El Laguito.

El apartamento está situado en la zona llamada El Laguito, un lugar muy seguro que cuenta con excelente seguridad, transporte público, taxis las 24 horas.
Estamos a tan solo 10 minutos en auto de la ciudad amurallada y a tan solo 20 minutos del aeropuerto.

Es la responsabilidad del huésped llevar consigo el documento de identidad valido para poder ingresar en el edificio:  
Para clientes nacionales se exige: pasaporte o cédula, y para los niños registro de nacimiento o tarjeta de identidad y para clientes extranjeros se exige el pasaporte. 
Lo anterior es imprescindible para el ingreso al edificio. 
Se agradece que nos avisa con anticipación la hora esperada de check in y check out para una mejor planificación.

name: Hermoso apartamento, perfecta ubicación (605A)
summary:
Espectacular apartamento en uno de los sectores más exclusivos de Cartagena de Indias. Completamente dotado, ideal para familias o grupos de amigos. description:
Espectacular apartamento en uno de los sectores más exclusivos de Cartagena de Indias. Completamente dotado, ideal para familias o grupos de amigos. Hermoso balcón con vista panorámica hacia ‘El Laguito’. Ubicado a una cuadra de la playa y del Hotel Hilton, a 10 minutos de la ciudad amurallada. Todas las comodidades para turistas (casa de cambio, restaurantes, súper mercados, centro comercial, lavanderías…) Área de recreación y piscinas para niños y adultos.
Pago registro 15.000COP / apartamento

Completamente dotado hasta para seis huéspedes con juegos de cama, toallas, utensilios de cocina, aires acondicionados, televisores, nevera, licuadora, microondas, sandwichera, etc. Una de las mejores cosas del apartamento es la ubicación estratégica y las facilidades de transporte, además de las comodidades para los turistas.

Espectaculares áreas comunes para recreación y esparcimiento. Las piscinas para niños y adultos completamente remodeladas son uno de los principales atractivos del edificio Nuevo Conquistador.

Atención permanente a los huéspedes vía telefónica o a través de la plataforma de Airbnb.

Ubicado a una cuadra de la playa y del emblemático Hotel Hilton, y a 10 minutos de la ciudad amurallada. Sector con todas las comodidades para turistas (casa de cambio, restaurantes, heladerías, droguerías, súper mercados, centro comercial Nao, lavanderías, etc.)

Parqueadero cubierto con costo adicional que se paga a la administración del edificio. Parqueadero gratuito en las bahías exteriores del edificio.

This apartment is simply perfect !
neighborhood_overview: Very close to countless restaurants, grocery stores, shops, casinos, clubs etc., everything is within walking distances, even the old city.
notes: This apartment is simply perfect !
additional_house_rules:
-VERY IMPORTANT: For all guests staying at this listing please send full names/document number/document type/nationality/date of birth (Colombia’s authorities requirement) // MUY IMPORTANTE: Para todos los huéspedes que se hospeden en este apartamento por favor enviar nombres completos/número de documentos/tipo de documento/nacionalidad/fecha nacimiento (requerimiento de la policía colombiana) 
-NO VISITORS ALLOWED (building's STRICT rule) // NO SE ADMITEN INVITADOS (regla ESTRICTA del edificio)  
-Full names and passport/ID number of all guests must be sent or changed at least 24 hours before check-in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres completos de todos los huéspedes y el número de documento con el que viaja (ID/pasaporte) deben ser enviados o cambiados al menos 24 horas antes del check-in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Unregistered names won’t be allowed in until next day of check in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres que no estén registrados no podrán ingresar sino hasta el día siguiente del check in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Strict maximum number of guests for this apartment is 4 people (toddlers and/or underage kids count as persons as well) // El número máximo estricto de huéspedes de este apartamento es 4 personas (los bebes y/o menores de edad cuentan también como personas)  
-It is compulsory to have your ID to register at the front desk of the building to be granted access even for kids and toddlers // Es indispensable la presentación de documentos de identificación de cada uno de los huéspedes para el registro de acceso al edificio incluso para niños y bebés 
-Both at check in and check out an inventory checklist will be performed // Se hará inventario de check in y check out de los elementos del apartamento 
-You will be charged EVERY broken item // Se cobrarán TODOS los elementos rotos 
-When you register at the building you are going to be given a free bracelet that you have to wear during all your stay, if you take it off you will be charged 10.000COP for a new one // Al registrarte en el edificio te pondrán una manilla sin costo que debes llevar puesta durante toda tu estadía, si te la quitas debes pagar 10.000COP por una nueva  
-Last names of guests under 18 must match with those of adults (checked at reception) // Los apellidos de menores de edad deben coincidir con los de los adultos 
- If interested in daily cleaning, please specify in advance. A daily cleaning charge of 50.000COP per day will apply // Si se necesita aseo diario solicitarlo con antelación. Costo de 50.000 por día
-You will be given 2 towels per guest // Se entregan 2 toallas por huésped
-It is TOTALLY forbidden any form of prostitution involving children and/or teenagers (Law 679 of 2001) // Se prohibe ESTRICTAMENTE cualquier forma de prostitución contra niños y/o adolescentes (Ley 679 del 2001) 
-If you cannot respect these rules please do not book

I hate rules too !

transit: Very easy to find cabs anytime or to take bus. Cartagena is a small city everything is close. Cab ride to airpot takes 15 minutes

name: OCEANVIEW MORROS EPIC
summary: Spectacular waterfront building in Cartagena De Indias, Colombia, designed by De la Vega with 5 stars’ amenities including 3 pool areas, heated Jacuzzi, fitness center, and sauna. Fully furnished.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Heating,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Free street parking,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Keypad,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm
description:
Spectacular waterfront building in Cartagena De Indias, Colombia, designed by De la Vega with 5 stars’ amenities including 3 pool areas, heated Jacuzzi, fitness center, and sauna. Fully furnished.

One Bedroom Unit with Balcony 78 sqmts
One double bed and one single bed in Master Bedroom
Single rolling bed in Master Bedroom
Double sofa bed in living room
Full kitchen, free cable, washer/dryer in residence
Convenient to Centro Historico, Local Dinning & Nightlife, Las Americas Convention Center, and Airport
Reliable private internet Access 
Building
Luxury resort style amenities
Daily Maid Services (subject to availability and extra charge)
24 Hour Security
24 Hour On-Call Service Desk (For Taxi, directions, etc. in local language)
Recreation Area with Pool Deck and Heated Jacuzzi
Wireless free Internet is available throughout the building and also extending to the pool areas and the beach.

The building has five swimming pools, one Jacuzzi, sauna, gym and direct access to the beach. Beach location is perfect for water sports and close to rental shops for jet skis, kayaking, and kite surfing.

We offer assistance 24/7 by internet, by phone and in person. We are pleased to assist our guest directly at our apartments or at our office in Bocagrande

La Boquilla Area or Zona Norte is known for the quantity of luxury hotels such as the Radisson, the Americas, and the different Morros complexes. Since it is a hotel area, there is full security services monitored 24 hours a day.

The Building is 15 minutes away by taxi to the Old City or “Ciudad Amurallada” and 20 minutes to the Bocagrande area. it is only 5 minutes by taxi to the Las Americas Convention Center and 8 minutes’ taxi drive away to the airport

Taxis are easy to arrange with the help of the front desk reception.

All visitors to the premises are restricted and are subject to be previously authorized by the building's administration office. The building's rules and regulations do not permit nightly renters to have visitors,only long-term rental are allowed to have visitors. Only official guests staying in the apartment can enjoy the building's amenities.

Exclusive and modern aparta suite with 1 bedroom, with a maximum capacity for 4 people. Area of ​​70 meters with 2 bathrooms (with hot shower), kitchen , laundry area, terrace and parking. Independent A / C in each area. Fully furnished and equipped with everything you need for your stay. Located in the exclusive Los Morros sector in the Morros Vitri building, which has 2 swimming pools, jacuzzy, wet areas, gym and direct access to the beach.

The main room has a 46 "TV with cable, closet, double bed, sofa bed for children and bathroom. 
The room has a double sofa bed, coffee table, speakers and bathroom.
All areas have separate A / C, ceiling fans. Kitchen equipped with all appliances and utensils. Terrace with dining room. Laundry area with washer / dryer tower, iron and table. Parking available.

The Morros Vitri building has a 24 hour lobby with surveillance and CCTV. A main pool facing the beach with jacuzzy and a second more private pool. Wet areas with Turkish bath and gym. Its facilities are very calm and relaxing, with vegetation and water mirrors. It has direct access to the beaches of La Boquilla. Wifi in the common areas for free.

Estoy disponible para responder todas las inquietudes y consultas que tengan los huéspedes.

The Morros sector is an exclusive zone where hotels and modern holiday residential complexes are located. It is a linear area with a cycle route and in the buildings you can find restaurants, SPA, mini markets, drugstores, grocery stores and fast food places. 5 minutes from the airport and 10 minutes from the historic center.

	Cuando salgas del alojamiento cerciórate de haber cerrado los grifos del agua, apagado las luces, los electrodomésticos y las estufas de gas.
	Todos nosotros evitamos hacer ruidos después de 9 pm 
	Los problemas o situaciones irregulares se resuelven de 6 am a 6pm.
	Apreciamos tu puntualidad a las horas de llegada y salidas acordadas. Por favor avísanos si tu itinerario ha cambiado.
	Por favor devolver la llave cuando finalice la visita.

I spent part of my life dreming a life over the sea, loving the summer time I found this city where I invest in a cozy flat over the sea. Just a dream come true. I offer my flat for couples, just for two persons. The apartament is one bedroom with a confortable double bed (Queen size) with bathroom and shower, complete kitchen, living and balcony. Amenities are AC, Wifi, washing and drier machine. Fridge, hoven, cookers and all the utensils you need to live in a real home. What makes unique my space is the fact you will be living in front of the beah and the sea, giving you one of the best views you could desire with romantic sunsets and high quality and confort. The location of the building, a tall tower overthe Bocagrande beach is a strategical position. Nearby the airport and the old town (walled town) Getsemani hood and the ancient walls. Just perfect. I decide a low price cause I am starting this adventure andI hope you can have a great stay in my flat, feeling like in your home. I offer a iron, a hair drier and basic ingredients to cook at home as salt sugar pepper oil and coffe. Soap for the shower, towels, big towels for the swimming pool and bed linen. In case of damages I trust on my airbnb guests, I do not charge for a broken glass but I hope in other cases you will be honest with me. That helps me to put low prices.

Living here you have access to the common spaces as the panoramic terrace and swimming pool. Jacuzzi, gym and Turco. If you wat to rent a car ask me about the parking. The beach in front of the building morroscity is a public beach with free access.

I am available through the arbnb app, by email or phone. I am very friendly and I like friendly guests so I use to check reviews of other airbnb hosts.

Arriving at the airport you have to ask a taxi to Bocagrande neighbourhood. In spanish is :" un taxi hacia Bocagrande"
Just 10 minutes from home. Perfect distance to save time in your trip. You will be nearby all the must places to visit here. You will be in the safest area of this city.

It is possible to move by foot, renting bikes, using taxi cabs or buses. The city is realy small so you will spend around 5-10 minutes to get each interesting place. I am an expert traveler so I will give you my personal tips and I will be available to help you planning your visit here.

2 bedroom apartment in the Porto Fino building, a beautiful 16 floor building in the heart of Bocagrande. This newly remodeled apartment has everything you need for a very pleasant stay in Cartagena. The apartment has air conditioner in each bedroom and a fan for the living room. The living room doesn't have an air conditioner.
There are two TVs, one in the bedroom and another one in the living room.
Beautifully decorated to make your stay very confortable in the apartment.

Only registered guests are allowed in the building.

We have  personnel to help you with what you need during your stay.

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 7-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

When you register you will be given a bracelet. Please do not remove this. If you loose it you'll have to pay for each bracelet lost.
Only people registered in the apartment will be the ones allowed in the building.

name: Cartagena Apartamento Con Vista Al Mar
summary: Nuestro apartamento es el lugar ideal para disfrutar de las mejores vistas de Cartagena, desde el balcón puedes ver la Ciénaga de la Virgen y sus aves, al igual que los mejores atardeceres sobre el Mar. Está ubicado en Cielo Mar, un sector exclusivo y a pocos metros de Playa Azul, la única playa certificada en la ciudad que ofrece seguridad y comodidad para disfrutar de tu experiencia en el mar. El apartamento es de 1 habitación, sala-cocina, balcón, zona de lavandería y dos baños.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Cooking basics,Lockbox,Private entrance
description:
Nuestro apartamento es el lugar ideal para disfrutar de las mejores vistas de Cartagena, desde el balcón puedes ver la Ciénaga de la Virgen y sus aves, al igual que los mejores atardeceres sobre el Mar. Está ubicado en Cielo Mar, un sector exclusivo y a pocos metros de Playa Azul, la única playa certificada en la ciudad que ofrece seguridad y comodidad para disfrutar de tu experiencia en el mar. El apartamento es de 1 habitación, sala-cocina, balcón, zona de lavandería y dos baños.

El balcón es el lugar ideal para disfrutar de una lectura, desayuno o cena al aire libre, incluso para trabajar y estudiar.
El Edificio cuenta con zonas comunes que incluyen: zonas verdes con salas de estar, BBQ, piscina con borde infinito, pisicina semiolimpica para nado, 2 jacuzzi, turco y paque infantil.

Nuestros huespedes tendrán acceso a las zonas sociales del edificio donde pueden encontrar psicinas, jacuzzi, salas de estar, gimnasio, baño turco, BBQ, Parque infantil y parqueadero.

Durante su visita, estarémos encantados de asistirles con cualquier inquietud o requerimiento que puedan tener no solo sobre el apartamento sino en general sobre la ciudad.

El Edificio Martinique está muy bien ubicado sobre la calle principal de Cielo Mar, un sector muy seguro, tranquilo, limpio y agradeable para caminar. Puedes encontrar tienda, supermercado y restaurantes. Además se encuentra a solo 5 minutos del Aeropuerto, a 10 minutos del Centro Histórico y a pocos metros de Playa Azul.

Hacemos de tu experiencia lo más comoda y segura posible, por lo cual el acceso a transporte lo sugerimos solicitandolo a través del concierge que se encuentra en el Lobby y quienes están siempre dispuestos a aistirles. Si deseas transporte público, lo puedes tomar a un par de cuadras del Edificio sobre la vía principal.

El edificio se encuentra muy bien ubicado, a pocos metros de Playa Azul, a la Cienaga de la Virgen, el Aeropuerto y a 15 minutos del Centro Histórico.
neighborhood_overview: El Edificio Martinique está muy bien ubicado sobre la calle principal de Cielo Mar, un sector muy seguro, tranquilo, limpio y agradeable para caminar. Puedes encontrar tienda, supermercado y restaurantes. Además se encuentra a solo 5 minutos del Aeropuerto, a 10 minutos del Centro Histórico y a pocos metros de Playa Azul.

name: Quite 1 Bedroom Apartment Perfect Location
summary: In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished and fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, TV, Gym & Pool and an amazing balcony to enjoy the lake and the bay of Cartagena. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Ethernet connection,Hot water,Paid parking off premises,Single level home,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Lake access,Waterfront,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished and fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, TV, Gym & Pool and an amazing balcony to enjoy the lake and the bay of Cartagena. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 60 sqm and can accommodate up to 3 persons with its 1 bedroom(s) and bed sofa in the living room. Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and parking in the buildings garage*. The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling, here you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area and the comfy sofa & TV. The apartment has 1 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing lake view! This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". 
*Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the lake. The building is modern and has a gym and pool. There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking and two elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don't hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, less then 100 meters away (in Palmetto Sunset) where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance of the building Palmetto Sunset.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
 
2. BUILDING FEE: 1 Bedroom Apartment = 25,000 COP (approx. $7 USD) & 2 Bedroom Apartment = 35,000 COP (approx. $10 USD). The prices are per apartment & has to be payed directly to the building.

3. WRISTBAND: Torres de Lago's wristband must be worn over time (for access). Lost or removed wristband may be charged by the building. 
 
4. MINORS: Minors must be accompanied by at least one of their parents presenting the minors identification in original. For Colombian minors "registro civil" in original or ID has to be shown and both parents has to be present. If only one parent are present an authorization in written from the parent (not present) has to be shown. 

5. PETS: Are allowed but you should bring a dog muzzle & vaccination card, please let us know if you're bringing your pet.
 
6. SOCIAL AREAS: 
Pool 3rd floor        09:00AM-06:00PM
GYM 3rd floor       06:00AM-06:00PM

7. ENVIRONMENT: At anytime you leave the apartment make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet. Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena S.A.S is authorized to enter at any time and turn them off. It's not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. Please save water and light as much as possible and please take care of your waste and garbage (especially when out in the nature like the beach or if you visit the islands) even if you see locals or other tourist not respecting this. 

8. ADDITIONAL SERVICES: Cleaning services or cooking are available upon request for an extra fee, please ask us.

9. PARKING: If you need parking, you must inform us before your arrival.
 
10. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters.  

11. You must inform me immediately if there is something you feel is not fulfilling with the listing details so that we can fix it in the best possible way as soon as possible. 
 
12. All the rules of the building and local law must be respected.  

13. Read the "Additional rules" before confirm the last step of the reservation.

additional_house_rules:
Strict Rules:
1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
2. CHECK IN/OUT: Check out is strictly at 12 PM or earlier. A fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged if overstayed. Check in is at after 3 PM.
3. If you bring visitors it on your responsibility. They have to register at the reception. You can have a "permanent guests" please ask for more info. 
4. NOISE: Please limit the noise at all time but especially after 11 PM. Parties and high noise levels are prohibited (this includes TV, music & high volume conversations).
5. SMOKING: Is prohibited inside the property (except on the balcony). 
6. SEXUAL EXPLOITATION: Of children and adolescents is a crime.
7. DEPOSIT/KEYS: If you break something in the apartment/building you must pay the damages. If you lose the keys you'll be charged 80,000 COP.

name: VACACIONES EN MORROS EPIC
summary: En mi espacio te brindamos aparte de una estadía confortable, la seguridad de que  cualquier inquietud o necesidad que se te presente estaremos disponibles lo mas rápido posible para ayudarte, te ofrecemos lo que te contamos y mostramos en las fotos, nos gusta que nuestros huéspedes se sientan complacidos de habernos escogido!!
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Room-darkening shades,Table corner guards,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Host greets you,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Patio or balcony,Beachfront
description:
En mi espacio te brindamos aparte de una estadía confortable, la seguridad de que  cualquier inquietud o necesidad que se te presente estaremos disponibles lo mas rápido posible para ayudarte, te ofrecemos lo que te contamos y mostramos en las fotos, nos gusta que nuestros huéspedes se sientan complacidos de habernos escogido!!

Apartamento con toda la comodidad que estas buscando!! Alcoba principal con cama de matrimonio,  un sofa cama sencillo,  baño con ducha, vestier,  tv y aire acondicionado, en la sala dos sofacamas super cómodos con sobre colchón para tu comodidad; baño completo con ducha, tv y aire acondicionado, juegos de cama, toallas de baño y toallas de playa, cocina totalmente dotada - vajilla, copas, platos, cubiertos, ollas y sartenes, microondas, cafetera, licuadora, sanduchera etc., lavadora y secadora, un servicio completo de canales de tv cable e internet wifi. Cuenta con una amplia terraza con vista al viaducto y  a la ciénaga de la virgen , con mesa de comedor, sillones cómodos  para disfrutar la brisa de las tardes. El apartamento con su privilegiada ubicación  tiene mucha luz pero está protegido del fuerte sol

Morros Epic es uno de los más exclusivos edificios de Cartagena con pocos apartamentos. El edificio tiene acceso directo a la mejor playa de Cartagena. Pueden disfrutar 4 piscinas privadas, jacuzzi, camas de sol cómodos y siempre disponibles, gimnasio full equipado y turco.

Estare disponible siempre que los huespedes lo requieran, en caso de no estar yo estaré mi asistente Jackelin Andraus

El edificio tiene cerca dos  mini mercados;   El Exito Express  se encuentra en frente de Hotel Las Americas (10-12 minutos a pie), ARA que se encuentra a 4 edificios ,Los mejores restaurantes del barrio tales como Blas el teso,  ERRE  Hotel Las Americas y en el  Hotel Holiday Inn (al lado de Morros 3), entre otros, droguerias tambien encontraras muy cerca.

Los huespedes pueden movilizarce en taxi que seran llamados por el señor de la recepcion o tomar el transporte publico que pasa por el frente del condominio.

Recuerda que solo en la zona de los Morros podrás disfrutar de la salida directa al mar!!

additional_house_rules:
-VERY IMPORTANT: For all guests staying at this listing please send full names/document number/document type/nationality/date of birth (Colombia’s authorities requirement) // MUY IMPORTANTE: Para todos los huéspedes que se hospeden en este apartamento por favor enviar nombres completos/número de documentos/tipo de documento/nacionalidad/fecha nacimiento (requerimiento de la policía colombiana) 
-NO VISITORS ALLOWED (building's STRICT rule) // NO SE ADMITEN INVITADOS (regla ESTRICTA del edificio)  
-Full names and passport/ID number of all guests must be sent or changed at least 24 hours before check-in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres completos de todos los huéspedes y el número de documento con el que viaja (ID/pasaporte) deben ser enviados o cambiados al menos 24 horas antes del check-in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Unregistered names won’t be allowed in until next day of check in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres que no estén registrados no podrán ingresar sino hasta el día siguiente del check in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Strict maximum number of guests for this apartment is 4 people (toddlers and/or underage kids count as persons as well) // El número máximo estricto de huéspedes de este apartamento es 4 personas (los bebes y/o menores de edad cuentan también como personas)  
-It is compulsory to have your ID to register at the front desk of the building to be granted access even for kids and toddlers // Es indispensable la presentación de documentos de identificación de cada uno de los huéspedes para el registro de acceso al edificio incluso para niños y bebés 
-Both at check in and check out an inventory checklist will be performed // Se hará inventario de check in y check out de los elementos del apartamento 
-You will be charged EVERY broken item // Se cobrarán TODOS los elementos rotos 
-When you register at the building you are going to be given a free bracelet that you have to wear during all your stay, if you take it off you will be charged 10.000COP for a new one // Al registrarte en el edificio te pondrán una manilla sin costo que debes llevar puesta durante toda tu estadía, si te la quitas debes pagar 10.000COP por una nueva  
-Last names of guests under 18 must match with those of adults (checked at reception) // Los apellidos de menores de edad deben coincidir con los de los adultos 
- If interested in daily cleaning, please specify in advance. A daily cleaning charge of 50.000COP per day will apply // Si se necesita aseo diario solicitarlo con antelación. Costo de 50.000 por día
-You will be given 2 towels per guest // Se entregan 2 toallas por huésped
-It is TOTALLY forbidden any form of prostitution involving children and/or teenagers (Law 679 of 2001) // Se prohibe ESTRICTAMENTE cualquier forma de prostitución contra niños y/o adolescentes (Ley 679 del 2001) 
-If you cannot respect these rules please do not book

I hate rules too !
interaction: Upon arrival I will make sure everything is perfect for your stay, me and my staff will be at your entire disposition 24/7

summary: En el Apartamento encontrará todo para la comodidad de seis (6) huéspedes, un ambiente acogedor, moderno y espacioso que consta de  sala/comedor, cocina, lavandería, terraza amplia, con una vista espectacular. La habitación principal con baño y la segunda con su baño anexo. Con aire acondicionado.  El Laguito, sector turístico y exclusivo una opción genial para los interesados en playa, descanso, muy cerca del casco antiguo de la Cartagena colonial. Una experiencia inolvidable en el caribe.

En el Apartamento encontrará todo para la comodidad de seis (6) huéspedes, un ambiente acogedor, moderno y espacioso que consta de  sala/comedor, cocina, lavandería, terraza amplia, con una vista espectacular. La habitación principal con baño y la segunda con su baño anexo. Con aire acondicionado.  El Laguito, sector turístico y exclusivo una opción genial para los interesados en playa, descanso, muy cerca del casco antiguo de la Cartagena colonial. Una experiencia inolvidable en el caribe.

La Estancia en el Apartamento 1002,  sera extraordinaria, muy cómoda, una vista espectacular para pasar tardes de descanso y relax. Pasear por la ciudad amurallada, Comida Nacional e  Internacional, bares, show callejeros, visitar  el famoso Castillo de San Felipe y la Popa, harán de tus vacaciones toda una experiencia. 
En la playa encontraras ofertas múltiples para visitar las bellas islas del Rosario, Tierra Bomba y Barú. Así como toda una oferta de deportes náuticos, jetsky, gusano,etc.

Durante la Estancia se pueden comunicar con Gonzalo Esguerra  o Adriana Pulido

El Barrio el Laguito es uno de los mas iconos de Cartagena, se destaca el lago por el cual lleva su nombre, que rodea el mar caribe, alli pueden encontrar a 5 minutos, Restaurantes de talla Internacional, supermercados, dos zonas de Playas, La Ciudad Antigua se ubica a 15 minutos en carro o 45 minutos caminando, el aeropuerto a 15 minutos, Paseos en Chiva, Bancos cajeros, el barrio Gestsemani y sus murales lo más antiguo de la ciudad.

Se puede conseguir transporte de servicio publico muy fácil, rutas para caminar por las playas de Boca Grande, Castillo Grande,el Laguito sitio precioso la Avenida San Martin donde podrá conseguir todo tipo de artículos que necesita, adicional mente la ciudad tiene el bus turístico rojo de dos pisos, cuyo paradero se encuentra al frente de la puerta del edificio

1. Las visitas y/o visitantes están permitidas por reglamento interno del edificio Poseidon del Caribe hasta las 11:00 pm.
2. A la llegada al edificio deben cancelar en la administración $25.000 por el grupo completo correspondiente a la orden de registro y manillas.
3. En temporada alta entre Diciembre 20 del 2020 hasta Enero 12 del 2021 el mínimo de noches a reservar es de 4.

description:
Beautiful and luminous one bedroom apartment with all amenities, great view and the best location in Cartagena. This unit has one bathroom and a kitchen. It also includes Air Conditioner, TV, Internet, bed sheets and towels. Close to the most iconic places in the city, beaches and easy access to transportation. This place is perfect for couples, business travelers and families with kids. 

Registro Nacional de Turismo (RNT) No. 41594

This apartment is completely independent, you will not share it with anyone. It has a queen size bed, one single bed and also a very comfortable single bed under it. The bathroom is completely equipped as well as the kitchen. You will find a fridge, microwave, blender, crockery, pots and cutlery. If you come with a baby please let me know and we will leave a baby crib. There is also free parking if you bring your vehicle. The building has 24 hours concierge/security service.

You will have access to the pool, jacuzzi, gym and sauna of the building. There is free parking and exclusive WiFi for the apartment.

I like to communicate with my guests before and during their stay. I will be available to help them with any question or recommendation they need. Call me or text me any time you need.

This place is located right in the heart of El Laguito, which is a touristic and safe area. You will find plenty of amazing restaurants which serve authentic Colombian food and also international food. It is also close to supermarkets, ATM machines, coffee shops and pharmacies. Best beaches of Cartagena are all around this neighborhood. The old city and airport are just 10 and 20 min by taxi respectively.

We recommend to take Taxi or Uber. Ask the price before taking a Taxi.

Airport is 20 minutes away by taxi (approximately $6 US Dollars).

Old City is just 5 minutes by taxi (approximately $3 US Dollars).

You will find some water at the fridge, coffee, soap and toilet paper for one day. Once you have settled in the apartment, you can do your shopping.

If you need additional cleaning services please inform, there is an extra charge of $12 US Dollars.

If you need parking, you must inform before your arrival. It has no additional cost.

Upon arrival, guests must show their ID to the building staff and pay 6.000 pesos (around $1.5 US Dollars) per person as this building is located in a touristic area. This has to be paid just once.

Whenever you leave the apartment, make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, lights and close the windows. 5. Please limit the noise. After 22:00 it is prohibited to play loud music. 6. Smoking is prohibited. 7. No drugs or prostitution. 8. Visitors are not allowed. 9. It is not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. 10. If you are not satisfied with something of the apartment, you must inform it immediately. We can fix it in the shortest possible time. 11. If you break something of the apartment or building, you must pay for that. 12. We are not responsable for any loss of personal belongings or accidents in the apartment. 13. All other rules of the building or local policies must be respected.  Español:  1. No se permiten drogas o prostitución en el apartamento. 8. No se permiten invitados en el apartamento. 9. Si algún huésped daña algo del apartamento o edificio, deberán pagar antes del check out. 12. No somos responsables por pérdidas de objetos personales o accidentes al interior del apartamento. 13. description:
Cartagena´s northern zone is quiet but with the perfect location when arriving by air, close to Las Americas Convention Center and only 7 minutes away from the old city.

Pool / beach / steam bath / swamp view.

The place has a Cartagenian colonial decoration 

An exclusive complex that has a modern architecture and glassy look, located at the northern zone of Cartagena. It has an extra-large swimming pool with an infinite panoramic view, a turkish bath, and air conditioned reception room with ocean view, two elevators, BBQ set, power generator with full coverage and comfortable social areas.

This is the new place to go in Cartagena, isolated from traffic, close to important hotels like Radisson, Las Americas and Holiday Inn Morros.

Business trip: If you are going to Las Américas Convention Center this is the perfect location: 5 minutes walk.

The building has ocean view on the front and a beautiful nature's reserve on the back.

If you go to the beach, take a nice walk heading north and if you like nautical sports you can rent jet skis, kayaks,  kitesurfs etc.

- Ocean view terrace
- Pool (Tuesday open until 2pm and Wednesday close for maintenance)
- Turkish bath
- Minimarket
- Safe box
- Restaurants near you: Las Americas beach restaurant, Sushi Garden (Morros 922), Hotel Holiday Inn Morros, 
- Minimarket: First floor of the building.

I would recommend guests my favorite restaurants and bars, and any ideas / deals to try in Cartagena.

Here are some recommended plans for Cartagena:
1. Hire a motor-boat to visit amazing beaches and islands: https://es.airbnb.com/rooms/1897892
2. Visit San Felipe's Castle which is the largest Colonial Spanish Fort in Colombia and an outstanding example of military engineering from the Colonial Period.  It was originally built between 1639 and 1657 and later enlarged in 1762. There is an incredible view of the city on the top of the Fort.  If you are coming to Cartagena this is a must see!
3. In the old city I like San Pedro restaurant because of the atmosphere if you sit outside in front of the old San Pedro Claver Cathedral. Make sure they give you a nice table outside. They are very good with reservations and have staff that speak English well.
4. If you want to relax and feel the breeze from the sea while tasting a martini/margarita, Cafe del Mar is the place to go.

You are just 5 minutes away from the Rafael Nuñez airport and 10 minutes away from the Colonial Walled City.

Take a taxi for 6-7 USD to the old city

City highlights
Centenario Park: Build to commemorate 1 century of freedom from the Spaniards, is a park of republican style remodeled in 2013, full of green zones.

Bazurto social Club: Authentic caribbean rhythms and popular Cartagenian culture / music / decoration.

Café Havana: Traditional cartagenian bar great for Mojitos and Salsa.

Media Luna Bar: Every Wednesday of the year go for the Visa for a Dream party, live music, backpackers favorite place.

It was originally built between 1639 and 1657 and later enlarged in 1762. There is an incredible view of the city on the top of the Fort.  If you are coming to Cartagena this is a must see!
3. In the old city I like San Pedro restaurant because of the atmosphere if you sit outside in front of the old San Pedro Claver Cathedral. Make sure they give you a nice table outside. They are very good with reservations and have staff that speak English well.

1. No pets. Mascotas prohibidas.

2. No parties. No se permiten fiestas.

3. Follow pool and building rules. Reglas de la copropiedad y la piscina deben seguirse, es a potestad de la administración la variación de las reglas.

4. When you come back from the beach wash your feet in the parking lot outside the building or use the shower near the pool to remove the sand.

5. If you want to use the turkish bath, ask the pool guy to turn it on.

6. Smoking is prohibited.

7.  Leave the safe box open. Locate the rest button by the door and keep it pressed for 5 seconds.

8. Cleaning is mandatory every Monday or Tuesday at 8:30 AM.

9. Take care of the place :)

name: Studio in Awesome Location. Amazing Pool + Jacuzzi
summary:
Pool and Jacuzzi terrace NOW OPEN 9/2020!
Absolute amazing location- our studio has everything you need for an unforgettable stay in Cartagena. Small kitchen with all supplies just in case you want to cook, great size bathroom- but more than anything you will be able to walk everywhere absorbing Cartagena's greatness. Access to amazing terrace with jacuzzi and beautiful pool on the first floor;)
amenities: Elevator,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Portable fans,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Conditioner,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard
description:
Pool and Jacuzzi terrace NOW OPEN 9/2020!
Absolute amazing location- our studio has everything you need for an unforgettable stay in Cartagena. Small kitchen with all supplies just in case you want to cook, great size bathroom- but more than anything you will be able to walk everywhere absorbing Cartagena's greatness. Access to amazing terrace with jacuzzi and beautiful pool on the first floor;)

Our studio is in one of the best buildings inside the old city- with incredible location at only 1 block from the cathedral and all the great shops and restaurantes Cartagena has to offer.  It is really such a pleasure to walk everywhere and just be immersed in the carribean culture of the city. Our studio is small, with open kitchen and a bathroom- but what is impressive is that you will have access to an amazing jacuzzi in the top floor terrace where you can relax and see the bell towers of the cathedral, the Iglesia de Santo Toribio and the Iglesia de Santo Domingo. Also did we mention a pool on the first floor?

Access to rooftop Terrace with jacuzzi.
Two beds for friends (or join them for couples).
Potent A/C (you will need this for the heat jaja)
2 fans.
Kitchenette with most utilities.
Separate room with washer and dryer free for all residents.
Pool. 
Cool Hosts in the city just in case you need recomendations.
Wifi.
Hot Water.
Cable TV.
Doorman 24H.
The leather book (inside guide from us and many guests for the small secrets cartagena has to offer).

Always available, ask any question or recommendation and we will be happy to answer. We live in the City so it’s easy for us.

We are a block from the cathedral. Walk to the right and you will find the cutest bookstore called ábaco. It has good coffee too. In front of that is mila- a really nice bakery that offers breakfast and great brownies. Walk to the right and you have the cathedral- it’s magestic plaza and the parque bolivar (more like a square park) where locals play music and dance to have a show for the tourists. There’s always fruits in the street and oh so much color. But before you arrive check out san alberto- another coffee shop that brings their coffee from their own farm. It’s great!
Two blocks away in calle del colegio is my favorite restaurant called maria (it’s so good- a little fancy but relaxed but great food!). Beside it is a really cool bar with a terrace called alquimico (great infused rum) and in front the cool place to dance called la movida. You can also start your night in varadero (amazing live salsa every night)-about three blocks away- with great ceviches and fishes. 
Another way to go is pass the cathedral and see the sunset from plaza San Pedro (love sitting in the plaza, specially in a place called el baron) with great drinks and tapas (their sandwiches and octopus are so yummy!) and just be in the city. Get lost there (it’s not as big as you initiallly think). With all its magic and Carribean energy this city is such a pleasure to be in. Welcome to cartagena!!!!

The best way to get around the old city is walking. Walk everywhere! You really don’t need a car. 

If you bring a car- there is a parking lot outside the old city, near the hotel santa Teresa. They have daily and weekly rates.

To get to the apartment from the airport get a cab or Uber (works great here). It’s about 7usd and a 10min ride. You can find our building as edificio ayos in google maps- in front of hotel delirio.  Have fun!!!

No outside guests allowed in building.

You can reserve time for the terrace and jacuzzi from 8am to 8:00pm in two hour intervals with door man.

Pool and laundry service is open for everyone anytime and it's free.

Have fun in wonderful Cartagena!
interaction: Always available, ask any question or recommendation and we will be happy to answer. We live in the City so it’s easy for us.
access:
Access to rooftop Terrace with jacuzzi.
Two beds for friends (or join them for couples).
Potent A/C (you will need this for the heat jaja)
2 fans.
Kitchenette with most utilities.
Separate room with washer and dryer free for all residents.
Pool. 
Cool Hosts in the city just in case you need recomendations.
Wifi.
Hot Water.
Cable TV.
Doorman 24H.
The leather book (inside guide from us and many guests for the small secrets cartagena has to offer).
transit:
The best way to get around the old city is walking. Walk everywhere! You really don’t need a car. 

If you bring a car- there is a parking lot outside the old city, near the hotel santa Teresa. They have daily and weekly rates.

To get to the apartment from the airport get a cab or Uber (works great here). It’s about 7usd and a 10min ride. You can find our building as edificio ayos in google maps- in front of hotel delirio.  Have fun!!!

name: ✦ Gorgeous and Bright 2BD/2BR Apt in Old Town✦
summary:
Relax and enjoy the best the city has to offer in this Old Town recently restored apartment, located right next to Bovedas, Take a scenic walk through the historic and Colonial center of Cartagena, 3 minutes from Plaza San Diego and all the hippest restaurants, bars and rooftops.

Imported tiles, vintage furnishings, and exposed brick walls create a modern yet Colonial feel. This is the perfect place to relax and dip into the Caribbean vibe.

Relax and enjoy the best the city has to offer in this Old Town recently restored apartment, located right next to Bovedas, Take a scenic walk through the historic and Colonial center of Cartagena, 3 minutes from Plaza San Diego and all the hippest restaurants, bars and rooftops.

Imported tiles, vintage furnishings, and exposed brick walls create a modern yet Colonial feel. This is the perfect place to relax and dip into the Caribbean vibe.

- 2 bedrooms with A/C 
- 2 bathrooms
- Living room with TV, sofa bed and A/C
- Fully Equipped Kitchen
- Washing Machine and Dryer
- Bed Linens
- Towels
- 2 Balconies
- Hair Dryer
- Washing/Drying Machine

- The guests can enjoy nice green common areas
- This is an extremely safe 24-hour doorman building.

I'd be more to help you out with any tips and recommendations!

"this destination impresses with its 18th-century walled city, its candy-colored collection of old colonial homes and soaring clock tower and its maze of cobblestoned streets that weave through the historically significant forts, buildings and churches."
Forbes Travel Guide

"este destino impresiona con su ciudad amurallada del siglo XVIII, su colección de color caramelo de antiguas casas coloniales y su torre de reloj y su laberinto de calles empedradas que se mueven a través de las fortalezas, edificios e iglesias de importancia histórica". Guía de viaje de Forbes "El casco antiguo de Cartagena es un sitio declarado Patrimonio de la Humanidad por la Unesco, un laberinto de callejuelas empedradas, balcones cubiertos de buganvillas e iglesias masivas que proyectan sus sombras a través de plazas frondosas". Precioso planeta
translated by (Hidden by Airbnb) 
"Cartagena's Old Town is a Unesco World Heritage site – a maze of cobbled alleys, balconies covered in bougainvillea, and massive churches that cast their shadows across leafy plazas."
Lovely Planet

The apartment is located within walking distance of all major museums, plazas, bars, restaurants and nightclubs. If you're willing to use public transportation, there's a Transcaribe station one block away.

If you want to hail a cab keep in mind to haggle before starting the ride, these are recommended tariffs:

- Taxi fare from the Airport $4.5 usd
- Taxi fare from Boquilla Beach $6 usd
- Taxi fare from Boca Grande $6 usd

*Please keep in mind you can use Uber here in Cartagena, I strongly recommend it since the service is great and it's relatively cheap.

***No escorts or additional guests allowed in the apartment***
*HOT WATER
*High-speed Wifi
*TV with Cable

name: Morros 3, condominio Cartagena de indias, Colombia
summary: Disfruta del encanto de Cartagena en alojamiento frente al mar, piscinas,con salida directa a la playa y todas las demás comodidades del edificio morros 3.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Gym,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Room-darkening shades,Portable fans,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Rice maker,Stove,Beachfront,Patio or balcony,Free street parking,Single level home,Cleaning before checkout,Long term stays allowed
description:
Disfruta del encanto de Cartagena en alojamiento frente al mar, piscinas,con salida directa a la playa y todas las demás comodidades del edificio morros 3.

Apartamento de un cuarto, sala , cocina abierta y un amplió balcón con vista a la cienaga de la virgen.
cuenta con aires acondicionados y ventanas acusticas que aminoran el ruido del exterior.

piscinas 4, jacuzzi, sauna, turco gimnasio, parqueadero, privado.

Siempre con disponibilidad para atender sus dudas, preguntas e inquietudes con mucho gusto.

Es de las zonas de cartagena más cotizadas, ya que por su ubicación estás a poco menos de 12 minutos del casco antiguo o zona amurallada, a cinco minutos del aeropuerto, y al frente del mar.

El condominio está a cinco minutos del aeropuerto, y de doce a quince minutos de la zona amurallada o casco antiguo, por casi cualquier medio de transporte.

Imperdible el levantarse temprano para caminar o trotar por toda la playa, y luego tomar un baño relajante en cualquiera de las piscinas con que cuenta la propiedad.

name: Maravilloso apartamento en cartagena - bocagrande
summary: Nuevo apartamento en zona exclusiva de Cartagena, en bocagrande,   a 1.9 kilómetros del centro histórico, 10 minutos del aeropuerto,  ubicado frente a la playa, con maravillosa vista al mar, cerca a supermercados, bares, restaurantes . El edificio cuenta con tres piscinas climatizadas una de ellas en el piso 40, lo que permite una hermosa vista a la ciudad y al mar, ideal para tomar una dias de descanso y placer
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Keypad,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Patio or balcony,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
Nuevo apartamento en zona exclusiva de Cartagena, en bocagrande,   a 1.9 kilómetros del centro histórico, 10 minutos del aeropuerto,  ubicado frente a la playa, con maravillosa vista al mar, cerca a supermercados, bares, restaurantes . El edificio cuenta con tres piscinas climatizadas una de ellas en el piso 40, lo que permite una hermosa vista a la ciudad y al mar, ideal para tomar una dias de descanso y placer

El apartamento cuenta con vista al mar por todas sus ventanas

Los huéspedes pueden disfrutar de tres piscinas , 2 de ellas en el piso 3 una de propulsión para hidromasaje, y otra panoramica en el piso 40. También pueden disfrutar de una Zona de spa, turco y Jacuzzi. 
El apartamento cuenta con todo el menaje de cocina cafetera, licuadora, maquina para sándwiches, horno.

Estoy disponible para ayudar en lo que necesiten los huéspedes, vía telefónica, por mensaje de texto  o por correo electrónico las 24 horas del día.

El vecindario es perfecto por qué cuenta con restaurantes, centros comerciales, bares , almacenes y cine a menos de 40 metros. Es una zona muy segura y exclusiva de Cartagena

El apto cuenta con parqueadero privado por si los huéspedes cuentan con vehículo, es fácil llegar en taxi desde el aeropuerto, como la zona es segura se puede. Desplazar caminando a muchos sitios de interes

protocolo de limpieza avanzado: 

Sigo el Protocolo de Limpieza Avanzada de Airbnb, que está basado en las recomendaciones de los expertos. Estas son algunas de las principales medidas que tomo al limpiar mi espacio:

Desinfecto las superficies de contacto frecuente, incluidos los pomos de las puertas.
Utilizo productos y desinfectantes homologados por las autoridades sanitarias internacionales, y me protejo mientras limpio para evitar la contaminación cruzada.
Limpio todas las habitaciones siguiendo las listas de tareas específicas para cada una de ellas.
Proporciono productos de limpieza adicionales por si necesitas limpiar durante la estancia.
Cumplo con las leyes locales, incluidas todas las directrices de seguridad o limpieza.

Espectacular apartamento en la Zona Norte turística de Cartagena. Apartamento de 1 alcoba Sala comedor, cocina y 2 baños.Balcón con vista al mar y a las piscinas. Edificio con 3 piscinas, Jacuzzi, gimnasio, baño turco, vigilancia privada 24 horas y salida directa a la playa. Apartamento  dotado con sabanas y toallas de ducha y de playa, aire acondicionado en alcoba y sala. Internet WiFi, calentador de agua, área de labores con lavadora y secadora. Ideal para Familias y grupo de trabajo.

Apartamento ubicado en piso 8 del edificio Morros 3  desde donde podrás disfrutar de una vista espectacular al mar y a las piscinas. El apartamento cuenta  con todas las comodidades para alojar hasta 4 personas. 1 habitación con cama King size y una cama sencilla, sala con 2 sofá camas, aire acondicionado, TV cable, internet WiFi,  2 baños completos, calentador de agua, aire acondicionado, 2  TV  con cable cable, cocina con todos los electrodomésticos, área de labores con lavadora y secadora.  El edificio tiene 3 piscinas, jacuzzi, gimnasio baño turco y salida directa a la playa,  ambiente  con espacios abiertos frente al mar. ideal para familias con niños, parejas o grupos de trabajo.

Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio.  Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio cuando lleguen sólo deben presenta su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio.  El apartamento cuenta con cerradura digital. Deberán portar la  manilla  durante su estadía así podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin problema, lo hacemos por seguridad en el Edificio.  Igualmente debo informar que no se aceptan visitantes.  En caso de tener algún visitante durante su estadía por favor enviar los datos de la o las personas antes de su llegada con nombre y número de cédula. El Edificio cuenta con 3  piscinas, jacuzzi, baño turco, gimnasio y salida directa a la playa. Nuestros huéspedes podrán disfrutar de estas zonas en las horas establecidas por el reglamento del edificio que es De 9 am a 7pm

Estamos atentos 24 horas para atender cualquier requerimiento de nuestros huéspedes. Nuestro equipo de atención al huéspedes responderá cualquier requerimiento.

La zona norte es la zona turística de mayor proyección de la ciudad.

Nuestros huéspedes pueden decirle al conductor que los lleve al edificio morros en la zona norte. Así llega fácilmente.

El edificio está ubicado el la zona norte de la ciudad.  Comparte la misma línea de playa de algunos de los hoteles más prestigiosos.

name: Cartagena Ocean Drive Paradise
summary: Brand new, amazing ocean view 2 bedroom apartment. Great amenities and walking distance to the airport and beach. Enjoy Cartagena while staying in this affordable, safe, and conveniently located apartment.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Free street parking,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Host greets you,Patio or balcony,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm
description:
Brand new, amazing ocean view 2 bedroom apartment. Great amenities and walking distance to the airport and beach. Enjoy Cartagena while staying in this affordable, safe, and conveniently located apartment.

*(Español Abajo)

This beautiful Cartagena oceanfront condo is located in the brand-new Ocean Drive building within the Crespo neighborhood, a very safe residential area. The Ocean Drive building has many excellent amenities, including a rooftop infinity pool, jacuzzi, sauna and sundeck with 360-views. There is also a gym, parking garage and two elevators. The lobby has a doorman 24/7 for added security and convenience.

This well-appointed condo features 2 ocean-view bedrooms, gorgeous living/dining area, 2.5 bathrooms, fully-equipped kitchen, generous balcony and can comfortably accommodate up to 6 people. The master bedroom has a queen bed with full bathroom and Smart TV. The second bedroom has two full beds, which can be placed together a as a king bed, and a second full bathroom. The bright living room is fully furnished and includes a futon couch, which converts into a bed and Smart TV. The kitchen is well-equipped with pots, pans, dishes, cutlery, cups, wine glasses, refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffee maker, blender and 6-person dining table. There is a large ocean-facing balcony accessible from the living room and master bedroom, with a hammock and chairs to relax and enjoy the gorgeous views. Here you will enjoy all the comforts of home, including Wi-Fi, A/C, washing machine/clothes dryer and extra sheets, towels and beach towels. The entire condo will be thoroughly sanitized prior to each arrival.

The building is conveniently located within a 5-minute drive from the Cartagena Airport (CTG). There is a beach 2 blocks from the building, or you can walk/bike on the newly paved path 10 minutes to Playa Azul La Boquilla, one of Cartagena’s best beaches, next to the Las Americas Hotel. Several convenience stores, restaurants and pharmacies are also located within walking distance. The Old Town of Cartagena is 15 minutes by car, and the Doorman can call a safe taxi for you.

As a Colombia tourism expert, the condo owner, Camilo will be more than happy to help with recommendations to make your Cartagena stay unforgettable!
_____________________________________________________________

Este hermoso condominio frente al mar en Cartagena está ubicado en el nuevo edificio Ocean Drive dentro del vecindario Crespo, una zona residencial muy segura. El edificio Ocean Drive incluye una piscina infinita en la azotea, jacuzzi, sauna y terraza con vistas de 360 ​​grados. También hay un gimnasio, estacionamiento y dos ascensores. El vestíbulo tiene portero las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana para mayor seguridad y conveniencia.

Este condominio bien equipado cuenta con 2 habitaciones con vista al mar, hermosa sala de estar + comedor, 2.5 baños, cocina totalmente equipada, balcón generoso y puede alojar cómodamente hasta 6 personas. El dormitorio principal tiene una cama queen con baño completo y Smart TV. El segundo dormitorio tiene dos camas dobles, que se pueden colocar juntas como una cama king, y un segundo baño completo. 

La luminosa sala de estar está completamente amoblada e incluye un sofá futón, que se convierte en cama y Smart TV. La cocina está bien equipada con ollas, sartenes, platos, cubiertos, tazas, copas de vino, refrigerador, estufa, microondas, cafetera, licuadora y mesa de comedor para 6 personas. 

Cuenta con un gran balcón muy espacioso con vista al mar accesible desde la sala de estar y el dormitorio principal, con una hamaca y sillas para relajarse y disfrutar de las hermosas vistasd elmar Caribe. Aquí podrá disfrutar de todas las comodidades del hogar, incluyendo Internet Wi-Fi, Aire Acondicionado, lavadora / secadora, sábanas, toallas y toallas de playa adicionales. 

El Apartamento se desinfectará a fondo antes de cada llegada.

El edificio está convenientemente ubicado a 5 minutos en automovil del Aeropuerto de Cartagena (CTG). Hay una playa a 2 cuadras del edificio, o puede caminar o andar en bicicleta por la biciruta donde encontrara a 10 minutos la Playa Azul La Boquilla, una de las mejores playas de Cartagena, junto al Hotel Las Américas.  Tambien muy cerca hay varias tiendas, restaurantes. El casco antiguo de Cartagena se encuentra a 15 minutos en coche y el portero puede llamar a un taxi seguro.

Como experto en turismo de Colombia, el propietario del apartamento, estará más que feliz de ayudar con recomendaciones para que su estadía en Cartagena sea inolvidable.

Im available via text or email to help you and recommend anything from a restaurant to a tour, as well as to solve anything with the property. I want to make sure you enjoy your stay in Cartagena so Im available to help you anytime.

Crespo is a safe and quiet residential neighborhood. Ocean Drive is 10 blocks from the airport, there are a couple of convenience stores and restaurants within walking distance. The beach at Las Americas Hotel is 10 minutes walking distance and is one if the nicest beaches in the city. There is a paved bike path next to the building

The building is 10 blocks from the airport, you could walk there. Taxis are the easiest and most inexpensive way to move around. From the airport the taxi will charge an airport fee which will make it a bit more expensive than normal, but its still only about 5 dollars. At the Building the doorman can call a taxi for you, and it takes about 15 minutes to get to the old town. There is a small convenience store 1 block away, and in a 10 block radius there are other convenience stores, restaurants, pharmacy. 
Just outside the building there is a bike path. 
To go to the beach you walk north until you find a pedestrian bridge, cross it and you are at the beach. Its a 10 minute walk.

The beach at Las Americas Hotel is 10 minutes walking distance and is one if the nicest beaches in the city. There is a paved bike path next to the building

We look forward to hosting you!

description:
Perfect 1 bedroom apartment in the 19th floor of one of the newest, most representative buildings in Cartagena. Has a living room, 1.5 bathrooms, kitchen, and a balcony with a spectacular view over the Cartagena bay. 
Perfect for a couple vacation or a business trip. Apt is suitable for 1 - 4 guests maximum. 
We look forward to hosting you!

It's one of the most beautiful, elegant and perfectly located buildings in Cartagena. Everything in the apartment is completely new and thought especially to make your stay here perfect!
The main bedroom has a king bed fully convertible to 2 single beds in case you wish to separate them. In the living room there is a queen size sofa bed perfectly confortable for two people.
You will love staying here!

The apartment has: Full equipped kitchen, washer/dryer, towels, sheets, and very nice carefully selected furniture.
Only the guests registered in the reservation are allowed in the building.  No extra visitors are allowed
The pool is open but to attend you must first make a reservation. When you book the apartment please let me know what time and day you would like to go to the pool in order for me to book.

I have staff that helps me with everything in Cartagena. So you can call me or write me and I'll send someone to check in case you need help with anything.

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 7-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

When you register you will be given a bracelet. Please do not remove this.
Only people registered in the apartment will be the ones allowed in the building. To register someone you must send me full names 24 hours before arrival. Max 4 people in total. No additional visitors are allowed

additional_house_rules:
-VERY IMPORTANT: For all guests staying at this listing please send full names/document number/document type/nationality/date of birth (Colombia’s authorities requirement) // MUY IMPORTANTE: Para todos los huéspedes que se hospeden en este apartamento por favor enviar nombres completos/número de documentos/tipo de documento/nacionalidad/fecha nacimiento (requerimiento de la policía colombiana)  
-NO VISITORS ALLOWED (building's STRICT rule) // NO SE ADMITEN INVITADOS (regla ESTRICTA del edificio)  
-Full names and passport/ID number of all guests must be sent or changed at least 24 hours before check-in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres completos de todos los huéspedes y el número de documento con el que viaja (ID/pasaporte) deben ser enviados o cambiados al menos 24 horas antes del check-in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Unregistered names won’t be allowed in until next day of check in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres que no estén registrados no podrán ingresar sino hasta el día siguiente del check in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Strict maximum number of guests for this apartment is 4 people (toddlers and/or underage kids count as persons as well) // El número máximo estricto de huéspedes de este apartamento es 4 personas (los bebes y/o menores de edad cuentan también como personas)  
-It is compulsory to have your ID to register at the front desk of the building to be granted access even for kids and toddlers // Es indispensable la presentación de documentos de identificación de cada uno de los huéspedes para el registro de acceso al edificio incluso para niños y bebés 
-Both at check in and check out an inventory checklist will be performed // Se hará inventario de check in y check out de los elementos del apartamento 
-You will be charged EVERY broken item // Se cobrarán TODOS los elementos rotos 
-When you register at the building you are going to be given a free bracelet that you have to wear during all your stay, if you take it off you will be charged 10.000COP for a new one // Al registrarte en el edificio te pondrán una manilla sin costo que debes llevar puesta durante toda tu estadía, si te la quitas debes pagar 10.000COP por una nueva  
-Last names of guests under 18 must match with those of adults (checked at reception) // Los apellidos de menores de edad deben coincidir con los de los adultos 
- If interested in daily cleaning, please specify in advance. A daily cleaning charge of 50.000COP per day will apply // Si se necesita aseo diario solicitarlo con antelación. Costo de 50.000 por día
-You will be given 2 towels per guest // Se entregan 2 toallas por huésped
-It is TOTALLY forbidden any form of prostitution involving children and/or teenagers (Law 679 of 2001) // Se prohibe ESTRICTAMENTE cualquier forma de prostitución contra niños y/o adolescentes (Ley 679 del 2001) 
-If you cannot respect these rules please do not book

I hate rules too !
interaction: Upon arrival I will make sure everything is perfect for your stay, me and my staff will be at your entire disposition 24/7

It is right on the beach. It is not a manicured beach, has a tropical flavor. The apartment is at  Le Soleil building, a five floors building. Spacious, 2100 sq ft, and very comfortable with incredible 360º views. Air conditioning in every room. 
One parking space. Wi-Fi. Swimming pool and Jacuzzi. The ideal place to enjoy the sea, the beach, and watersports. 
In this neighborhood is where the artisan fishermen live. You can eat at their humble eateries fresh fish with coconut rice. The tourism development has made of this neighborhood a mix of the new and the old ways of life. You will find normal constructions and in between them humble lodgings (See it on Street View).  You can enjoy a relaxed day at the beach and then in 15 minutes on a taxi or” Uber”, you will be at the center of the Old City having a great night.

Swimming Pool on the first floor and the Jacuzzi on the roof

Prior to your arrival, let us know if you need anything. We will buy it for you.
We will recommend the best and most economical tours in town

La Boquilla is where the artisan fishermen have traditionally lived.

There are taxis, Uber, and bus service.
The standard fare during the day is around 15.000 Colombian Pesos
