name: Unique Sunset View Apartment, Palmetto Sunset
summary: In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, TV'S and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Ethernet connection,Hot water,Paid parking off premises,Single level home,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Lake access,Waterfront,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, TV'S and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 66 sqm and can accommodate up to 4 persons with its 1 bedroom(s), floor mattress* and bed sofa in the living room. Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and parking in the buildings garage*. The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling where you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area, the comfy sofa & TV. The apartment has 2 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing sea view! This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". 
*Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. The building is very modern, has two unique pools, one on the main floor along the ocean and one on the rooftop where you also find the Jacuzzi (on the 43rd floor). There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking, gym and three elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don´t hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, just beside the main entrance where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
 
2. BUILDING FEE: 10,000 COP (approx. $2,90 USD) per person & has to be payed to the building, you pay the fee in my office.

3. WRISTBAND: Palmetto Sunset wristband must be worn over time (for access). Lost or removed wristband will be charged by the building.
 
4. MINORS: Minors must be accompanied by at least one of their parents presenting the minors identification in original. For Colombian minors "registro civil" in original or ID has to be shown and both parents has to be present. If only one parent are present an authorization in written from the parent (not present) has to be shown.

5. PETS: are allowed only if an "emotional support animal" certification can be shown.
 
6. SOCIAL AREAS: 
Pool 1st floor      10:00AM-06:00PM  (Wednesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
Pool 43rd floor  09:00AM-06:00PM (Tuesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
GYM                       07:00AM-06:00PM (Friday 07:00AM-12:00PM)
SAUNA                 09:00AM-06:00PM (Let reception know 15 min before)

7. ENVIRONMENT: At anytime you leave the apartment make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet. Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena S.A.S is authorized to enter at any time and turn them off. It's not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. Please save water and light as much as possible and please take care of your waste and garbage (especially when out in the nature like the beach or if you visit the islands) even if you see locals or other tourist not respecting this.

8. ADDITIONAL SERVICES: Cleaning services or cooking are available upon request for an extra fee, please ask us.

9. PARKING: If you need parking, you must inform us before your arrival.
 
10. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters. 

11. You must inform me immediately if there is something you feel is not fulfilling with the listing details so that we can fix it in the best possible way as soon as possible.
 
12. All the rules of the building and local law must be respected.

13. Read the "Additional rules" before confirm the last step of the reservation.

additional_house_rules:
Strict Rules:
1. Guests must be registered with ID at the entrance of the building.
2. There is an admin fee of 10,000 COP per person that the building charge me, you have to pay this fee in my office in the moment of check in. You can verify this fee when we go over to the building’s lobby during the check in process. 
3. Check out is strictly at 12:00 or before, otherwise, a fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged.
4. Whenever you leave the apartment during your stay, make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet, save water and light as much as possible.
5. Please limit the noise, especially after 22:00. Parties and high noise levels are prohibited, this includes music, TV, high volume conversations.
6. Smoking is prohibited inside the property (except in the balcony). 
7. Non- commercial sexual exploitation of children and adolescents.
8. If you bring visitors you have to register them at the reception, please ask for visiting hours. 
9. It is not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies.
10. If you break something of the apartment or building, you must pay the damages.
11. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. 
12. Minors must be accompanied by a responsible adult; therefore the administration is not responsible for the care of the child. 
13. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters.
14. All other rules of the building, or local policies must be respected.
15. Pets are allowed only if a "emotional support animal" certification can be showed.

Note:  If you are not satisfied with something of the apartment, you must inform me immediately so that we can fix it in the best possible way.

Perfect for family or friends vacation or a business trip. Apt is suitable for 1 - 6 guests maximum. There is a queen bed in the main bedroom, two single beds in other bedroom and a sofabed in the living room. 
Looking forward to hosting you!

Perfect for family or friends vacation or a business trip. Apt is suitable for 1 - 6 guests maximum. There is a queen bed in the main bedroom, two single beds in other bedroom and a sofabed in the living room. 
Looking forward to hosting you!

It's one of the most beautiful, elegant and perfectly located building and apartment in Cartagena. Everything in the apartment is completely new and thought especially to make your stay here perfect! There is a queen bed in the main bedroom and two single beds in the second bedroom. These beds can be joined to form a big bed for two if needed! The apartment if fully equipped.
You will love staying here!

The apartment has: Fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, towels, sheets, iron, hair dryer and very nice carefully selected furniture in the entire apartment.

I have staff that helps me with everything in Cartagena. I'll be always on top of what is happening. So you can call me or write me and I'll send someone to check in case you need help with anything.

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 5-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

Only the people registered in the apartment are the ones allowed in the building. To register someone you must send me full names 24 hours before arrival. This apartment can register maximum 6 people in total INCLUDING BABIES OR KIDS. 6 People is the maximum allowed.

Fully equipped and beautifully decorated you will enjoy your stay in Cartagena.

Located inside the Radisson Ocean Pavillion Hotel - in La Boquilla Sector. Your stay will be like staying in a five star hotel - included with a beautiful lobby, bar, restaurant, gym, pool, gym, hot tub and direct access to the beach. Located on the 11th Floor, with great space (100 mts2 / 1.076 ft2 space). It includes 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a great balcony view. Fully decorated and plenty of space for your enjoyment. The apartment has central A/C independent for each bedroom and living room. It also includes full kitchenware for your use. If you need to do cleaning it also includes a washing machine and dryer.

You can enjoy the full amenities of the hotel, this includes: - 1st Floor/Lobby bar, restaurant, pool - 10th Floor gym, and hot tub.
Near the hotel you will have direct access to the beach, aquatic sports, nice tropical restaurant (500 meters away).

Note: the list price does not include any consumption at the Hotel. You will have to pay them at the end of your stay

Always available on the phone for guidance.
I will always have someone to do the checkin and checkout. The checkin and checkout can be done only at daylight - but we can arrange a next day checkin if you arrive at night time

La Boquilla is one of the nicest sector in Cartagena. With a beautiful beach and a really nice neighborhood with really nice looking buildings. This is the best place for practicing aquatic sports like kite surfing and jet-ski. The Old City of Cartagena in only 10 minutes away in taxi in which you can enjoy one of the most romantic places in Colombia

The Old City of Cartagena and the Airport is only 10 minutes away form the Apartment. You can request a taxi from the Hotel or you can use your smartphone to call a taxi (install EasyTaxi App). Normally all taxi cost from 6 USD to 8 USD. Always try to bargain the prices - don't be afraid is normal in Cartagena to bargain.

Todo menor de edad  debe presentar su documento de identificación en original (tarjeta de identidad, registro civil de nacimiento o el documento que haga sus veces), de no presentarse al momento del registro, no se permitirá su ingreso a la copropiedad.
Si el menor no viene acompañado de sus padres, deberá presentar permiso de sus padres otorgado al adulto responsable que lo acompañe con fecha vigente del viaje y debidamente autenticado; de no presentarse este documento al momento del registro, no se permitirá su ingreso a la copropiedad. 
En caso de que los huéspedes no sean  nacionales y su país de origen no les exija viajar a los  niños con el permiso escrito de sus padres, se solicitará  al ingreso la presentación original de su documento de identificación.

summary: This apartment has everything you could need outside, in the neighborhood there are many local corner stores, drugstores and a variety of restaurants to choose and it is just a  ten minutes from the old city, it is safe and quiet at night. the apartment comes with a great view in the balcony you can see the sea in the principal room and you can hear the waves as you sleep at night, see the sunrise and the sun going down and fresh air throught the apartment.

Los huéspedes tendrán a disposición un televisor 55 pulgadas con televisión satelital,equipo de sonido y aire acondicionado.
Dormirán en una cama 2x2 escuchando el mar todo el tiempo.Es una muy buena terapia!..
La cocina tiene una barra en granito de 6 metros de largo ,nevera doble puerta,cafetera,Sanduchera ,licuadora ultimo modelo y todas las herramientas necesarias para poder cocinar deliciosos platos.
El cuarto frente a la cocina es muy fresco y acogedor ,tiene cama doble balinesa y baño privado.
La sala tiene un Tamaño de más o meno 50 metros cuadrados con una gran mesa en vidrio templado y un cómodo sofá cama .El balcón tiene mesa de comida ,poltronas y optima iluminación.El cuarto de aseo tiene lavadora whirpool último modelo y todos los complementos de limpieza.
El apartamento se presta para largas estadías ,es muy fresco y tranquilo ,tiene wifi y televisión satelital.

Los huéspedes serán Atendidos por mi o por la señora que cuida el apartamento;Carmen estará atenta a sus necesidades y queriendo  podrán disponer de limpieza diaria.
Se presta también servicio de recogida en aeropuerto,Uber y tour turístico.
Alquiler de lanchas ,yates,motos de agua y equipos para deportes acuáticos

El barrio se llama el laguito , hay diferentes restaurantes ,bares para cada gusto , frente al edificio queda el supermercado ÉXITO y alrededor una variedad de joyerías y tiendas de artesanías . Por el lado del mar encontrarás restaurantes donde puedes escoger pescados frescos , detrás del edificio una escuela de surf y windsurf. El barrio es muy seguro de día y de noche, a 50 metros tienes una estación de policía y a tan solo 10 minutos del centro histórico.

Al taxi le dices que vas para bocagrande,zona del laguito por el centro pierino gallo al lado del éxito

summary: Apartamento frente al mar en piso alto con una espectacular vista de 180 grados hacia el océano y hacia la ciudad vieja, ubicado en el moderno y recientemente inaugurado edificio Morros City, estrategicamente ubicado en la medio de Bocagrande, a solo pasos de restaurantes y todo tipo de comercios, cafés, bares, cines, supermercados, droguerías y todo lo que puedan llegar a requerir nuestros huéspedes.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Cooking basics,Building staff,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Waterfront,Smoke alarm
description: Apartamento frente al mar en piso alto con una espectacular vista de 180 grados hacia el océano y hacia la ciudad vieja, ubicado en el moderno y recientemente inaugurado edificio Morros City, estrategicamente ubicado en la medio de Bocagrande, a solo pasos de restaurantes y todo tipo de comercios, cafés, bares, cines, supermercados, droguerías y todo lo que puedan llegar a requerir nuestros huéspedes.
additional_house_rules:
En este apartamento podrán hospedarse un máximo de 4 personas en total, incluyendo adultos y niños.
Al alojamiento solo podrán ingresar las personas que se encuentren registradas como huéspedes del apartamento. El Edificio no admite visitas ni entrada de personas que no se encuentren registradas como huéspedes del alojamiento desde Check In inicial.

Todas las reservaciones deberán enviar los nombres y apellidos de todas las personas que se hospedaran, incluyendo adultos y niños,  con al menos 48 horas de antelación a la fecha de llegada, señalando cuales son adultos y cuales son menores de 18 años. 
Al momento del registro tanto adultos como menores de edad deberán identificarse plenamente, mediante la presentación de su Pasaporte, Cédula de Ciudadanía, y Tarjeta de Identidad o Registro Civil de Nacimiento en caso de ser menor de edad. Los menores de edad edad podrán registrase y hospedarse solo si lo hacen en compañía de al menos uno de sus padres, o mediante la presentación de una autorización para hospedarse con el menor, suscrita y autenticada por sus padres notario publico.
Desde el momento mismo de registro y check in, y durante toda su estadía, los huéspedes deberán portar en su muñeca una manilla de control de acceso que los identifique como huéspedes del edificio.

El edificio por reglamento no permite visitantes. Solo pueden ingresar las personas que están en la lista de huéspedes que solicitamos unos días antes de su llegada. additional_house_rules:
EDIFICIO TURÍSTICO MORROS CITY PROPIEDAD HORIZONTAL
 
 
HORARIOS AUTORIZADOS
 
Piscina y Jacuzzi.
Lunes a viernes de 8:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 9:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
 
Gimnasio y Baño Turco.
 
Lunes a viernes de 6:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 6:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m.
 
NORMAS
 
Está prohibido en la zona social (piscina, jacuzzi, gimnasio y turco):
 
1. Celebrar fiestas, con o sin la presencia de agrupaciones musicales.
2. Llevar o mantener en la zona animales domésticos o mascotas.
3. Usar aparatos de música, excepto dispositivos de audio personal (con audífonos).
4. Correr, patinar, montar bicicleta o triciclo, jugar con pelotas y raquetas.
5. Llevar a cabo actividades que puedan incomodar a las demás personas que se encuentren en el lugar o que puedan ocasionar daños en bienes privados o comunes del edificio.
6. Consumir alimentos, a excepción de mecatos.
7. Usar envases o recipientes de vidrio.
8. Reservar, maltratar, manchar, ensuciar y dañar las sillas, asoleadoras y cojines. Para conservación e higiene de las colchonetas, se deben utilizar toallas sobre estas.
9. Colocar los cojines de las asoleadoras en el piso, meterlos a la piscina o retirarlos de la zona.
10. Retirarse de la zona dejando elementos personales o desechos.
11. Dejar niños solos en la zona. Será absoluta responsabilidad de los padres o adulto responsable del niño, cualquier accidente que les pueda ocurrir por el hecho de dejarlos solos en esta zona.
 
Está igualmente dentro de la piscina:
 
1. Usar la piscina padeciendo enfermedades infectocontagiosas o de lesiones en la piel.
2. Fumar, comer chicle y consumir cualquier clase de alimento o bebida.
3. Bañar a menores con o sin pañales. Para esto deben usarse pañales para piscina.
4. Introducir o jugar con elementos claramente peligrosos.
5. Bañarse sin ducharse previamente o sin retirar del cuerpo aceites, bronceadores, protectores, lociones o similares.
6. En general desplegar cualquier tipo de actividad o conducta que pueda causar incomodidad o perjudicar a los demás bañistas o a los equipos de la piscina.  
 
En la zona social y en el lobby del edificio no se permite fumar.
 
SEGURIDAD
 
1. Los menores de edad SIEMPRE deben estar acompañados de un adulto responsable. No se permite el ingreso de menores de 14 años al gimnasio.
2. Antes de salir del apartamento verifique que las puertas y ventanas se encuentren debidamente cerradas.
3. Al salir de viaje asegúrese de dejar cerrados los registros de agua, gas y baje los tacos eléctricos (sin incluir el de la nevera). El personal de mantenimiento del edificio se encuentra en disposición de realizar el cierre de las llaves de agua y gas cuando se le solicite.  
4. El uso de las manillas es obligatorio tanto para arrendatarios temporales como para los invitados de propietarios y deben ser utilizadas durante toda su estadía en el edificio.
5. Los Conserjes NO se encuentran autorizados para recibir llaves de los apartamentos. En casos excepcionales y sólo por motivos de fuerza mayor se podrán dejar en sobres cerrados, los cuales serán facilitados por los conserjes y deben ser retiradas dentro de las 24 horas siguientes. Los sobres deben ser firmados por la persona que los deja y debe escribirse en estos en nombre de la persona que lo recibirá.
6. Al edificio no se permite el ingreso de vendedores ambulantes.
7. Al dejar su vehículo en el parqueadero de visitantes, asegúrese de no dejar objetos de valor en su interior.
8. Al ingresar al parqueadero interno debe detenerse y bajar el vidrio del vehículo para poder ser identificado plenamente por el Conserje y/o guarda de seguridad.
 
CONVIVENCIA
 
1. No se permitirá el uso de equipos de sonido en el interior de los apartamentos a volúmenes altos que perturben la tranquilidad de los vecinos. (Los Conerjes están autorizados para llamar a la Policía en caso de no atender los requerimientos).
2. No se permiten grupos musicales y/u orquesta dentro de los apartamentos
3. Está prohibido colgar alfombras, ropa, letreros, avisos, carteles y otros elementos similares en las paredes externas, puertas, ventanas, rejas, balcones o áreas comunes.
4. Está prohibido lanzar papeles, colillas de cigarrillos, basura o cualquier otro objeto desde los balcones.
5. Los animales domésticos o mascotas podrán circular (no permanecer) por las áreas comunes del edificio, a excepción de los ascensores, siempre acompañados de un adulto responsable y sujetos con traílla.
6. Los arrendatarios temporales no podrán recibir visitas en su estadía dentro del Edificio.

summary: Apartamento frente al mar en piso alto con una espectacular vista de 180 grados hacia el océano y hacia la ciudad vieja, ubicado en el moderno y  recientemente inaugurado edificio Morros City, estrategicamente ubicado en la medio de Bocagrande, a solo pasos de restaurantes y todo tipo de comercios, cafés, bares, cines, supermercados, droguerías  y todo lo que puedan llegar a requerir nuestros huéspedes.

description: Apartamento frente al mar en piso alto con una espectacular vista de 180 grados hacia el océano y hacia la ciudad vieja, ubicado en el moderno y  recientemente inaugurado edificio Morros City, estrategicamente ubicado en la medio de Bocagrande, a solo pasos de restaurantes y todo tipo de comercios, cafés, bares, cines, supermercados, droguerías  y todo lo que puedan llegar a requerir nuestros huéspedes.
additional_house_rules:
En este apartamento podrán hospedarse un máximo de 4 personas en total, incluyendo adultos y niños.

Al alojamiento solo podrán ingresar las personas que se encuentren registradas como huéspedes del apartamento. El Edificio no admite visitas ni entrada de personas que no se encuentren registradas como huéspedes del alojamiento desde Check In inicial.

Todas las reservaciones deberán enviar los nombres y apellidos de todas las personas que se hospedaran, incluyendo adultos y niños, con al menos 48 horas de antelación a la fecha de llegada, señalando cuales son adultos y cuales son menores de 18 años. 
Al momento del registro tanto adultos como menores de edad deberán identificarse plenamente, mediante la presentación de su Pasaporte, Cédula de Ciudadanía, y Tarjeta de Identidad o Registro Civil de Nacimiento en caso de ser menor de edad. Los menores de edad edad podrán registrase y hospedarse solo si lo hacen en compañía de al menos uno de sus padres, o mediante la presentación de una autorización para hospedarse con el menor, suscrita y autenticada por sus padres notario publico.
Desde el momento mismo de registro y check in, y durante toda su estadía, los huéspedes deberán portar en su muñeca una manilla de control de acceso que los identifique como huéspedes del edificio.

Morros Epic is one of the best buildings in Cartagena. Includes a maid service that can cook for you. Try the "arepa de huevo" ,  it is delicious.

The building has 5 swimming pools, jacuzzi, sauna and a gym. Additional to this,  the building has direct access to the beach and outside there is a small shop where you can buy things for Roxana (The main service) to cook for you. If you go to the beach, you can make a nice travel north and if your like water sports you can rent jet skis on the beach, kayaking and kite surfing.

We will be in contact with you and keep in touch with Roxana  to meet your needs.

The advantage of this neighborhood, is first of all their security, because it has a full service monitored 24 hours a day. It also provides security the fact that is close to important hotels such as the Radisson, Holiday Inn and the Americas Morros. If you want to go to the "Old City-Ciudad murallada" is only 10 minutes by taxi. As if going to the convention center is just 8 minutes. Additional to this, the airport is only 5 minutes by taxi, which is very good.

As for public transport, there is a bus that goes through the main road just in front of the building, and can be perfectly for 1USD  take you to "City Murallada" or other tourist destination.

The apartment has a new wifi, because our guest requested that. Also has a safe-deposit box, for your security. You can put here your money or your value things.

description:
Ubicado en el edificio Morros City en El Barrio de Bocagrande.  Para 4 personas, aire acondicionado en alcoba y sala, balcón con vista al mar y a la ciudad, área de labores con lavadora y secadora. Cuenta con toda la dotación de sabanas y toallas. La Cocina tiene todos los implementos y electrodomésticos necesarios. Cuenta con calentador de agua, internet wifi, plancha.  El edificio tiene piscina, jacuzzi, gimnasio, baño turco y pasando la calle está la playa.  Porteria 24 horas.

El apartamento está ubicado en el piso 17 del edificio Morros City en la ciudad de Cartagena. 1 alcoba con cama king size, internet wifi con 10 MB, TV cable con 260 canales en la alcoba y en la sala.El edificio cuenta piscina, jacuzzi, gimnasio y baño turco ubicados en el piso ocho del edificio. El apartamento cuenta con un parqueadero privado y recepción 24 horas

Nuestros huéspedes pueden disfrutar de las áreas comunes del edificio como el gimnasio, el baño turco, las piscinas y el jacuzzi además de áreas de descanso.

Nuestro personal está a disposición las 24 horas para atender cualquier necesidad de nuestros huéspedes. 
Contamos con una camarera que entregara el apartamento limpio y recibirá el apartamento para limpiarlo. En caso de alguna necesidad estará atenta para resolver cualquier inquietud.

El Barrio de bocagrande está ubicado A cinco minutos de la ciudad amurallada se puede ir en vehículo puedes ir caminando el barrio de boca grande es un barrio turístico donde se encuentran las playas de Bocagrande

En el barrio de bocagrande puedes encontrar restaurantes, bares, centros comerciales, y atractivos para caminar y conocer la ciudad

El edificio por reglamento no permite visitantes. Solo pueden ingresar las personas que están en la lista de huéspedes que solicitamos unos días antes de su llegada. Por favor no insistir en solicitar que otra persona ingrese porque no va a ser posible. Debemos cumplir las normas del edificio y del reglamento de convivencia.
Las normas del edificio no permiten visitantes, solo se autoriza el ingreso a las personas que envían como huéspedes en una lista que se debe enviar un día antes de su llegada.
Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio.  Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio cuando lleguen sólo deben presenta su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio. Deberán portarla durante su estadía así podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin que les tengan que preguntar para dónde van. Lo hacemos por seguridad en el
Edificio.  Igualmente debo informar que no se aceptan visitantes.

additional_house_rules:
EDIFICIO TURÍSTICO MORROS CITY PROPIEDAD HORIZONTAL
 
 
HORARIOS AUTORIZADOS
 
Piscina y Jacuzzi.
Lunes a viernes de 8:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 9:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
 
Gimnasio y Baño Turco.
 
Lunes a viernes de 6:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 6:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m.
 
NORMAS
 
Está prohibido en la zona social (piscina, jacuzzi, gimnasio y turco):
 
1. Celebrar fiestas, con o sin la presencia de agrupaciones musicales.
2. Llevar o mantener en la zona animales domésticos o mascotas.
3. Usar aparatos de música, excepto dispositivos de audio personal (con audífonos).
4. Correr, patinar, montar bicicleta o triciclo, jugar con pelotas y raquetas.
5. Llevar a cabo actividades que puedan incomodar a las demás personas que se encuentren en el lugar o que puedan ocasionar daños en bienes privados o comunes del edificio.
6. Consumir alimentos, a excepción de mecatos.
7. Usar envases o recipientes de vidrio.
8. Reservar, maltratar, manchar, ensuciar y dañar las sillas, asoleadoras y cojines. Para conservación e higiene de las colchonetas, se deben utilizar toallas sobre estas.
9. Colocar los cojines de las asoleadoras en el piso, meterlos a la piscina o retirarlos de la zona.
10. Retirarse de la zona dejando elementos personales o desechos.
11. Dejar niños solos en la zona. Será absoluta responsabilidad de los padres o adulto responsable del niño, cualquier accidente que les pueda ocurrir por el hecho de dejarlos solos en esta zona.
 
Está igualmente dentro de la piscina:
 
1. Usar la piscina padeciendo enfermedades infectocontagiosas o de lesiones en la piel.
2. Fumar, comer chicle y consumir cualquier clase de alimento o bebida.
3. Bañar a menores con o sin pañales. Para esto deben usarse pañales para piscina.
4. Introducir o jugar con elementos claramente peligrosos.
5. Bañarse sin ducharse previamente o sin retirar del cuerpo aceites, bronceadores, protectores, lociones o similares.
6. En general desplegar cualquier tipo de actividad o conducta que pueda causar incomodidad o perjudicar a los demás bañistas o a los equipos de la piscina.  
 
En la zona social y en el lobby del edificio no se permite fumar.
 
SEGURIDAD
 
1. Los menores de edad SIEMPRE deben estar acompañados de un adulto responsable. No se permite el ingreso de menores de 14 años al gimnasio.
2. Antes de salir del apartamento verifique que las puertas y ventanas se encuentren debidamente cerradas.
3. Al salir de viaje asegúrese de dejar cerrados los registros de agua, gas y baje los tacos eléctricos (sin incluir el de la nevera). El personal de mantenimiento del edificio se encuentra en disposición de realizar el cierre de las llaves de agua y gas cuando se le solicite.  
4. El uso de las manillas es obligatorio tanto para arrendatarios temporales como para los invitados de propietarios y deben ser utilizadas durante toda su estadía en el edificio.
5. Los Conserjes NO se encuentran autorizados para recibir llaves de los apartamentos. En casos excepcionales y sólo por motivos de fuerza mayor se podrán dejar en sobres cerrados, los cuales serán facilitados por los conserjes y deben ser retiradas dentro de las 24 horas siguientes. Los sobres deben ser firmados por la persona que los deja y debe escribirse en estos en nombre de la persona que lo recibirá.
6. Al edificio no se permite el ingreso de vendedores ambulantes.
7. Al dejar su vehículo en el parqueadero de visitantes, asegúrese de no dejar objetos de valor en su interior.
8. Al ingresar al parqueadero interno debe detenerse y bajar el vidrio del vehículo para poder ser identificado plenamente por el Conserje y/o guarda de seguridad.
 
CONVIVENCIA
 
1. No se permitirá el uso de equipos de sonido en el interior de los apartamentos a volúmenes altos que perturben la tranquilidad de los vecinos. (Los Conerjes están autorizados para llamar a la Policía en caso de no atender los requerimientos).
2. No se permiten grupos musicales y/u orquesta dentro de los apartamentos
3. Está prohibido colgar alfombras, ropa, letreros, avisos, carteles y otros elementos similares en las paredes externas, puertas, ventanas, rejas, balcones o áreas comunes.
4. Está prohibido lanzar papeles, colillas de cigarrillos, basura o cualquier otro objeto desde los balcones.
5. Los animales domésticos o mascotas podrán circular (no permanecer) por las áreas comunes del edificio, a excepción de los ascensores, siempre acompañados de un adulto responsable y sujetos con traílla.
6. Los arrendatarios temporales no podrán recibir visitas en su estadía dentro del Edificio.

description:
Beautiful apartment with amazing view and great location in Cartagena, just one block from Hilton Hotel. This property has two rooms, two bathrooms, kitchen and a balcony. It also includes Air Conditioner, TV and Internet. Close to the beach and most iconic places in the city. 

Registro Nacional de Turismo (RNT) No. 56726

This two bedroom apartment is completely independent, you will not share it with anyone. It has a queen size bed, two single bed and also two very comfortable single beds under it and a sofa bed. All bathrooms are completely equipped as well as the kitchen. You will find a fridge, microwave, blender, crockery, pots and cutlery. If you come with a baby please let me know and we will leave a baby crib. There is also free parking if you bring your vehicle. The building has 24 hours concierge/security service.

You will have access to the pool, jacuzzi, gym and sauna of the building. There is free parking and exclusive WiFi for the apartment.

I like to communicate with my guests before and during their stay. I will be available to help them with any question or recommendation they need.

Call me or text me any time you need.

This place is located right in the heart of El Laguito, which is a touristic and safe area. You will find plenty of amazing restaurants which serve authentic Colombian food and also international food. It is also close to supermarkets, ATM machines, coffee shops and pharmacies. Best beaches of Cartagena are all around this neighborhood. The old city and airport are just 10 and 20 min by taxi respectively.

We recommend to take Taxi or Uber. Ask the price before taking a Taxi.

Airport is 20 minutes away by taxi (approximately $6 US Dollars).

Old City is just 5 minutes by taxi (approximately $3 US Dollars).

You will find some water at the fridge, coffee, soap and toilet paper for one day. Once you have settled in the apartment, you can do your shopping.

If you need additional cleaning services please inform, there is an extra charge of $12 US Dollars.

If you need parking, you must inform before your arrival. It has no additional cost.

Upon arrival, guests must show their ID to the building staff and pay 6.000 pesos (around $1.5 US Dollars) per person as this building is located in a touristic area. This has to be paid just once.

additional_house_rules:
English:

1. All guests must show their ID  at the entrance of the building for check in.
2. Check in after 15:00, unless the apartment is available before. If you arrive before, we can keep your luggage.
3. Check out at 12:00 or before, otherwise, a fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged.
4. Whenever you leave the apartment, make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, lights and close the windows.
5. Please limit the noise. After 22:00 it is prohibited to play loud music.
6. Smoking is prohibited.
7. No drugs or prostitution.
8. Visitors are not allowed.
9. It is not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies.
10. If you are not satisfied with something of the apartment, you must inform it immediately. We can fix it in the shortest possible time.
11. If you break something of the apartment or building, you must pay for that.
12. We are not responsable for any loss of personal belongings or accidents in the apartment.
13. All other rules of the building or local policies must be respected.

Español:

1. Todos los huéspedes deberán mostrar un documento de identificación válido en la portería al momento de registrarse.
2. El Check in se realizará luego de las 15:00. El ingreso previo podrá realizarse siempre y cuando el apartamento esté disponible y limpio.
3. El Check out será a más tardar a las 12:00, de lo contrario, una multa equivalente al valor de una noche será cargado.
4. Siempre que salga del apartamento, asegúrese de apagar el aire acondicionado, luces y cerrar las ventanas.
5. Por favor limitar el ruido. Después de las 22:00 se encuentra prohibido poner música con alto volumen. 
6. Fumar está prohibido. Ignorar esta regla causará una penalización del valor de una noche.
7. No se permiten drogas o prostitución en el apartamento.
8. No se permiten invitados en el apartamento.
9. No está permitido arrojar papeles, cigarrillos, basura u otros objetos desde las ventanas o balcones del apartamento.
10. Si no te encuentras satisfecho con algo del apartamento, deberás informarlo inmediatamente. Intentaremos arreglarlo en el menor tiempo posible.
11. Si algún huésped daña algo del apartamento o edificio, deberán pagar antes del check out.
12. No somos responsables por pérdidas de objetos personales o accidentes al interior del apartamento.
13. Todas las demás reglas del edificio o las políticas locales deberán ser respetadas.

name: Warmly & Quite Sunset View Apt., Palmetto Sunset
summary: In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV'S and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV'S and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 68 sqm and can accommodate up to 4 persons with its 1 bedroom(s) and 2 bed sofas in the living room. Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and parking in the buildings garage*. The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling where you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area and the comfy sofa & SMART TV. The apartment has 2 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing sea view! This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". 
*Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. The building is very modern, has two unique pools, one on the main floor along the ocean and one on the rooftop where you also find the Jacuzzi (on the 43rd floor). There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking, gym and three elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don´t hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, just beside the main entrance where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
 
2. BUILDING FEE: 10,000 COP (approx. $2,90 USD) per person & has to be payed to the building, you pay the fee in my office.

3. WRISTBAND: Palmetto Sunset wristband must be worn over time (for access). Lost or removed wristband will be charged by the building.
 
4. MINORS: Minors must be accompanied by at least one of their parents presenting the minors identification in original. For Colombian minors "registro civil" in original or ID has to be shown and both parents has to be present. If only one parent are present an authorization in written from the parent (not present) has to be shown.

5. PETS: are allowed only if an "emotional support animal" certification can be shown.
 
6. SOCIAL AREAS: 
Pool 1st floor      10:00AM-06:00PM  (Wednesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
Pool 43rd floor  09:00AM-06:00PM (Tuesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
GYM                       07:00AM-06:00PM (Friday 07:00AM-12:00PM)
SAUNA                 09:00AM-06:00PM (Let reception know 15 min before)

7. ENVIRONMENT: At anytime you leave the apartment make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet. Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena S.A.S is authorized to enter at any time and turn them off. It's not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. Please save water and light as much as possible and please take care of your waste and garbage (especially when out in the nature like the beach or if you visit the islands) even if you see locals or other tourist not respecting this.

8. ADDITIONAL SERVICES: Cleaning services or cooking are available upon request for an extra fee, please ask us.

9. PARKING: If you need parking, you must inform us before your arrival.
 
10. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters. 

11. You must inform me immediately if there is something you feel is not fulfilling with the listing details so that we can fix it in the best possible way as soon as possible.
 
12. All the rules of the building and local law must be respected.

13. Read the "Additional rules" before confirm the last step of the reservation.

description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you will find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the top of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Fully equipped kitchen, hot water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV'S and an amazing balcony for enjoying sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 66 sqm and can accommodate up to 4 persons with its 1 bedroom(s) and the big bed sofa in the living room. Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and parking in the buildings garage*.The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling where you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area and the comfy sofa & SMART TV. The apartment has 2 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing sea view! The beds can be divided into to two single beds*. This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". *Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. The building is very modern, has two unique pools, one on the main floor along the ocean and one on the rooftop where you also find the Jacuzzi (on the 43rd floor). There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking, gym and three elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don´t hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, just beside the main entrance where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

-VERY IMPORTANT: For all guests staying at this listing please send full names/document number/document type/nationality/date of birth (Colombia’s authorities requirement) // MUY IMPORTANTE: Para todos los huéspedes que se hospeden en este apartamento por favor enviar nombres completos/número de documentos/tipo de documento/nacionalidad/fecha nacimiento (requerimiento de la policía colombiana)

-Unregistered names won’t be allowed in until next day of check in (building’s STRICT rule) // Los nombres que no estén registrados no podrán ingresar sino hasta el día siguiente del check in (regla ESTRICTA del edificio) 
-Strict maximum number of guests for this apartment is 6 people (toddlers and/or underage kids count as persons as well) // El número máximo estricto de huéspedes de este apartamento es 6 personas (los bebes y/o menores de edad cuentan también como personas)  
-It is compulsory to have your ID to register at the front desk of the building to be granted access even for kids and toddlers // Es indispensable la presentación de documentos de identificación de cada uno de los huéspedes para el registro de acceso al edificio incluso para niños y bebés

-When you register at the building you are going to be given a free bracelet that you have to wear during all your stay, if you take it off you will be charged 10.000COP for a new one // Al registrarte en el edificio te pondrán una manilla sin costo que debes llevar puesta durante toda tu estadía, si te la quitas debes pagar 10.000COP por una nueva

- If interested in daily cleaning, please specify in advance. A daily cleaning charge of 70.000COP per day will apply // Si se necesita aseo diario solicitarlo con antelación. Costo de 70.000 por día
-You will be given 2 towels per guest // Se entregan 2 toallas por huésped
-It is TOTALLY forbidden any form of prostitution involving children and/or teenagers (Law 679 of 2001) // Se prohibe ESTRICTAMENTE cualquier forma de prostitución contra niños y/o adolescentes (Ley 679 del 2001)

additional_house_rules:
EDIFICIO TURÍSTICO MORROS CITY PROPIEDAD HORIZONTAL
 
 
HORARIOS AUTORIZADOS
 
Piscina y Jacuzzi.
Lunes a viernes de 8:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 9:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
 
Gimnasio y Baño Turco.
 
Lunes a viernes de 6:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 6:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m.
 
NORMAS
 
Está prohibido en la zona social (piscina, jacuzzi, gimnasio y turco):
 
1. Celebrar fiestas, con o sin la presencia de agrupaciones musicales.
2. Llevar o mantener en la zona animales domésticos o mascotas.
3. Usar aparatos de música, excepto dispositivos de audio personal (con audífonos).
4. Correr, patinar, montar bicicleta o triciclo, jugar con pelotas y raquetas.
5. Llevar a cabo actividades que puedan incomodar a las demás personas que se encuentren en el lugar o que puedan ocasionar daños en bienes privados o comunes del edificio.
6. Consumir alimentos, a excepción de mecatos.
7. Usar envases o recipientes de vidrio.
8. Reservar, maltratar, manchar, ensuciar y dañar las sillas, asoleadoras y cojines. Para conservación e higiene de las colchonetas, se deben utilizar toallas sobre estas.
9. Colocar los cojines de las asoleadoras en el piso, meterlos a la piscina o retirarlos de la zona.
10. Retirarse de la zona dejando elementos personales o desechos.
11. Dejar niños solos en la zona. Será absoluta responsabilidad de los padres o adulto responsable del niño, cualquier accidente que les pueda ocurrir por el hecho de dejarlos solos en esta zona.
 
Está igualmente dentro de la piscina:
 
1. Usar la piscina padeciendo enfermedades infectocontagiosas o de lesiones en la piel.
2. Fumar, comer chicle y consumir cualquier clase de alimento o bebida.
3. Bañar a menores con o sin pañales. Para esto deben usarse pañales para piscina.
4. Introducir o jugar con elementos claramente peligrosos.
5. Bañarse sin ducharse previamente o sin retirar del cuerpo aceites, bronceadores, protectores, lociones o similares.
6. En general desplegar cualquier tipo de actividad o conducta que pueda causar incomodidad o perjudicar a los demás bañistas o a los equipos de la piscina.  
 
En la zona social y en el lobby del edificio no se permite fumar.
 
SEGURIDAD
 
1. Los menores de edad SIEMPRE deben estar acompañados de un adulto responsable. No se permite el ingreso de menores de 14 años al gimnasio.
2. Antes de salir del apartamento verifique que las puertas y ventanas se encuentren debidamente cerradas.
3. Al salir de viaje asegúrese de dejar cerrados los registros de agua, gas y baje los tacos eléctricos (sin incluir el de la nevera). El personal de mantenimiento del edificio se encuentra en disposición de realizar el cierre de las llaves de agua y gas cuando se le solicite.  
4. El uso de las manillas es obligatorio tanto para arrendatarios temporales como para los invitados de propietarios y deben ser utilizadas durante toda su estadía en el edificio.
5. Los Conserjes NO se encuentran autorizados para recibir llaves de los apartamentos. En casos excepcionales y sólo por motivos de fuerza mayor se podrán dejar en sobres cerrados, los cuales serán facilitados por los conserjes y deben ser retiradas dentro de las 24 horas siguientes. Los sobres deben ser firmados por la persona que los deja y debe escribirse en estos en nombre de la persona que lo recibirá.
6. Al edificio no se permite el ingreso de vendedores ambulantes.
7. Al dejar su vehículo en el parqueadero de visitantes, asegúrese de no dejar objetos de valor en su interior.
8. Al ingresar al parqueadero interno debe detenerse y bajar el vidrio del vehículo para poder ser identificado plenamente por el Conserje y/o guarda de seguridad.
 
CONVIVENCIA
 
1. No se permitirá el uso de equipos de sonido en el interior de los apartamentos a volúmenes altos que perturben la tranquilidad de los vecinos. (Los Conerjes están autorizados para llamar a la Policía en caso de no atender los requerimientos).
2. No se permiten grupos musicales y/u orquesta dentro de los apartamentos
3. Está prohibido colgar alfombras, ropa, letreros, avisos, carteles y otros elementos similares en las paredes externas, puertas, ventanas, rejas, balcones o áreas comunes.
4. Está prohibido lanzar papeles, colillas de cigarrillos, basura o cualquier otro objeto desde los balcones.
5. Los animales domésticos o mascotas podrán circular (no permanecer) por las áreas comunes del edificio, a excepción de los ascensores, siempre acompañados de un adulto responsable y sujetos con traílla.
6. Los arrendatarios temporales no podrán recibir visitas en su estadía dentro del Edificio.

Apartamento único, exclusivo para vacaciones o de trabajo en la hermosa ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, con vista al mar. apartamento de una habitación con cama doble y cama sencilla en la habitación, baño con agua caliente, sala con sofá cama, cocina integral, lavadora y secadora, wi-fi, TV, balcón con vista a la playa. El apartamento esta a solo 1 min. de la playa, a 10 min. en taxi del centro amurallado de la ciudad. Completamente dotado para hacer tu estadía lo mas agradable posible.

Apartamento confortable, acondicionado perfectamente para hacer de tu estadía una experiencia inolvidable en la Ciudad de Cartagena. Hermosa vista a la playa y a la ciudad histórica, cómodo y confortable.

Nuestros clientes pueden acceder a todos los servicios del apartamento, y a las zonas sociales del edificio.

Nuestro personal le dará la bienvenida a nuestros clientes a la llegada, quienes estarán atentos a sus requerimientos durante su estadía.

El apartamento está ubicado en una zona llamada BOCAGRANDE, es una zona muy comercial y turística donde  encontraran diferentes restaurantes, bares, centros comerciales, puertos, super mercados, droguerías y centro de turismo  al rededor. Hay un MCDonals a 260mts, un  Restaurante Árabe internacional  a 450mts, un Jenos Pizza 100mts,  KFC 190mts. Hamburguesas Presto 180mts. También encontraran supermercados: Superentienda Olímpica a dos cuadras o 4 minutos a pie, Carulla, Megatienda. Lugares para tomar cafe como Juan valdez Cafe a 80mts, Panpaya. 

Otros datos de interés: 

Centro comercial NAO fun&shopping a 450mts.
Giros y finanzas Western Unión 1190mts.
El apartamento está ubicado a 10min en carro y a 30min caminado del Centro Histórico de esta hermosa ciudad.

Con una ubicación envidiable, este apartamento ofrece la comodidad de moverse a pie hasta el centro de la capital. Bocagrande es además un barrio multicultural bien comunicado con el resto de zonas.De los mejores barrios de la ciudad, muy seguro!  hay supermercados cerca y centros comerciales.

Apartamento familiar, ubicado en edificio, por recomendaciones del gobierno local y siguiendo los protocolos de bioseguridad por el momento están suspendidas las visitas a los apartamentos; solo podrán ingresar al apartamento y al edificio las personas que estén registradas como huéspedes del apartamento.

Ubicado en el barrio El Laguito, en el corazón turístico de la ciudad, con una hermosa vista al Laguito y al Mar Caribe, a pocos pasos de Playa Hollywood, la más famosa de la ciudad; rodeado de restaurantes, café, joyerias, farmacia, agencias de turismo y de tures, cajeros, lavanderías, etc. 
El apto. se encuentra a 10 minutos del Centro Histórico y a 15 minutos del Aeropuerto Internacional Rafael Nuñez; lo que en conjunto hace de su estadia, toda una experiencia maravillosa!!

Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment on the 23st floor on one of the most prestige buildings in Cartagena w/ maid included in the price. 1 master bedroom with a king size bed, private attached bathroom and a spacious living room with a stunning sofa bed. High-end fully equipped kitchen. Big balcony with a table to have dinner with a spectacular view. The beach is only a short walk away and the pool has a view to the ocean which is right in front of the building. Shopping mall right below the building!

This is a luxurious and spacious one-bedroom apartment that includes one KING bed in the main bedroom and a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room with two lounge chairs. A full high-end bath with hot water and a kitchen with everything you need for your stay.

This is a space that is best suited for couples and small families who want the best place for resting.

The reservation includes a maid during your stay in this apartment if you wish!

Only registered guests are allowed inside the building. Visitors aren't allowed.
Registered guests will have access to all the building facilities. The gym will be available shortly due to COVID-19.

We have personnel to help you with what you need during your stay.

The neighborhood of Bocagrande is near to San Martin Avenue where you can find restaurants, shopping centers, pubs, banks, money exchange places and supermarkets.
There is a shopping mall right below the building with every type of store you need.

In these area it's very easy to find cabs anytime or to take bus. Cartagena is a small city everything is close. Cab ride to airpot takes 15 minutes. You can even walk to the City Center (Walled City) or if you prefer you can take a 5 min cab ride there.

Registered guests are the only ones allowed in the building. Additional guests aren't allowed.
Every guest has to wear a bracelet during their stay. The bracelet will be put on in reception.

Edificio con 3 piscinas, Jacuzzi, gimnasio, baño turco, salida directa a la playa y vigilancia 24 horas. El apartamento cuenta con la dotación completa de sabanas y toallas de ducha y de playa.

Apartamento con 1 alcoba 2 baños con ducha y agua caliente, sala con sofacama para 2 personas, área de labores con lavadora y secadora, tv cable, internet wifi y balcón con vista lateral al mar. Edificio con 3 piscinas, Jacuzzi, gimnasio, baño turco, salida directa a la playa y vigilancia 24 horas. El apartamento cuenta con la dotación completa de sabanas y toallas de ducha y de playa.

Ideal para grupo familiar o grupo de trabajo

Nuestros huéspedes pueden disfrutar de todas las áreas del edificio sin costo adicional

Nuestro equipo de supervisora y camareras estarán pendientes si nuestros huéspedes necesitan algo.

El Edificio está ubicado en la zona norte turística de cartagena frente al Mar Caribe

Pueden tomar taxi o bus para ir a la ciudad amurallada.

Las normas del edificio no permiten visitantes, solo se autoriza el ingreso a las personas que envían como huéspedes en una lista que se debe enviar un día antes de su llegada.
Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio.  Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio cuando lleguen sólo deben presenta su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio. Deberán portarla durante su estadía así podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin que les tengan que preguntar para dónde van. Lo hacemos por seguridad en el
Edificio.  Igualmente debo informar que no se aceptan visitantes.

name: Best Caribbean Sunsets! Seafront quiet 1BR 21Floor
summary:
Amazing caribbean sunsets are the nicest treat at this brand new designer 1BR apartment. Enjoy peaceful views of Cartagena sea while being close to everything in the city. Fantastic place for writing, relaxing, admiring sea wonders, connecting with the sea vibes.
Located at Palmetto Sunset, a modern luxury skyscraper at El Laguito.

Located at Palmetto Sunset, a modern luxury skyscraper at El Laguito.

1BR apartment, facing tierra bomba island, seafront, all new furniture, 2bathrooms, fully equiped Kitchen, 2 Smart TVs, everything arranged for a pleasant and quiet stay.

Brand new apartment with access to gym, 2 pools, jacuzzi, amazing views  from the roof top.

Me and my cohost are available anytime thru Airbnb messaging and WhatsApp

Lively neighborhood, plenty of mini markets and restaurants around the corner. However, the apartment is very quiet since it faces the caribbean sea, only thing you would hear is waves sound.

Just 15 mins from airport, 10 mins to walled city, walking distance from Laguito and Bocagrande beach area.

The place has been designed to have our guests enjoy their stay.

Due to current pandemic, visitors are not allowed by the building administration.

Thanks for your understanding :)



Guests policy: anyone staying the night at the unit (outside the visitor hours) is considered a guest, therefore would need to be included in the booking request or if added afterwards would need to be aded via booking change request.  All guests are required to send ID details prior to check in so we can process the registration with the Condo admin. 

For security and coexistence purposes, Front Desk staff might apply additional verifications and admission policies for visitors alligned with the Condo admin rules.

name: Cartagena Apartamento Con Jacuzzi Privado
summary: Hermoso apartamento con jacuzzi privado en el balcón y una increíble vista hacia la Ciénaga, un lugar privado, lleno de paz, mucha vegetación y aves que nos cantan cada mañana. Se encuentra ubicado a pocos metros de la única playa certificada de Cartagena (Playa Azul), a 10 minutos del Centro histórico, 5 minutos del Aeropuerto y a 1 hora de las Islas del Rosaro y Barú. Cuenta con 1 habitación, closet, baño privado, sala comedor, baño social con ducha, balcón con jacuzzi y zona de lavandería.

Cuenta con 1 habitación, closet, baño privado, sala comedor, baño social con ducha, balcón con jacuzzi y zona de lavandería.

El Edificio cuenta con zonas comunes en el último piso que incluye piscina con borde infinito, piscina de nado semiolimpica, 2 x jacuzzi, gimnasio, baño turco, BBQ, salas de estar y parque infantil.

Además el apartamento incluye parqueadero.

Nuestros huespedes tendrán acceso a nuestro servicio de conserjeria para asistirles con sus requerimientos.
En el Edificio tendrán acceso a parqueadero privado y para visitantes, zonas sociales q incluyen jacuzzi, piscinas, gimnasio, BBQ, terraza con vista 360° y baño turco

Estermos encantados de asistirles con todos sus requerimientos o consultas antes y durante su estadía

El Edificio Martinique se encuentra ubicado en el Barrio cielo Mar, un sector en pleno desarrollo muy bien ubicado, justo frente a Playa Azul en la Zona Norte de Cartagena.
Cuenta con restaurantes tiendas, supermercado y acceso a transporte público.

Es muy seguro y fácil de transportarse en y alrededor de la zona. Sugerimos solicitar siempre su taxi al conserje en recepción.

El balcón con jacuzzi y vista a la Cienaga es un lugar espcecia para disfrutar la tranquilidad q ofrece el panorama y la privacidad que buscas en tu espacio

name: LUXURY SUNSET 2902
summary: Apartamento amoblado en la ciudad de cartagena con una de las mejores vistas que podrás apreciar en la ciudad, cuenta con una amplia zona social que podrás disfrutar dentro de toda tu estadía en los horarios establecidos como  por ejemplo nuestra piscina en el piso 41 del edifico que tiene una vista genial de toda la ciudad y sus alrededores, también encontraras una gran variedad de bares, restaurantes, almacenes de ropa, 2 centros comerciales a solo 5 minutos y las playas para tus dias de sol.

description:
Apartamento amoblado en la ciudad de cartagena con una de las mejores vistas que podrás apreciar en la ciudad, cuenta con una amplia zona social que podrás disfrutar dentro de toda tu estadía en los horarios establecidos como  por ejemplo nuestra piscina en el piso 41 del edifico que tiene una vista genial de toda la ciudad y sus alrededores, también encontraras una gran variedad de bares, restaurantes, almacenes de ropa, 2 centros comerciales a solo 5 minutos y las playas para tus dias de sol.

En la zona de la piscina del piso 41 podrás disfrutar de una vista de 360 grados de gran parte de la ciudad de cartagena ademas que tendrás una fantástica a la isla de tierra bomba lugar turístico muy frecuentado por los turistas

Dentro del edifico tendrás la oportunidad de ingresar alas 2 piscinas que se encuentran ubicadas: la primera en el lobby principal y la segunda en el piso 41 donde encontraras también un jacuzzi y una zona bbq que podrás utilizar cuando deseas dentro de tu estadía.

El barrio de boca grande es la zona hotelera y el sector mas turístico de toda la ciudad, en el encontraras una gran variedad de bares, discotecas, restaurantes, almacenes de ropa 2 centros comerciales con amplias instalaciones, ademas de que cuenta con 10 kilómetros de playa accesible en cualquier momento.

Nuestro sector cuenta con todos los medios de transporte necesario para facilitar tu movilidad rápida y eficiente en muy pocos minutos, funcionan los aplicativos UBER, INDRIEVE, y otras plataformas locales con las que te podrás apoyar.

Por políticas del edificio se debe cancelar un registro de la manilla de identificación $10.000 (Pesos Colombianos) por persona, esto es únicamente al momento de ingresar y es valido por todo el tiempo de su hospedaje

name: Cozy Sunset View Apartment, Torres del Lago
summary: In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 2 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished and fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV's, Gym & Pool and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Ethernet connection,Hot water,Paid parking on premises,Single level home,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Lake access,Waterfront,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 2 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished and fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV's, Gym & Pool and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 90 sqm and can accommodate up to 7 persons with its 2 bedroom(s). Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and parking in the buildings garage*. The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling where you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area and the comfy sofa & SMART TV. The apartment has 2 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing sea view! This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". 
*Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. The building is very modern and has a gym and pool. There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking and two elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don't hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, less then 100 meters away (in Palmetto Sunset) where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance of the building Palmetto Sunset.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
 
2. BUILDING FEE: 1 Bedroom Apartment = 25,000 COP (approx. $7 USD) & 2 Bedroom Apartment = 35,000 COP (approx. $10 USD). The prices are per apartment & has to be payed directly to the building.

3. WRISTBAND: Torres de Lago's wristband must be worn over time (for access). Lost or removed wristband may be charged by the building. 
 
4. MINORS: Minors must be accompanied by at least one of their parents presenting the minors identification in original. For Colombian minors "registro civil" in original or ID has to be shown and both parents has to be present. If only one parent are present an authorization in written from the parent (not present) has to be shown. 

5. PETS: Are allowed but you should bring a dog muzzle & vaccination card, please let us know if you're bringing your pet.
 
6. SOCIAL AREAS: 
Pool 3rd floor        09:00AM-06:00PM
GYM 3rd floor       06:00AM-06:00PM

7. ENVIRONMENT: At anytime you leave the apartment make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet. Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena S.A.S is authorized to enter at any time and turn them off. It's not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. Please save water and light as much as possible and please take care of your waste and garbage (especially when out in the nature like the beach or if you visit the islands) even if you see locals or other tourist not respecting this. 

8. ADDITIONAL SERVICES: Cleaning services or cooking are available upon request for an extra fee, please ask us.

9. PARKING: If you need parking, you must inform us before your arrival.
 
10. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters.  

11. You must inform me immediately if there is something you feel is not fulfilling with the listing details so that we can fix it in the best possible way as soon as possible. 
 
12. All the rules of the building and local law must be respected.  

13. Read the "Additional rules" before confirm the last step of the reservation.

You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

additional_house_rules:
Strict Rules:
1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
2. CHECK IN/OUT: Check out is strictly at 12 PM or earlier. A fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged if overstayed. Check in is at after 3 PM.
3. If you bring visitors it on your responsibility. They have to register at the reception. You can have a "permanent guests" please ask for more info. 
4. NOISE: Please limit the noise at all time but especially after 11 PM. Parties and high noise levels are prohibited (this includes TV, music & high volume conversations).
5. SMOKING: Is prohibited inside the property (except on the balcony). 
6. SEXUAL EXPLOITATION: Of children and adolescents is a crime.
7. DEPOSIT/KEYS: If you break something in the apartment/building you must pay the damages. If you lose the keys you'll be charged 80,000 COP.

2 bedrooms comfortable apartment in front of the ocean, we set a modern and cozy decoration for a memorable experience in Cartagena, we have CarBnb service from the airport and can organize plans to San Felipe´s Casttle, Barú (Playa Blanca), Volcan del Totumo, Pink Sea and many more.

We have open spaces and a balcony that is connected to the living room and the master-bedroom.

We don´t  have AC activated in the social areas, because the breeze runs freely through the living - dining - kitchen and also do to ecological reasons we only support AC in the bedrooms.

We can assist you with our staff with topics related to your stay or with plans to Barú , Volcan del Totumo, restaurants, night life and any questions, ask for our CarBnb Driver.

Marbella: close to the walled city, surrounded  by food trucks, a bakery shop a supermarket, next to Hotel Ibis.

All guests must complete the visitors form, use the wristband and follow the condo rules.
Is a building policy adopted for security and maintenance reasons.
