description:
Spectacular waterfront building in Cartagena De Indias, Colombia, with 5 stars’ amenities including 2 pools and one Jacuzzi facing the ocean.

The apartment

Two bedrooms unit with balcony (95 mts ²)
One double and one single bed in master bedroom
One double and one single bed in guest room
One double sofa bed in living room
Full kitchen, free cable, washer/dryer in residence
Convenient to Centro Historico, Local Dinning & Nightlife, Las Americas Convention Center, and Airport
Reliable private internet Access (5mb/s download speed 1mb/s upload speed)
The building

Luxury resort style amenities
Daily Maid Services (subject to availability and extra charge)
24 Hour Security
24 Hour On-Call Service Desk (For Taxi, directions, etc. in local language)
Recreation Area with Pool Deck and Heated Jacuzzi
Wireless free Internet is available throughout the building and also extending to the pool areas and the beach.

Our guests have access to the pool and Jacuzzi area

We offer assistance 24/7 by internet, by phone and in person. We are pleased to assist our guest directly at our apartments or at our office in Bocagrande.

Best location in Bocagrande, Juan Valdez is next to the building, Restaurant and Disco with in walking distance, historical Downtown 10 minutes walking.
Safest Area in the city protected by Local Police and Private Security.

Taxis are easy to arrange with the help of the front desk reception. Due to its location, most shops and touristic sites are walking distance.

MASTER BED ROOM NETFLIX
neighborhood_overview:
Best location in Bocagrande, Juan Valdez is next to the building, Restaurant and Disco with in walking distance, historical Downtown 10 minutes walking.
Safest Area in the city protected by Local Police and Private Security.
notes: MASTER BED ROOM NETFLIX
additional_house_rules:
Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment however smoking in the balcony is permitted.
The pool can be used from 8 am until 7:00 pm.
No parties or huge noise in the common areas after 10 pm.
AC must be turned off when you are not in the apartment .
If you need cleaning services there is a fee 40.000 COP/Day 
After 8 days cleaning service is mandatory.
Please do not hang towels in the balcony.
Please do not leave trash in the apartment. Bring it down every day.
Names of guests must be given when reservations is confirmed and when you check in.
No extra guests can stay without paying in advance.
Maximum  8 guests in total can stay in the apartment. 
Unfortunately, Cartagena is becoming a very popular destination to sexual 
tourism. Commercial sexual exploitation of children and adolescents is a crime. Sex tourism is prohibited in our apartment.
We do not admit the entry of pets to the apartment.
It is prohibited to remove any object from the apartment without previous authorization.
LOOKING AFTER THE APARTMENT . When returning from the beach in particular, please be sure to remove any wet or damp clothing before using the furniture and to remove sand from your feet.
Please don't bring to the beach white towels provided in the apartment, only the ones provided specially for the beach (colored ones).
Have fun, relax and enjoy

description:
Breathtaking Views + Perfect Location

Relax in luxurious splendor in this 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, tastefully decorated, beach-front penthouse located in the 36th floor of one of Cartagena's latest and most prestigious buildings: Palmetto Beach. 

Wide, stunning view to the ocean. Furnished to luxury hotel standards with large screen TV's in all bedrooms and living room. Amenities in the building include a fully equipped gym and a top-floor pool.

To all possible guests: please keep in mind before booking that during the sanitary emergency because of COVID-19 the building isn't allowing any visitors, and the pool and gym are currently closed under the Government demand.

The apartment features high-quality finishings, recently purchased furniture and appliances, and a modern, tasteful interior decoration. 

A/C, Washer and Dryer, Water Heater.

Large screen TV's in all bedrooms.

Fully equipped gym (20.000 COP per hour) 

Top-floor pool.

24/7 Lobby + Security.

The total price includes a portable baby crib and a dining chair for babies. If you require it, please let us know in advance.

Very close to San Martin Avenue, the most important street of Bocagrande and where grocery stores, restaurants, and commerce of diverse kinds can be found.

notes: Late check-in (after 21:00) is allowed for 15 USD
additional_house_rules:
House rules: 
A copy of your passport is required at your check-in time, and a signed contract.

-	No sex tourism: 
According to Law 679 of 2001, the entry of minors to any tourist establishment for the purpose of prostitution or sexual abuse is strictly prohibited. 
The guest must register all his visitors at the front desk with their cédula or passport. In case is less than 18 years old, the permission from their parents with birth certificate. By authorizing the entrance of visitors, the guest is responsible for their behavior. Visitors are welcome between 10am to 3am. They can not use the communal areas like pool or gym. (SEE BELOW FOR VISITORS MEASURES DURING COVID)

NOTE TO POSSIBLE GUESTS AFTER MARCH 2020: keep in mind before booking that during the sanitary emergency because of COVID-19 the building isn't allowing any visitors, and the gym is currently closed under the Government demand. Also, the pool protocol has changed:
There will be 3 shifts during the day to use the pool located on the 38th floor and that has a maximum capacity of 16 people that can be in the pool area for 2 hours tops. Inside the pool the maximum amount of people permitted is 8 people. 
Shift 1: 9:30am - 12:00m
Shift 2: 1:30pm - 4:00pm
Shift 3: 4:30pm - 6:45pm
To maintain the physical distancing, chairs and tables will be strategically placed. 
Before entering the pool area, the lifeguard will take your temperature that has to be under 37.5ºC. 

If you want to use the pool, you must reserve with at least 1 day in advance letting us know the time and number and people that will use it.
Thank you for your help and understanding while we adapt to the new measures.

-	No parties: 
The apartment building is located in a residential neighborhood. For this reason, we do not allow social meetings that involve a high level of noise, or consumption of alcohol and/or drugs that may disturb the neighbors. 

-	Guests can use the pool. It is for free. 
-	The gym cost 20.000 COP/hour. (CLOSED DURING COVID)

Not complying with the above will obligate us to call the police and apply the corresponding sanctions, including immediate eviction from the property.

Thank you!

name: NUEVO Y MODERNO APT. Salida Directa a Playa LUXURY
summary: Por tu seguridad y la de todos los visitantes, el edificio cuenta con estrictos protocolos de bioseguridad.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Beach essentials,Hot water,Pocket wifi,Room-darkening shades,Baby safety gates,Window guards,Paid parking off premises,Single level home,Free street parking,Baking sheet,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Dishwasher,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Rice maker,Stove,Smart lock,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Waterfront,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
Por tu seguridad y la de todos los visitantes, el edificio cuenta con estrictos protocolos de bioseguridad.

Localizado sobre las exclusivas playas del sector Morros de Cartagena con salida directa al mar. El Edificio tiene amplios ventanales y terrazas pensado para que puedas disfrutar la preciosa vista del mar Caribe y la Ciénaga La Virgen. En el último piso encontrarás extraordinarias zonas húmedas: Piscina sin fin con vista panorámica, jacuzzis, baños turcos, piscina niños y parque acuático infantil.

Tenemos categoría SUPERHOST de Airbnb y excelentes reviews lo que te garantizará una grata estadía

Nuevo y moderno apartamento, completamente dotado para que tu estadía sea inolvidable. Cuenta con dos amplías habitaciones, 3 baños con ducha, cerradura inteligente, 3 aires acondicionados independientes, cocina equipada, sala, comedor, barra de cocina, terraza con vista a la playa, biblioteca, televisores, Internet Wifi, parlante de música, nevera, cava fria koleman para playa, dispensador de agua, horno, estufa, microondas, sanduchera, cafetera, licuadora, arrocera, plancha, secador de pelo, caja fuerte en cada habitación, botiquín, extintor, toallas, menaje completo, agua caliente las 24 horas, shampoo, jabón de manos, papel higiénico, copas de vino, cubiertos, platos, vasos, copas aguardienteras, ollas y mucho más. 

Cuidamos cada detalle en la decoración del apartamento, es algo que entre otras cosas resaltan nuestro huéspedes.

En la amplia terraza podrás encontrar silla tipo hamaca, mesa para café y sillas de descanso para disfrutar de la brisa y la vista. 

Podrás incluir el servicio de una empleada que te ayude con el aseo, lavado y la preparación de alimentos típicos. Si deseas contratar este servicio deberás pagarle directamente a la empleada. El valor por día es de $65.000 Colombianos, aproximadamente USD19.  El uso autónomo del equipo de lavado y secado no está permitido. Si necesitas lavar ropa durante tu estadía te prestaremos los equipos pero su operación deberá a estar a cargo de la empleada.

La clave wifi esta ubicada en el router que está al lado del teléfono.

Todo esto lo podrás encontrar a tan solo 5 minutos del aeropuerto y a 10 minutos de la ciudad amurallada.

Ingresarás a la portería del edificio por un amplio y moderno lobby donde realizarás el proceso de check in. Una vez termines el proceso de registro puedes usar uno de los tres ascensores disponibles o hacer uso de las escaleras. El ingreso al apartamento es autónomo, te enviaremos la clave de la puerta para que puedas ingresar sin necesidad de realizar ningún tipo de espera.  

Nuestro apartamento tiene derecho a un parqueadero cubierto. En caso de ir en vehículo o de alquilar uno, debes enviarnos el número de la placa con antelación. El ingreso del vehículo es con Valet Parking sin ningún costo adicional. Si necesitas parquear más de un carro, por favor preguntamos para darte opciones.

Estaremos (Catalina & Alejandro) atentos permanentemente para resolver cualquier duda o inquietud que se presente antes o durante tu estadía.

El apartamento se encuentra en la zona más exclusiva de Cartagena, cerca de los más importantes destinos turísticos como la Ciudad Amuralllada (8 minutos),  el Castillo de San Felipe (13 minutos) y el Centro de Convenciones (13 minutos) en taxi. Al Centro de Convenciones del Hotel Las Américas te podrás ir caminando, es realmente cerca.

Del aeropuerto al edificio hay solo 5 minutos en taxi y el valor es de aproximadamente USD 4.

Existe transporte público en bus que pasa justo por la vía principal detrás del edificio, su costo no es mayor a USD1 por persona, sin embargo recomendamos el uso de Taxi teniendo en cuenta que el Edificio se encuentra cerca de los principales destinos turísticos de la ciudad y del aeropuerto. El valor del servicio de taxi entre el Edificio y la Ciudad Amurallada y al Aeropuerto no debe ser mayor a USD4.

Dos Televisores. Uno es Samsung de 55 " y el otro es un Sony de 48" con puerto HDMI, con suscripción a más de 100 canales. Adicionalmente tendrás a tu disposición una suscripción adicional a Netflix. También encontrarás un parlante para escuchar tu música vía Bluetooth. (Esta prohibido sacar el parlante del apartamento).

Nuestros huéspedes deben enviarnos con anticipación al check in sus nombres completos y números de identificación para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio. Los extranjeros deberán incluir la fecha de nacimiento. Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio, a tu llegada sólo deben presentar el documento de identidad. Este procedimiento está establecido para tu seguridad y la de los demás visitantes. 

IMPORTANTE: 
1. La administración del edificio no permitirá el ingreso de personas que no estén previamente registradas.
2. La capacidad máxima permitida en el apartamento es 8 personas incluidos niños y/o bebes. (Si son más de 8, te agradeceríamos evitar reservar)

additional_house_rules:
-) No esta permitido el consumo de marihuana ni de sustancias alucinógenas dentro del apartamento y mucho menos en las áreas comunes del edificio. 

-) En caso de que seas fumador de cigarrillo, te solicitamos que lo hagas en la terraza y la colilla sea depositada en un cenicero. Por ningún motivo lances colillas a los pisos de abajo ni fumes dentro del apt.

-) Por tu seguridad y la de todos los huéspedes y residentes, la administración del Edificio solo permite el ingreso de las personas que se encuentran debidamente autorizadas. Agradecemos tu comprensión, es por tu seguridad.

-) La capacidad máxima permitida en el apartamento son 8 personas, incluido los niños y/o bebes.

- ) Durante la emergencia sanitaria por COVID-19, deberás utilizar en las áreas comunes el tapabocas y acatar los protocolos de bioseguridad.
 
-) Por recomendación de la Policía Nacional el horario de la playa es de 7am a 6pm. El acceso directo del edificio a la playa estará habilitado en esa jornada. Por fuera de este horario deberás ingresar al edificio por la puerta principal una vez cruces un camino que está ubicado a un costado del edificio. 

Por tu seguridad te recomendamos no hacer uso de la playa por fuera del horario sugerido. Te invitamos a disfrutar de las espectaculares zonas húmedas del edificio que están abiertas hasta las 8pm. 

-) No se permite excesos en el volumen de los equipos de audio.

EN LOBBY, PASILLOS Y ESCALERAS NO ESTÁ PERMITIDO:
- Transitar en estas áreas sin camisa, descalzo o en vestido
de baño sin pareo.
- Utilizar el mobiliario con trajes húmedos o impregnados de
arena. No los utilice para dormir.
- Esta prohibido pasear los perros por las zonas comunes.
- No esta permitido fumar en zonas comunes como pasillos,
jardines y en zonas húmedas.
- Es responsabilidad de todos controlar que nuestros familiares
e invitados no deterioren ni dañen las áreas comunes,
muros, muebles, equipos y en general toda la dotación
del edificio.

EN ASCENSORES:
- PROHIBIDO ingresar a los ascensores destilando agua o
impregnado de arena.
- Utilice los carros de mercado y regréselos al sitio asignado
en la portería o sótano.
- La copropiedad cuenta con una planta eléctrica para la
zonas comunes.

SE PROHIBE EL TURISMO SEXUAL.
Denuncie el abuso sexual infantil en
las líneas 141 - 122INFANTIL

NORMAS DE CONVIVENCIA
Números de emergencia
Bomberos 119
Policía nacional 123
Cruz Roja 132
Regulación de Urgencias 125

Por recomendación de la Policía Nacional el horario de la playa es de 7am a 6pm. El acceso directo del edificio a la playa estará habilitado en esa jornada. Por fuera de este horario deberás ingresar al edificio por la puerta principal una vez cruces un camino que está ubicado a un costado del edificio.

El apto. esta ubicado en el piso 31 con una hermosa vista al mar y a algunas islas.
Completamente nuevo con todos los elementos necesarios para una estadía magnifica.
Tiene lavadora - secadora - 2 baños completos - toallas - secador y todos los implementos necesarios en la cocina.

Las áreas comunes tienen aire acondicionada. 
Cuenta con 2 piscinas (1 en el primer nivel y la otra en el último nivel) jacuzzi, sauna, turco, gimnasio y unas áreas sociales muy amplias y confortables.

Siempre estaré disponible en caso de que los huéspedes me necesiten.  Les brindare información sobre sitios turísticos, restaurantes, islas, playas, visitas a la ciudad antigua y cualquier necesidad que tengan.

Bright LoftType unit (6th floor) within the walled city. Prime location. Unparalleled views of the bay, ocean and spectacular front facing sunsets. Close to the best restaurants and stores. The building is a historical site with two elevators.

Loft Iluminado dentro de la ciudad amurallada (piso 6), con exclusiva vista a la bahía, el mar y atardecer imposible de superar. A un paso de los mejores restaurantes y tiendas. Edificio de conservación con dos ascensores y planta eléctrica.

Vista y atardeceres asegurados en del edificio más alto de la ciudad amurallada. Iluminación natural gracias a sus amplios ventanales y techos altos. Si el clima lo permite, puede dejar todas las ventanas abiertas y disfrutar (día o noche) del sonido matutino de los pájaros, el arrullo del mar o la brisa marina. La ducha también tiene vista al mar, la cocina es abierta, hay lavadora/secadora dentro de la unidad y la cama es “kingsize”.

Acceso con recepción privada 24 horas, parqueadero público cubierto con costo dentro del edificio y cajero automático saliendo a mano izquierda.

Disponible en todo momento para resolver cualquier duda o inquietud en Español, Inglés, Italiano y Francés.

Ubicado en todo el corazón del sector amurallado, con fácil acceso a restaurantes, negocios y sitios de interés histórico y turístico. Caminando pocos minutos están las murallas que rodean la ciudad, el famoso teatro Adolfo Mejia, la Torre del Reloj y el Centro de Convenciones en el barrio Getsemaní.

Taxis seguros y permanentes fáciles de tomar a la salida del edificio. No se requiere transporte dentro de la ciudad amurallada, todo se puede hacer caminando.

Recomendaciones a su solicitud de los mejores restaurantes, bares, playas y actividades culturales en el área

name: Beautiful beachfront Apt in Bocagrande
summary: Stunning beach front apartment located in one of the most modern and exclusive buildings of the city, with a spectacular view of the Bay of Cartagena and the beach. Just 15 min walk  to the Old City and 5 minutes walk to Bocagrande mall and convenience stores.

description:
Stunning beach front apartment located in one of the most modern and exclusive buildings of the city, with a spectacular view of the Bay of Cartagena and the beach. Just 15 min walk  to the Old City and 5 minutes walk to Bocagrande mall and convenience stores.

Located on the 26th floor of exclusive building  Murano Elite Beach, close to Plaza Bocagrande Shopping Center with excellent stores, restaurants and cinema.

Perfect to go to the beach just across the street or enjoy the sensational infinity pool with 360 view of Cartagena in the last floor.

The apartment is equipped with two queen size bed, two TVs with satellite, WIFI Internet and two complete bathrooms with beautiful finishes and hot water.

The living room has a sofa bed and modern decoration, with a large terrace equipped with views towards Cartagena's bay to one side and the beach to the other.

It has a fully equipped kitchen and work area with washer-dryer.

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena, BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena.

15 min walk or 10 min drive to Old City.
5 min walk to convenience stores (Olimpica or Carulla)
5 min walk to drugstores (Farmatodo or Olimpica)
5 min walk to Bocagrande Mall

description:
NOMAD GURU provides a set of properties exclusive to our incomparable portfolio with the most diverse designs. Offering a local expert in each city for the best hospitality, meant for both business and leisure travel. With lodging for daily, weekly and monthly stays in the most strategic and convenient locations in Cartagena, Colombia. All of the residences are fully furnished and thrive to attain all budgets, needs, and preferences of our guest.

Luxurious TWO bedroom apartment with private Jacuzzi and beautiful panoramic view from the balcony. It is fully furnished with all the comforts and amenities necessary for a pleasant stay ; With living room, dinning area,   equipped with the main services, television, wifi, kitchen with all modern utensils and equipment. With access to common areas such as the infinity pool, private Jacuzzi, BBQ Zones, gym and Turkish bath. Located in a strategic area close to the square and places of interest, 2 blocks from the beach of los morros, 5 minutes from the airport and 8 minutes from the historic center of Cartagena, is close to the luxury Las Americas Hotel.

The apartment will be rented entirely to your group. You will be serviced with one set of linens and at least one towel per guest, fast and reliable WIFI as well as a fully equipped kitchen. Whether you are staying for one day, one week or one month we want to provide the best services for your group.

The apartment will be rented entirely to your group. You will be serviced with one set of linens and at least one towel per guest, fast and reliable WIFI as well as a fully equipped kitchen. Whether you are staying for one day, one week or one month we want to provide the best services for your group.

24/7 Contact with our guests to solve any questions or inconveniences before, during and after your stay. Our goal is to offer the most pleasant stay, for this reason, we can guide you in terms of location, leisure, and wellness, achieving day by day a direct compromise with our travelers!
additional_house_rules:
PROPERTY RULES:

1) Each guest must be registered 24 hours before the arrival and must show his Identity or Passport document at the building's entrance.
2) The DocuSign is a mandatory document and must be completed at least 72 hours before the arrival of the guest. DO NOT ENTER ANY GUEST WITHOUT THIS DOCUMENT AND WITHOUT HAVING REVISED PAYMENTS.
3) The entrance of visitors is not allowed.
4) No noises or loud music are allowed after 22:00 hrs.
5)The use of the apartment is only allowed for residential, business or leisure purposes, no meeting or parties of any type are allowed in the apartment.
The entrance of live musical groups to the property is not allowed.
6) Any damage caused to the apartment or property belongings must be notified to the company that provides the rental service and must be attended and fixed in less than 7 working days.
7) In case of fire, do not use the elevator.
8) It is strictly forbidden to smoke any type of substances in the premises of the building and in the apartment, including cigars and tobacco there is a $50.0 USD fee if you are found smoking inside.
9) It is not allowed to leave any type of articles or items with the security guards in the building.
10) It is forbidden to bring pets of any kind to the property.
11) To ensure the safety and tranquility of the guests and residents of the building, guests staying in our apartments will have a registry with a biometric control system. The administration will guarantee the confidentiality of personal data in accordance with the law.
12) It is mandatory by building regulations, acquire a handle during the stay at the property. The handle has a rate of $60.000 COP Per Apartment.
13) Sex tourism within the property is totally forbidden.
14) Children must always be accompanied by an adult.
15) Every time you leave the apartment, turn off the A/C, lights and leave the windows and the entrance door closed.
16) Please do not leave the keys inside the apartment. The door will be locked, preventing it from being opened from the outside. A locksmith brings an extra cost to you. Every additional set of keys has a cost of $25.0 USD.
17)To conserve the environment, we ask you to be responsible for the consumption of water and light.
18) The Terrace and BBQ Area of the co-ownership will be open until 12:00 A.M.
19) Please respect the maximum capacity of the Jacuzzis.
20) It is not allowed to consume food, drinks inside the pool.
21) Glass containers are prohibited in wet areas.
22) Please Shower before entering the pool and/or Jacuzzis.
23) Wear appropriate clothing for the use of wet areas.
24) Under no circumstances will babies be allowed to use the pools without the proper diaper, also called disposable underwear.
25) It is not allowed that the domiciliary goes up to the apartments or common areas, the resident must go down to reception to receive the order.
26) It is not allowed to place notices (signs), posters or posters on windows, doors, facades, elevators or on the common billboards of the building.
27) Security guards are not authorized to upload parcels to the apartments.
28) Security in the building is not responsible for any losses inside the apartment, we ask to close both locks well and make sure that the door is locked behind you. For your safety, there are surveillance cameras controlled by a private security company in the lobby and the elevators.
29) Do not throw rubbish, cigarette butts, and any type of objects through the windows or balconies of your apartments.
30) Garbage should be deposited in plastic bags duly sealed.
31) Check-out is at 11:00 a.m. Please throw the trash of the apartment in the chute and give the keys to the local expert. Make sure to let your Local Expert know your Check-Out time and leave the windows & door are secured.

*** MARTINIQUE COMMON AREAS USE REGULATION***
The common areas and wet areas will be available following a protocol and prior reservation to guarantee the protection of guests and inhabitants of the building against Covid 19; Please note the following:

- Wet areas such as swimming pools and Turkish Bath and common areas such as gym and playground, require a reservation that must be made directly at the reception where the people who will accompany you will be registered and one of the schedules that will be shown later will be chosen. Keep in mind that it must be reserved one day in advance and you will have to sign a health declaration form. 
The shifts available for each area are: 
POOL: Shift 1: from 09:00 am to 12:00 m, Shift 2: from 12:00 pm to 3:00 pm and shift 3: 3:00 pm to 6:00 pm.
 GYM AND TURKISH: (Maximum 2 people) 4 shifts per day from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m. - 10:00 a.m. to 12 p.m. - 1:00 p.m. to 3:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. - 6:00 p.m. The intervals of NO use will be used in disinfection and sanitation by the building personnel
 CHILDREN'S PARK: One shift per family will be assigned as follows: 01 shift: from 09:00 am to 12:00 noon, 02 shift: from 12:00 pm to 3:00 pm and 03 shift: 3:00 pm to 6:00 pm.
- When you are in these common spaces, you should always try to maintain a physical distance of 2 meters in relation to other guests, when you are not in the water you should keep the mask covering your nose and mouth.
-The temperature measurement must also be allowed before entering said spaces, do correct hand washing every 3 hours, have a kit containing at least 60% alcohol, do not share towels or personal items and follow all the recommendations provided by staff and building signage.
- Children must be in the company of their parents or an adult relative, domestic worker will not be allowed to enter the Social Zone.
-The entry of non-residents and people who are not registered as guests in the building is restricted.
- It is not allowed to hold social parties or to exchange or share pool areas with the other family once it has been used.
We wish you the best of your stays, Happy day!



*Please keep the noise down especially during weekdays and late at night. $150 USD fine
*Extra Cleaning services: $30 USD full day cleaning.
*Every guest must provide a copy of its passport or valid photo ID.
*As a company, we must collect and remit 19% VAT from each reservation that will be collected upon arrival. Tourists, foreigners, and residents in other countries are exempt from this tax. You must provide a valid passport.
Tourists, foreigners, and residents in other countries are exempt from this tax. You must provide a valid Passport.

Normas del edificio:

1) Cada huésped debe estar registrado 24 horas antes de la llegada y debe mostrar su documento de identidad o pasaporte en la entrada del edificio.
2) El DocuSign es un documento obligatorio y debe completarse al menos 72 horas antes de la llegada del huésped. NO INGRESA NINGÚN HUESPED SIN ESTE DOCUMENTO Y SIN HABER REVISADO LOS PAGOS.
3) La entrada de visitantes a la propiedad no está Permitida.
4) No se permiten ruidos ni música fuerte después de las 22:00 hrs.
5) El uso del apartamento solo está permitido para fines residenciales, de negocios o de placer, no se permiten reuniones o fiestas de ningún tipo en el apartamento. Tampoco
están permitidos grupos musicales en vivo.
6) Cualquier daño causado al apartamento o pertenencias a la propiedad debe ser notificado a la compañía que proporciona el servicio de alquiler y debe ser atendido y reparado en menos de 7 días hábiles.
7) En caso de incendio, no utilizar el ascensor.
8) Está estrictamente prohibido fumar cualquier tipo de sustancias en las instalaciones del edificio y en el apartamento, incluidos los cigarros y el tabaco. Hay una tarifa de $ 150.000 COP si se le encuentra fumando en el interior.
9) No está permitido dejar ningún tipo de artículos o artículos con los guardias de seguridad en el edificio.
10) Está prohibido traer mascotas de cualquier tipo a la propiedad.
11) Para garantizar la seguridad y tranquilidad de los huéspedes y residentes del edificio, los huéspedes que se alojen en nuestros apartamentos tendrán un registro con un sistema de control biométrico. La administración garantizará la confidencialidad de los datos personales de conformidad con la ley.
12) Es obligatorio por normas del edificio, adquirir una manilla durante la estadía en la propiedad. La manilla tiene una tarifa de $60.000 COP por Apartamento.
13) El turismo sexual dentro de la propiedad está totalmente prohibido.
14) Los niños deben estar acompañados por un adulto en todo momento.
15) Cada vez que salga del apartamento, apague el A / C, las luces y deje las ventanas y la puerta de entrada cerradas.
16) Por favor, no deje las llaves dentro del apartamento. La puerta estará cerrada con llave, evitando que se abra desde el exterior. Un cerrajero te trae un costo extra. Cada juego de llaves adicional tiene un costo de $ 75.000 COP.
17) Para conservar el medio ambiente, le pedimos que sea responsable del consumo de agua y luz.
18) Horario de la Terraza y Zona de BBQ de la copropiedad, esta estará abierta a hasta las 12:00 A.M.
19) Respetar la capacidad máxima de los Jacuzzis.
20) No está permitido consumir alimentos, bebidas dentro de la piscina.
21) Está prohibido los envases de vidrio en las zonas húmedas
22) Por favor ducharse antes de entrar a la piscina y/o jacuzzis.
23) Usar la vestimenta adecuada para el uso de las zonas húmedas
24) En ninguna circunstancia se permitirá que los bebes usen las piscinas sin el pañal adecuado denominado también calzoncito desechable.
25) No está permitido que los domiciliarios suban hasta los apartamentos o áreas comunes, el residente debe bajar hasta recepción a recibir el pedido.
26) No está permitido colocar avisos (letreros), afiches o carteles en las ventanas, puertas, fachadas, ascensores o en las carteleras comunes del edificio
27) Los guardas de seguridad no están autorizados a subir encomiendas a los apartamentos
28) La seguridad en el edificio no es responsable de las pérdidas dentro del apartamento. Pedimos que cierren bien ambas cerraduras y nos aseguramos de que la puerta esté cerrada con llave detrás de usted. Para su seguridad, hay cámaras de vigilancia controladas por una empresa de seguridad privada en el vestíbulo y los ascensores.
29) No arrojar basuras, colillas de cigarrillo, y ningún tipo de objetos por las ventanas o balcones de sus apartamentos.
30) Las basuras deben depositarse en bolsas de plástico debidamente selladas.
31) La salida es a las 11:00 a.m. Por favor, tire la basura del apartamento en la rampa y entregue las llaves al experto local. Asegúrese de informar a su experto local sobre su hora de salida y deje las puertas y ventanas aseguradas.

***REGLAMENTO USO DE ZONAS COMUNES MARTINIQUE***
Las áreas comunes y zonas húmedas estarán disponibles siguiendo un protocolo y previa reservación para garantizar la protección de huéspedes y habitantes del edificio contra el COVID 19; Por favor tenga en cuenta lo siguiente:
- Las zonas húmedas como piscinas y Baño Turco y zonas comunes como gimnasio y parque infantil, requieren de una reserva que debe hacerse directamente en la recepción donde se registrará las personas que lo acompañarán y se elegirá uno de los horarios que se mostrarán más adelante. Tenga muy en cuenta que se debe reservar con un día de anticipación y deberá firmar un formato de declaración de salud. Los turnos disponibles para cada área son:
PISCINA: Turno 1: de 09:00am a 12:00 m, Turno 2: de 12:00pm a 3:00pm y turno 3: 3:00pm a 6:00pm.
GIMNASIO Y TURCO: (Máximo 2 personas) 4 turnos por día en los horarios de 6:00 am a 9:00 am – 10:00 am a 12 m – 1:00pm a 3:00pm – 4:00pm – 6:00pm los intervalos de NO uso serán empleados en la desinfección y sanitización por parte del personal del edificio
PARQUE INFANTIL: Se asignará uno turno por familia turnos comprendidos así: 01 turno: de 09:00am a 12:00 m, 02 turno: de 12:00pm a3:00pm y 03 turno: 3:00pm a 6:00pm.
- Cuando se encuentre en estos espacios comunes se debe procurar por mantener siempre la distancia física de 2 metros con relación a otros huéspedes, cuando no se encuentra dentro del agua se debe mantener el tapabocas cubriendo nariz y boca.
-También se debe permitir la toma de la temperatura antes de ingresar a dichos espacios, hacer correcto lavado de manos cada 3 horas, contar con un kit que contenga alcohol mínimo al 60%, no compartir toallas ni objetos personales y seguir todas las recomendaciones brindadas por el personal y señalización del edificio.
- Los niños deben estar en compañía de sus padres o por familiar adulto, no se permitirá el ingreso a la Zona Social a empleadas domésticas.
-Está restringido el ingreso de personas NO residentes y personas que no estén registradas como huéspedes en el edificio.
- No está permitido realizar fiestas sociales como tampoco intercambiar o compartir áreas de piscinas con la otra familia una vez que haya sido usada.
¡Les deseamos la mejor de las estadías, Feliz día!

*Por favor, mantenga el ruido bajo especialmente durante los días de semana y tarde en la noche. Multa de $ 450.000 COP
* Servicios extra de limpieza: $ 90.000 COP por día completo de limpieza.
* Cada huésped debe proporcionar una copia de su pasaporte o identificación válida con foto.

name: Best Caribbean Sunsets! Seafront quiet 1BR 22Floor

1BR apartment, facing tierra bomba island, seafront, all new furniture, 2bathrooms, fully equiped Kitchen, 2 Smart TVs, everything arranged for a pleasant and quiet stay.

The place has been designed to have our guests enjoy their stay.

description:
Location Location Location....This luxurious 1 Bedroom (3 BED) apartment is within the Famous Walled City (Old town /Centro Historico) of Cartagena de Indias. A modern gem with a relaxing atmosphere.

- Safety: Gated complex with 24 hr security

- Air Conditioned apartment & bedroom, fully functioning Kitchen, Cable T.V. 

- 2 Swimming Pools. Sauna & Jacuzzi.

- Walk everywhere (Supermarket & Convenience Store, ATM, Restaurants, main attractions of the old town)

- Internet speed 15Mbs

This is a luxury gated complex with 24 security. The apartment is ideal for couples and families of 4. There is one king size bed and 2 sofa beds. There are two swimming pools (1 kids pool), saunas, jacuzzis, a gym, a massage / treatment room and an expansive rooftop from which to enjoy a vista of the Old Town.

Step outside the front door of the building and you are in the heart of the Famous Old town of Cartagena de Indias.

Pools, Gym, OutdoorJacuzzis, Social areas, rooftop.

I manage the property remotely with my Husband but my family and support team live in Cartagena and are always on hand to help when needed. My Husband and I will be on hand seasonally to help when needed.

Location, Location, Location...... there aren't many better options for your visit to Cartagena de Indias. The apartment has a prime location within the Famous Walled City. 

The Apartment building is unique in that it was built on the former residence of the Viceroy ‘El Virrey Eslava’ who lived here between 1740 and 1750.

Santa Clara Hotel and Gabo Garcia Marquez’s mansion are round the corner. The Famous Bastion Luxury hotel is on the same street.

Walk everywhere -  all the top restaraunts and cafes are close by. Convenient Stores and ATM and Supermarket (approx 100 metres away).

for a video of the building go - http://casadelvirreyeslava.com/apartamentos/alquiler/01.html

Walk, Bike, Taxi.

All guests will be required to show their ID on entry to the apartment, the host will also ask you for these details so we can pass it on to the building administrators in advance of check-in. 


COVID Protocols - for your safety and the safety of others 

Use of the Gym and Swimming pools require a booking. Contact the host in advance to arrange your desired time and to ensure you get access. We cannot guarantee you will have access to the Swimming pool, Jacuzzi or Gym, it us subject to bookings.

- The soliciting of Sex and illegal drug use are not permitted in this apartment.

CHECK IN /OUT
Check out is at 11am. It may be later if required but this will depend on the arrival time of the proceeding guest. Same applies for check in (13.00).

name: Spectacular 21st Floor 2 Bedroom Condo!
summary:
Perfect 2 bedroom apt in the 21st floor of one of the newest, most representative building in Cartagena. Big living room, 3 bathrooms, great kitchen, and a huge balcony with a spectacular view over the Cartagena beach and the city center on the far right. 
Perfect for family or friends vacation or a business trip. Apt is suitable for 1 - 6 guests max. There is a queen bed in the main bedroom, two single beds in second bedroom with retractable beds beneath them.
Looking forward to hosting you!

description:
Perfect 2 bedroom apt in the 21st floor of one of the newest, most representative building in Cartagena. Big living room, 3 bathrooms, great kitchen, and a huge balcony with a spectacular view over the Cartagena beach and the city center on the far right. 
Perfect for family or friends vacation or a business trip. Apt is suitable for 1 - 6 guests max. There is a queen bed in the main bedroom, two single beds in second bedroom with retractable beds beneath them.
Looking forward to hosting you!

It's one of the most beautiful, elegant and perfectly located building and apartment in Cartagena. Everything in the apartment is completely new and thought especially to make your stay here perfect! There is a queen bed in the main bedroom and two single beds in the second bedroom with retractable beds beneath them. These beds can be joined to form a big bed for two if needed! The apartment if fully equipped.
You will love staying here!

The apartment has: Fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, towels, sheets, iron, hair dryer and very nice carefully selected furniture in the entire apartment.

I will not be available in person but I have staff that helps me with everything in Cartagena. I'll be always on top of what is happening. So you can call me or write me and I'll send someone to check in case you need help with anything.

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 5-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

Only the people registered in the apartment are the ones allowed in the building. To register someone you must send me full names 24 hours before arrival. This apartment can register maximum 6 people in total

name: Stylish Sunset View Apartment, Palmetto Sunset
summary: In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, hot water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV'S and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 1 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, hot water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV'S and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 68 sqm with a wonderful view over the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. It can accommodate up to 4 persons with its 1 bedroom(s) and a bed sofa in the living room. Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and in the building you will find the parking for free*. The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling where you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area, the comfy sofa & SMART TV. The apartment has 2 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing sea view! This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. 
For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". 
*Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. The building is very modern, has two unique pools, one on the main floor along the ocean and one on the rooftop where you also find the Jacuzzi (on the 43rd floor). There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking, gym and three elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don´t hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, just beside the main entrance where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
 
2. BUILDING FEE: 10,000 COP (approx. $2,90 USD) per person & has to be payed to the building, you pay the fee in my office.

3. WRISTBAND: Palmetto Sunset wristband must be worn over time (for access). Lost or removed wristband will be charged by the building.
 
4. MINORS: Minors must be accompanied by at least one of their parents presenting the minors identification in original. For Colombian minors "registro civil" in original or ID has to be shown and both parents has to be present. If only one parent are present an authorization in written from the parent (not present) has to be shown.

5. PETS: are allowed only if an "emotional support animal" certification can be shown.
 
6. SOCIAL AREAS: 
Pool 1st floor      10:00AM-06:00PM  (Wednesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
Pool 43rd floor  09:00AM-06:00PM (Tuesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
GYM                       07:00AM-06:00PM (Friday 07:00AM-12:00PM)
SAUNA                 09:00AM-06:00PM (Let reception know 15 min before)

7. ENVIRONMENT: At anytime you leave the apartment make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet. Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena S.A.S is authorized to enter at any time and turn them off. It's not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. Please save water and light as much as possible and please take care of your waste and garbage (especially when out in the nature like the beach or if you visit the islands) even if you see locals or other tourist not respecting this.

8. ADDITIONAL SERVICES: Cleaning services or cooking are available upon request for an extra fee, please ask us.

9. PARKING: If you need parking, you must inform us before your arrival.
 
10. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters. 

11. You must inform me immediately if there is something you feel is not fulfilling with the listing details so that we can fix it in the best possible way as soon as possible.
 
12. All the rules of the building and local law must be respected.

13. Read the "Additional rules" before confirm the last step of the reservation.

*1 night stays can be negotiated*

Perfect location for visitors to Cartagena. In the heart of the Old Town, just off San Diego Plaza & the famous Santa Clara Hotel. This modern building is unique and has a lovely relaxed vibe. A beautiful sanctuary inside the famous walls of a busy Cartagena. The apartment is modern, spacious and clean. The 2 swimming pools have great views and are perfect for cooling down in under the Caribbean sun. Along with the Super King size bed there are two sofa beds that in total can accommodate 4 people. 

The building has 24 hr security with very professional and friendly ‘Porteros’ (Door-men) who are always willing to help guests. Very Safe area.

The newly opened ‘La Serrezuela’ is on the same street, 1/2 block away. Designer stores, great restaurants - a big attraction for visitaros to the old town of Cartagena de Indias.

2 swimming pools.
Balcony overlooking green courtyard. 
Common / reception area.
Washing and Drying Machines.

Email or call / text. Free pick up from airport if required and we are available.

El Centro Histórico de Cartagena  (The Walled City) is a World UNESCO Heritage Site. It has the most extensive fortification in South America

This luxurious apartment & building complex are situated in the heart of the walled city, just steps away from San Diego plaza & the famous Santa Clara Hotel. Exito supermarket (Food, beer, ATM etc) is one block away. The walls of the old town Cartagena are also only one block away - great vantage point for Sunset Lovers! The area is very safe. 

La Serrezuela has just opened up it is a mere 1/2 a block away. There is high demand for this apartment.

Walk, Cycle, Taxi

COVID Protocols - for your safety and the safety of others

neighborhood_overview:
El Centro Histórico de Cartagena  (The Walled City) is a World UNESCO Heritage Site. It has the most extensive fortification in South America

This luxurious apartment & building complex are situated in the heart of the walled city, just steps away from San Diego plaza & the famous Santa Clara Hotel. Exito supermarket (Food, beer, ATM etc) is one block away. The walls of the old town Cartagena are also only one block away - great vantage point for Sunset Lovers! The area is very safe. 

La Serrezuela has just opened up it is a mere 1/2 a block away. There is high demand for this apartment.
notes:
All guests will be required to show their ID on entry to the apartment, the host will also ask you for these details so we can pass it on to the building administrators in advance of check-in. 


COVID Protocols - for your safety and the safety of others 

Use of the Gym and Swimming pools require a booking. Contact the host in advance to arrange your desired time and to ensure you get access. We cannot guarantee you will have access to the Swimming pool, Jacuzzi or Gym, it us subject to bookings.
additional_house_rules:
WHO CAN ENTER THE APARTMENT?
 - Only those who are named on the reservation prior to check-in have permission to enter the apartment.  
- Guests are not permitted to invite others to stay over. 
- No persons under 18 may enter the apartment unless they are a family member of the main guest
- The soliciting of Sex and illegal drug use are not permitted in this apartment.

CLEANING: The host will supply a cleaner free of charge during your stay. The number of visits will be determined by the host, the schedule for visits will be made in agreement with the guest.

Smoking is prohibited in this apartment / No puedes Fumar en este apartamento.

CHECK IN /OUT
Check out is at 11am. It may be later if required but this will depend on the arrival time of the proceeding guest. Same applies for check in (13.00).
interaction: Email or call / text. Free pick up from airport if required and we are available.

2 swimming pools.
Balcony overlooking green courtyard. 
Common / reception area.
Washing and Drying Machines.

name: Brand New 2 BD Bayview Exclusive Condo H2 / Hyatt
summary:
This is a brand new condo listed for the first time in March 2020.

The H2 Condominium has the Luxurious benefits of Hotel life with your own fully equipped condo, connected to the Hyatt Regency, the BocaGrande Mall, and a Supermarket for easy and comfortable living. 

The amenities in the H2 are spectacular with an Infinity Pool, Fitness Center, Steam Bath, Sauna, BBQ Zone and Parking Space.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Heating,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Paid parking off premises,Paid parking on premises,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Host greets you,Cleaning before checkout,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Waterfront,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm
description:
This is a brand new condo listed for the first time in March 2020.

The H2 Condominium has the Luxurious benefits of Hotel life with your own fully equipped condo, connected to the Hyatt Regency, the BocaGrande Mall, and a Supermarket for easy and comfortable living. 

The amenities in the H2 are spectacular with an Infinity Pool, Fitness Center, Steam Bath, Sauna, BBQ Zone and Parking Space.

This condo is a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom with sleeper sofa. 

The Master Bedroom has a Queen Bed, Walk-in Closet, and large private Bathroom. The Second Bedroom has a Queen Bed and Closet. A Guest Bathroom with Shower is in front of it. All the Bedrooms have electronic blackouts and access to the balcony.

The open concept Living Room / Kitchen has a Dining Room Table, Sleeper Sofa, Smart TV (Netflix, Youtube, Apps), and Fully Equipped Kitchen.

The Condo has floor to ceiling windows which create a very luminous and open space with an ample balcony with beautiful views of the San Felipe Castle, Naval Base, and the Sunrise over the Bay.

The Long Balcony is connected to every room. It has a Dining Room Table, Lounge Chair, and 2 Person Sofa. During the morning hours the Sun hits the balcony but after 11 am it's shaded making it very comfortable to sit outside with a drink and watch the Cruise Ships go in and out of the Bay!

The Condo is decorated with some Original Art made by Brittany herself. Please message with inquiries about purchasing the art in the condo.

The Condo has 1 Parking Space and there is more paid parking on the premises.

Pool, Fitness Center, Sauna, BBQ Zone, Parking Space.

We live in Bogota and will not be available face to face however, we are just a phone call or text message away in case you need anything. We speak English and Spanish.

Helia is the woman who helps us out. She will be there to check you in and out (give you the keys and show you some things about the condo).

I (Brittany) am an American and have been living in Bogotá for 5.5 years. Cartagena is one of my favorite places in Colombia and a place I am lucky to visit often. If you have any questions related to travel or life in Colombia, I am happy to help!!

Access to a supermarket and a mall is connected right to the H2 building, giving you a variety of eating options. The Old City is just a 5 minute cab ride away ($8,000 Pesos - $2.50 USD). Cabs who work with the H2 sit right outside the entrance for easy and fast access.

You can walk around Bocagrande easily, we like to jog down to the end in the mornings on the ocean side. Cabs are the best way to get around.

If you need extra cleaning during your stay, please let us know and we can arrange for the maid to come. You will need to pay her when she goes $20 ($60,000 pesos) for a full day.

Please turn off the air conditioner when you check-out.

Please keep in mind that the stove is gas and you should be mindful not to leave one of the knobs open.

summary: Incredible apartment in Cartagena with direct access and views to the beach. It is very cozy and has a very well equipped kitchen, high ceilings, and comfortable beds. It has Wifi, hot water, TV cable. It is suitable for couples, groups (8), business men, families with kids and pets. Please note that guests 7 and 8 have an extra cost per night that is already charged when you make your reservation in Airbnb.

The building has direct access to the beach, pool and gym, 24 H surveilance (very secure building and neighborhood).

Available 100% to any requirements/questions you may have.

The exclusive neighborhood is the only one with direct access from the buildings to the beach. It is located 5 minutes from the airport and the city center.

The property has parking for people arriving by vehicle. In addition, the road in front of the building has public service routes available. Taxi service can be requested at the concierge.

The schedule is not strict, we should just coordinate to give you and other guests an excellent service. Every guest has to pay a bracelet at the reception worth USD 7 that allows you to use the common areas and control the access in/out of the building to the beach. (This is just for the adults, kids and guests that go for the day don´t have to buy it). The extra cost per night for guests 7 and 8 is arround USD 10 that is charged when you make your reservation through Airbnb.

Hermoso apartamento de dos habitaciones,  la habitacion principal cuenta  con una cama king size y un sofacama y la otra habitacion cuenta con dos camas, ademas el apartamento tambien tiene una hamaca para relajarse.  El apartamento cuenta con un balcon grande con vista al mar,  la playa y la picina.

El edificio cuenta con una increible piscina con borde infinito que tiene su vista hacia el mar Caribe, ademas de tener un gimnasio totalmente dotado, jacuzzis, sauna, turco, zona de bbq y parqueadero propio.

Los huespedes se pueden contactar por via telefonica al numero +573102771571 o whatsapp.

Este apartamento esta ubicado en una zona rodeada de restaurantes, supermercados, ademas de contar con un facil acceso a transporte.  Supermercado a una cuadra.

El apartamento esta ubicado a tan solo 5 minutos del aeropuerto en taxi y 3 minutos de la ciudad amurallada en automovil o 20 minutos caminando.

name: ESCAPADA AL MAR! Bioseguridad, Home Office
summary:
Estamos cambiando para ti, comprometidos en darte garantía de un servicio de calidad en un espacio seguro, adaptamos nuestro protocolo de seguridad a las medidas exigidas por el gobierno, estamos limpiando con hipoclorito de sodio al 75% en lencería, y al 100% baños y pisos.
Tengo el placer de presentar un espacio definido con confort cariño una vista espectacular sobre el mar, balcón gigante vista a 180 grados, que rebota sobre la vista Marina y se pierde sin final en el mar.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Dryer,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Single level home,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Waterfront,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
Estamos cambiando para ti, comprometidos en darte garantía de un servicio de calidad en un espacio seguro, adaptamos nuestro protocolo de seguridad a las medidas exigidas por el gobierno, estamos limpiando con hipoclorito de sodio al 75% en lencería, y al 100% baños y pisos.
Tengo el placer de presentar un espacio definido con confort cariño una vista espectacular sobre el mar, balcón gigante vista a 180 grados, que rebota sobre la vista Marina y se pierde sin final en el mar.

Comprometidos en darte garantía de un servicio de bioseguridad estamos cambiando para ti nuestros espacios son tratados con hipoclorito de sodio al 75% en lencería,  y 100% baños y pisos. ,  las house keeeping portan uniforme se seguridad y manejan toda la dotación del protocolo requerida por el gobierno para esta pandemia.

Ubicado en piso 31 ofrece una maravillosa vista al océano sin fin, donde usted se sentirá en un crucero cinco estrellas,  en una suite de lujo de 2 alcobas con esplendida decoración caribeña  cocina integrada para compartir el ritual culinario, servicio de comedor abierto en el balcón, disfrutar maravillosas comidas con fresca brisa mar, una sala de gran tamaño para compartir con sus huéspedes, las alcobas y los baños siguen la espectacular vista marina, acondicionados con lencería de calidad, toallas y servicio de amenities completos como shampoo, rinse jabón de manos,  jabón  de cuerpo, todos los detalles al que usted está acostumbrado para que su experiencia sensorial se complementa con el confort que brinda el apto !!!

Nuestro edificio cambio para estar a la medida de lo que ordena el gobierno en bioseguridad, encontrara en la recepcion kit de desifeccion personal, los guardas de seguridad tienen el protocolo para cuidar de usted y cuidar a ellos,  siempre con tapabocas, guantes y un buen gel al 65% del alcohol para desifeccion.  Cambiamos los protocolos de aseo en areas comunes para optimizar la desifeccion, acojiendonos a la normas del gobierno para coopropiedades en funcionamiento para momentos de pandemia, contamos con dispensadores de gel al 75% de alcohol en los ascensores. el personal de aseo cumple con sus normas de seguridad personal.

El edificio ofrece servicios semi-hoteleros de alta calidad,  por su diseño arquitectónico novedoso y   nuevo  en impecables condiciones, moderno con 32 pisos se presenta imponente a sus huéspedes en primera línea sobre el mar,  todos los aptos son exteriores  brindando una vista espectacular en cada uno de  los apartamentos.
Se ingresa por un estupendo lobby con doble altura espejo de agua interna y aire acondicionado comunicando de inmediato confort en el huésped,  complementa un recibimiento de confort y buen gusto.
Dentro de sus generosos servicios  piscina sin fin sobre el océano,  dotada con asoleadoras  y  salas para cada grupo de visitantes,  piscina infantil,  dos jacuzzi  con agua caliente,  turco,  sauna y completo gimnasio,  BBQ,  tenis de mesa,  completa batería de baños de piscina,  baños de ingreso al edificio desde la playa,  para que usted pueda ingresar sin arena al edificio. Estos servicios estarán disponibles a discreción de las medidas del gobierno y de la administración para conjuntos residenciales hasta superar la situación de pandemia por covid  19! Favor consultar si estos servicios están en funcionamiento.

Siempre podrá contar con migo cuando lo requiera,  está detrás de usted un completo equipo a su servicio respaldando su estadía , desde la reserva hasta el final de su visita,  yo vivo en Cartagena y estoy muy cerca de usted así que si me necesita con mucho estoy para colaborar, de forma rápida y precisa.

Lo mejor del barrio es estar en primera linea sobre el mar , salir de su edificio y estar a 10 metros de el mar,  es una zona de playa por excelencia el barrio está en la zona de Marbella,   fue escogido por la cadena internacional  Ibis para su hotel en cartagena  brinda a la comunidad el servicio de restaurante con desayunos y almuerzos buffet  y cenas a la carta,  tambien detras del edificio hay una completa zona de carritos de comida a  precios y calidad buena que le ofrece variedad de sushi , hamburguesas,  carnes, pastas y pizzas, en este momento de pandemia estos servicio no se estan prestando-
Contamos con supermercados en la zona a una cuadra y  media sobre la avenida Supermercado  Ara  y el otro es el Megatiendas un poco más retirado a 15 minutos a pie, también servicios de domicilios y con tarjeta de la tienda del barrio y estamos muy bien surtidos de domicilio 24 horas en droguerias

El transporte en la zona resulta ser muy cómodo por su ubicación estratégica,  lo lleva a cualquier sitio de interés  entre 5 y 10 minutos con un costo promedio  maravilloso para su presupuesto,  entre $ 2 y  $ 3 dólares por recorrido !!!
De destacar la cercanía al aeropuerto a 5 minutos de distancia  y trayecto $ 5 dolares!!

En este momento de crisis mundial por la pandemia del covid 19 tomamos la mayor prudencia para no afectar el desarrollo de la recuperacion personal y mundial y podamos terminar este periodo con exito #QUEDATEENCASA#

Puede causar daños severos en la puerta principal y serán cargados al huésped.

name: Modern Oceanfront 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom
summary: Our stunning apartment is located in a one of the tallest modern buildings in Cartagena. It is a great place to spend a vacation with friends and family. One of the best features of the apartment is its stunning views of the sea and direct beach access.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Wifi,Kitchen,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm
description:
Our stunning apartment is located in a one of the tallest modern buildings in Cartagena. It is a great place to spend a vacation with friends and family. One of the best features of the apartment is its stunning views of the sea and direct beach access.

The breathtaking views of the historical neighborhoods of Cartagena and the ocean from each room in the apartment makes it the perfect place to relax. There is quality air conditioning in each of the rooms so that you can escape the peak heat momenta of the day. There is fast Wifi throughout the apartment so that you can stay connected if you need to communicate with folks back home. Upon arrival, we will make sure you are met by our friendly property manager who is happy to answer any of your questions.

The apartment can host up to 6 people comfortably. The master bedroom has a comfortable queen bed, walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom with hot water. There are also black out curtains which allow you to sleep in until noon.

The second bedroom has two twin beds which can be made into a king or can be used separately. The room comes with a spacious closet, safe for your belongings, and en-suite bathroom. It also has one pullout twin bed. 

Each bedroom and the living room have a TV for guests to use. The living room, dining room and kitchen are very spacious and welcoming for group interaction.

 There is a washing machine/dryer tower in the laundry room as well as an ironing board and iron. 

You can definitely count on finding great connectivity in the condo since we have high speed internet and cable in each room.

Relax at the infinity pool which faces the ocean, or take a dip in the Jacuzzi. Guests have access to the pools located on the 6th floor. The beach is a short elevator ride away. Security in the building is excellent and the neighborhood is extremely safe so you can enjoy your vacation.

Guests have access to the entire apartment, it is their apartment during their stay and therefore we ask that they please treat it like they would treat their own home.

I can be as hands on as possible or completely hands off, it’s up to you, but I honestly like to make things easier for you here in Cartagena. I know the city like the back of my hand and would be more than happy to give you some tips about the neighborhood when you arrive. I also am glad to answer any questions about your travels plans during your stay in Cartagena. Whether you are on your own or with a large group, I make myself available to you.

The neighborhood offers a wide selection of excellent restaurants, from typical Colombian dishes to some of the best barbequed steak in town. There is even a Juan Valdez Cafe right next to the building in case you need some Colombian coffee or something for breakfast in the morning. There are also designer shops, malls, movie theaters and casinos only a few steps away.

You will find three 24-hour grocery stores within 2 blocks of the apartment. There is also a convenience store next door and a pharmacy across the street.

The walled city or "Centro" is only 5 minutes away by taxi. The taxi fare is about $3.00 USD. There are always taxis waiting across the street or if you want, the doorman can help you hail one.

Please be aware that the Cartagena heat and humidity is quite strong, and therefore it is best to keep windows and balcony doors closed, so that the AC units can do their job effectively at keeping the property nice and cool.

All guests need to show government issued ID upon check-in to the doorman. Please note that due to Covid, the building administration is not allowing daily visitors in to the building at this time, only registered guests have access to the condo and pool area. 

If you have any questions about the rules, please ask.

There is even a Juan Valdez Cafe right next to the building in case you need some Colombian coffee or something for breakfast in the morning. There are also designer shops, malls, movie theaters and casinos only a few steps away.

You will find three 24-hour grocery stores within 2 blocks of the apartment. There is also a convenience store next door and a pharmacy across the street.

Tendrás acceso a zonas comunes de lujo del hotel con 3 piscinas, jacuzzis panorámicos con vista infinita al mar y la ciénaga, 2 restaurantes, bar, gimnasio, spa, cancha de tenis y acceso directo a las playas en la Boquilla. A tan solo 7 minutos del centro amurallado.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Indoor fireplace,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Beach essentials,Hot water,Crib,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Lockbox,Private entrance,Cleaning before checkout,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
Apartamento de exclusivo y lujoso diseño interior con espectacular vista al atardecer y al mar, ubicado dentro del Hotel Sonesta (5 stars), La zona norte es la zona turística y hotelera de mayor proyección en Cartagena. Tendrás acceso a zonas comunes de lujo del hotel con 3 piscinas, jacuzzis panorámicos con vista infinita al mar y la ciénaga, 2 restaurantes, bar, gimnasio, spa, cancha de tenis y acceso directo a las playas en la Boquilla. A tan solo 7 minutos del centro amurallado.

Nuestro apartamento es un mar de detalles y lujos donde podrá disfrutar de una tranquila vista al mar y hermosos atardeceres que caen sobre el, iluminado, fresco y muy placentero, con todas las amenidades de lujo que mereces. El apartamento consta de: Sala con SMART TV 50" 4K con mas de 200 canales premium HD, Netflix e internet 20 megas para su entretenimiento, cocina integral con todos los electrodomésticos, Area de labores con lavadero, lavadora, secadora y plancha, 2 habitaciones con aire acondicionado en cada uno, totalmente dotadas con sabanas y toallas, colchónes con Pillow para perfecto descanso y 4 almohadas en cada cama, Smart TV 50" 4K y caja fuerte en la principal. 2 baños con ducha desde el techo, agua caliente, secadora y plancha de cabello para las mujeres. Lo mejor esta en el balcón con vista al mar que consta de: Comedor 8 puestos, sala lounge en mimbre, sillas Acapulco mecedoras, hamaca y un hermoso jardín vertical con veraneras que colinda con la habitación principal.

El edificio cuenta con: Lobby tipo hotel con conserje y botones, restaurante 24 horas, bar, 2 piscinas adultos, piscina para niños, Jacuzzis panorámicos (piso 14) con vista infinita al mar y a la ciénaga de la Virgen, cancha de tenis, gimnasio dotado, spa, zona social, seguridad 24 horas, supermaket 24 horas con domicilio al apartamento, cajero (BBVA), transporte publico y privado muy seguro.

Puede hacer uso de todas las areas y elementos privados del apartamento, ademas de todas las amenidades de lujo del hotel.

Estaremos muy pendientes de su estadía 24/7 puede contactarnos para cualquier duda, inquietud o recomendaciones de restaurantes y planes durante su viaje. Nuestra conserje Maricela se encargara de entregar las llaves y explicarte algunos tips de la ciudad.

El apartamento está ubicado en el edificio Seaway 935, dentro del Hotel Sonesta (5 estrellas) en la zona norte de Cartagena. El lugar es zona turística con edificios y hoteles frente al Mar Caribe y de mayor proyección en Cartagena, comparte la misma localidad de playa de los hoteles más prestigiosos de la Ciudad. Nuestros huéspedes pueden disfrutar de los restaurantes y bares de los hoteles. Ciclorutas y senderos peatonales para trote se encuentran frente al edificio, ademas cuenta con acceso directo a las playas de La Boquilla. A tan solo 7 minutos del centro amurallado ($4 USD in taxi) y 5 minutos del aeropuerto internacional ($4 USD in taxi).

Podrá disfrutar de todas las zonas comunes de lujo del hotel con 3 piscinas, jacuzzis panorámicos con vista infinita al mar y la ciénaga, 2 restaurantes, bar, gimnasio, spa, cancha de tenis y acceso directo a las playas en la Boquilla donde podía disfrutar de la famosa y autentica Arepa'e huevo o un delicioso almuerzo de pescado preparado por los nativos. Si lo suyo son los deportes náuticos, en la misma playa podrá tomar clases de kitesurf o rentar un yetski. Si disfruta del deporte podrá trotar por la playa o senderos peatonales, o pedalear por las ciclorutas de la zona.

Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio. Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio, a su llrgada sólo deben presentar su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio, deberan portarla durante su estadía y asi podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin inconvenientes. Lo hacemos por seguridad en el edificio. No se aceptan visitantes. En caso de tener algún visitante durante su estadía por favor enviar los datos de la o las personas antes de su llegada con nombre y número de identificacion para ser registrados.

additional_house_rules:
We appreciate you treating our property as you would your own.  

Please bear in mind this is a residential building. Tenants appreciate the tranquility and we kindly ask you to avoid disturbing our neighbors with excessive noise or unruly behavior.  

NOISE

To be considerate to our neighbors, we kindly ask to keep things on the quieter-side after 9pm.

ADDITIONAL GUESTS: POSITIVELY NO WALK-INS

For security all apartment guests need to be authorized and reported to the building administration in writing. Additional guests not reported 48 hours before check in won't be authorized to enter the building.

NO SMOKING

We ask you to refrain from smoking. We would like to keep our apartment smoke free for future guests.

ILLICIT DRUGS

In respect of Colombian law we have a strict No Drug use policy. Please don't ruin your holiday by getting in trouble with the police.

ELECTRICITY

We kindly ask that you switch off A/C, fans and lights when not in use. Mother nature thanks you too.
interaction: Estaremos muy pendientes de su estadía 24/7 puede contactarnos para cualquier duda, inquietud o recomendaciones de restaurantes y planes durante su viaje. Nuestra conserje Maricela se encargara de entregar las llaves y explicarte algunos tips de la ciudad.
access: Puede hacer uso de todas las areas y elementos privados del apartamento, ademas de todas las amenidades de lujo del hotel.
transit: Podrá disfrutar de todas las zonas comunes de lujo del hotel con 3 piscinas, jacuzzis panorámicos con vista infinita al mar y la ciénaga, 2 restaurantes, bar, gimnasio, spa, cancha de tenis y acceso directo a las playas en la Boquilla donde podía disfrutar de la famosa y autentica Arepa'e huevo o un delicioso almuerzo de pescado preparado por los nativos. Si lo suyo son los deportes náuticos, en la misma playa podrá tomar clases de kitesurf o rentar un yetski. Si disfruta del deporte podrá trotar por la playa o senderos peatonales, o pedalear por las ciclorutas de la zona.

name: TU CASA EN MORROS EPIC
summary: Vive la tranquilidad de un apartamento ubicado a 5 minutos de la ciudad amurallada, pensando para que Usted pase unos días tranquilos  en sus  vacaciones o viajes laborales, le ofrecemos un amplío balcón frente al mar,  desde que abres la puerta de entrada del apto apreciaras una hermosa vista al mar, además la ubicación del condominio te ofrece  salida directa al mar sin el peligro de cruzar calles con automóviles.

description:
Vive la tranquilidad de un apartamento ubicado a 5 minutos de la ciudad amurallada, pensando para que Usted pase unos días tranquilos  en sus  vacaciones o viajes laborales, le ofrecemos un amplío balcón frente al mar,  desde que abres la puerta de entrada del apto apreciaras una hermosa vista al mar, además la ubicación del condominio te ofrece  salida directa al mar sin el peligro de cruzar calles con automóviles.

El apartamento cuenta con 2 alcobas cada una con su baño y aire acondicionado, 1 alc consta de cama king, vestier, tv,  salida directa a la terraza con una vista directa al mar que podrás disfrutar acostado desde la cama,  en la sala  un sofa tipo L de 5 puestos y comodo futon, 1 aire acondicionado, tv, en la segunda alcoba  4 camas sencillas, salida a la terraza y vista al mar, el apto esta completamente equipado para 6 personas con toallas de baño y de playa, sabanas, almohadas. La cocina completamente equipada con vajilla,  cubiertos, vasos, ollas, sartenes, licuadora, microondas, cafetera, sanduchera etc, servicio de tv por clable e internet WiFi, amplia terraza, mesa de comedor, el apto tiene una excelente ubicacion por lo que es muy claro y a la vez protegido del fuerte sol.

El condominio te ofrece la privacidad de 3 piscinas espectaculares, jacuzzi, gimnasio, baño turco, asoleadoras, recepción con vigilante privado 24 horas a su servicio.

Los huéspedes siempre que se pueda de acuerdo a la hora de llegada serán recibidos por mi o por una persona de mi confianza para despejar cualquier duda que tengan al recibir el apto. En lo posible salvo el caso que sea necesario los molestamos, pero si estamos disponibles cada que ellos lo requieran ya que la consigna es que esten bien atendidos.

El vecindario o la zona en que se encuentra ubicado el  edificio es de las mas tranquilas de la ciudad, encuentras restaurantes para todos los gustos y precios, tales como Blas el teso,  Erre en el hotel Las Américas, y en los hoteles Holiday inn, Sonesta y Radisson, y otros mas populares como Donde Javier, Morros 922, y kiosco en la playa con pescado fresco, encontraras droguerias y supermercados a pocos metros tales como ARA, Éxito Express y las populares tiendas, además de que  llegan servicios a domicilio desde toda la ciudad. Los turistas que nos visiten desde ahora cuentan con  PLAYA AZUL  La Boquilla, primera playa con una Bandera Azul del país, se encuentra ubicada en la Vía al Mar, a pocos metros del edificio donde encontrará un escenario seguro, con canchas para deportes de arena, atención médica, baños y otros equipamientos y la posibilidad de practicar deportes acuáticos con todas las las garantías de seguridad

Respetando la Constitución y las leyes, y por tratarse de espacio público, el uso de la playa para todo el mundo es gratuito y opera  de domingo a domingo de 8 de la mañana a 6 de la tarde.

La movilidad para los que vienen sin automóvil puede ser en taxi o transporte público que pasa por el frente del edificio.

Las mascotas se aceptan siempre y cuando sean pequeñas y bien educadas. 

Los huespedes deben cancelar a su llegada 3 mil pesos por persona por unas manillas que cobra el edificio y que deben portar para su identificación y 40 mil pesos como suplemento de limpieza que son usados para el aseo de salida les entrego limpio me entregan limpio.

Vacacionar en Cartagena es un lujo y estar en un condominio que ofrece todo para su descanso y tranquilidad no tiene precio... los esperamos!!!
