name: Amazing Oceanfront 2 Bedroom Apt in Bocagrande
summary: Welcome to our beautiful vacation home! This two bedroom two bathroom condo has an amazing view of the beach and the sunset. It is also the perfect place to spend a vacation with family or friends. I am happy to help you with any questions prior to arrival to make sure you have an amazing time in Cartagena.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Wifi,Kitchen,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm
description:
Welcome to our beautiful vacation home! This two bedroom two bathroom condo has an amazing view of the beach and the sunset. It is also the perfect place to spend a vacation with family or friends. I am happy to help you with any questions prior to arrival to make sure you have an amazing time in Cartagena.

Enjoy the espectacular view out on the balcony and watch the sunset or head down to one of the multiple pools or Jacuzzi. The Bocagrande beach is literally out front and you only need to cross the street. In the condo you will have access to hot water in each bathroom, air conditioning in every room as well as a TV in each bedroom. In the main bedroom, there are two comfortable twin beds that make a full king and an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. You will get a gorgeous view of the ocean from the bed and, in case you want to sleep in, there are blackout curtains.
The second bedroom has a full bed and a twin bed with an en-suite bathroom. The apartment accommodates 5 guests comfortably in beds with one person sleeping on the sofa bed in the living room.


The fully stocked kitchen is easily accessible to the whole group. The apartment also comes with a modern washer/dryer unit. You can come and go as you please since there are friendly doormen on duty 24/7 to let you in and out of the building.

Feel free to use the condo as you would your own home. You have full access to the entire condo. The pools and jacuzzi are available to guests as well as well as the parking garage.

I’m happy to be directly involved throughout your stay, or I can be in the background and completely out of the picture; it’s totally your call.  Whether you are solo or with a group, my primary goal is that you have a great stay and have fun. I also have a local property manager to help you check in and on call in case of emergencies.

Bocagrande is one of the safest neighborhoods of Cartagena. The Hampton Inn and Sheraton are only blocks away. There are many great restaurants in the area from quick healthy snack shops to well-known spots that are famous for their steaks, seafood, and international cuisine.
The Juan Valdez Cafe on the corner is a must for real, delicious Colombian coffee. You can find a drugstore across the street, a convenience store around the corner, and 3 fully stocked supermarkets that are three blocks away and open 24-hours a day.

The old city or Centro is only a 5-minute taxi ride away, which is about $2.50USD. You can catch a taxi right outside the building 24/7.

All guests need to show government issued ID upon check-in to the doorman. Please note that due to Covid, the building administration is not allowing daily visitors in to the building at this time, only registered guests are allowed to the condo and pool area. 

If you have any questions about the rules, please ask.

name: Relax at Cartagena Spa + Sparkling Clean 18b3
summary:
Estamos cambiando para ti, comprometidos en darte garantía de un servicio de calidad en un espacio seguro, adaptamos nuestro protocolo de seguridad a las medidas exigidas por el gobierno, estamos limpiando con hipoclorito de sodio al 75% en lencería, y al 100% baños y pisos.
Tengo el placer de presentar un espacio definido con confort cariño una vista espectacular sobre el mar, balcón gigante vista a 180 grados, que rebota sobre la vista Marina y se pierde sin final en el mar.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Dishwasher,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Lockbox,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Smoke alarm
description:
Estamos cambiando para ti, comprometidos en darte garantía de un servicio de calidad en un espacio seguro, adaptamos nuestro protocolo de seguridad a las medidas exigidas por el gobierno, estamos limpiando con hipoclorito de sodio al 75% en lencería, y al 100% baños y pisos.
Tengo el placer de presentar un espacio definido con confort cariño una vista espectacular sobre el mar, balcón gigante vista a 180 grados, que rebota sobre la vista Marina y se pierde sin final en el mar.

Comprometidos en darte garantía de un servicio de bioseguridad estamos cambiando para ti nuestros espacios son tratados con hipoclorito de sodio al 75% en lencería,  y 100% baños y pisos. ,  las house keeeping portan uniforme se seguridad y manejan toda la dotación del protocolo requerida por el gobierno para esta pandemia.

Ubicado en piso 18 ofrece una maravillosa vista al océano sin fin, donde usted se sentirá en un crucero cinco estrellas,  en una suite de lujo de 2 alcobas con esplendida decoración caribeña  cocina integrada para compartir el ritual culinario, servicio de comedor abierto en el balcón, disfrutar maravillosas comidas con fresca brisa mar, una sala de gran tamaño para compartir con sus huéspedes, las alcobas y los baños siguen la espectacular vista marina, acondicionados con lencería de calidad, toallas y servicio de amenities completos como shampoo, rinse jabón de manos,  jabón  de cuerpo, todos los detalles al que usted está acostumbrado para que su experiencia sensorial se complementa con el confort que brinda el apto !!!

Nuestro edificio cambio para estar a la medida de lo que ordena el gobierno en bioseguridad, encontrara en la recepcion kit de desifeccion personal, los guardas de seguridad tienen el protocolo para cuidar de usted y cuidar a ellos, siempre con tapabocas, guantes y un buen gel al 65% del alcohol para desifeccion. Cambiamos los protocolos de aseo en areas comunes para optimizar la desifeccion, acojiendonos a la normas del gobierno para coopropiedades en funcionamiento para momentos de pandemia, contamos con dispensadores de gel al 75% de alcohol en los ascensores. el personal de aseo cumple con sus normas de seguridad personal.

El edificio ofrece servicios semi-hoteleros de alta calidad, por su diseño arquitectónico novedoso y nuevo en impecables condiciones, moderno con 32 pisos se presenta imponente a sus huéspedes en primera línea sobre el mar, todos los aptos son exteriores brindando una vista espectacular en cada uno de los apartamentos.
Se ingresa por un estupendo lobby con doble altura espejo de agua interna y aire acondicionado comunicando de inmediato confort en el huésped, complementa un recibimiento de confort y buen gusto.
Dentro de sus generosos servicios piscina sin fin sobre el océano, dotada con asoleadoras y salas para cada grupo de visitantes, piscina infantil, dos jacuzzi con agua caliente, turco, sauna y completo gimnasio, BBQ, tenis de mesa, completa batería de baños de piscina, baños de ingreso al edificio desde la playa, para que usted pueda ingresar sin arena al edificio. Estos servicios estarán disponibles a discreción de las medidas del gobierno y de la administración para conjuntos residenciales hasta superar la situación de pandemia por covid 19! Favor consultar si estos servicios están en funcionamiento.

Siempre podrá contar con migo cuando lo requiera, está detrás de usted un completo equipo a su servicio respaldando su estadía , desde la reserva hasta el final de su visita, yo vivo en Cartagena y estoy muy cerca de usted así que si me necesita con mucho estoy para colaborar, de forma rápida y precisa.

Lo mejor del barrio es estar en primera linea sobre el mar , salir de su edificio y estar a 10 metros de el mar,  es una zona de playa por excelencia el barrio está en la zona de Marbella,   fue escogido por la cadena internacional  Ibis para su hotel en cartagena  brinda a la comunidad el servicio de restaurante con desayunos y almuerzos buffet  y cenas a la carta,  tambien detras del edificio hay una completa zona de carritos de comida a  precios y calidad buena que le ofrece variedad de sushi , hamburguesas,  carnes, pastas y pizzas, en este momento de pandemia estos servicio no se estan prestando-
Contamos con supermercados en la zona a una cuadra y  media sobre la avenida Supermercado  Ara  y el otro es el Megatiendas un poco más retirado a 15 minutos a pie, también servicios de domicilios y con tarjeta de la tienda del barrio y estamos muy bien surtidos de domicilio 24 horas en droguerias

El transporte en la zona resulta ser muy cómodo por su ubicación estratégica,  lo lleva a cualquier sitio de interés  entre 5 y 10 minutos con un costo promedio  maravilloso para su presupuesto,  entre $ 2 y  $ 3 dólares por recorrido !!!
De destacar la cercanía al aeropuerto a 5 minutos de distancia  y trayecto $ 5 dolares!!

En este momento de crisis mundial por la pandemia del covid 19 tomamos la mayo prudencia para no afectar el desarrollo de la recuperacion personal y mundial y podamos terminar este periodo con exito #QUEDATEENCASA#

name: 3903 Morros City - Bocagrande.
summary: Get ready for rest! This oceanfront, 39th-floor condo is brand-new and offers panoramic views of the Caribbean and the walled city. Housed in a luxury building in the center of Bocagrande, guests will enjoy a close-in location that is within one-mile of historic Cartegena and nearby local attractions. Enjoy five-star resort amenities including a stunning oceanfront pool, first-class fitness facilities, and 24-hour on-site security.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Heating,Gym,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Ethernet connection,Hot water,Room-darkening shades,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Beachfront,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm
description:
Get ready for rest! This oceanfront, 39th-floor condo is brand-new and offers panoramic views of the Caribbean and the walled city. Housed in a luxury building in the center of Bocagrande, guests will enjoy a close-in location that is within one-mile of historic Cartegena and nearby local attractions. Enjoy five-star resort amenities including a stunning oceanfront pool, first-class fitness facilities, and 24-hour on-site security.

This is a spacious one-bedroom apartment that includes two beds, a high-end sleep sofa, two full baths with hot water, a well-equipped kitchen, and scenic outdoor living space. It’s ideal for two, private enough for four. Upscale furnishings, will appeal to travelers who want first-class accommodations at an affordable price point. This is a space that is best suited for couples and small families who want the best place for resting.

Luxury ocean front pool, gym, steam bath, garage parking.

Upon arrival I will make sure everything is perfect for their stay and they can reach me 24 hours a day.

The neighborhood of Bocagrande is near to San Martin Avenue where you can find restaurants, shopping centers, pubs, banks, money exchange places and supermarkets.

If you want to know more of the city of Cartagena, you can walk, take a taxi or Uber to mobilize with a average cost to $3.

additional_house_rules:
Por políticas de la adminsitración de Morros City, se prohíbe el ingreso de visitantes priorizando la seguridad de quienes se hospedan en el edificio.
A su llegada, se le entregará folleto con las normas del manual de convivencia del edificio, para su debida implementación.

name: Luxury 2 BDRM 3 bath BEACH FRONT condo CARTAGENA
summary: Enjoy a relaxing stay in this NEWLY built beachfront condo 10 min walking distance to the Old City, 10 min from airport, walking distance to fine dining. This is also walking distance to Museum Rafael Nuñez. Location Location Location!!
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Heating,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Pack ’n Play/travel crib,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Host greets you,Luggage dropoff allowed,Body soap,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
Enjoy a relaxing stay in this NEWLY built beachfront condo 10 min walking distance to the Old City, 10 min from airport, walking distance to fine dining. This is also walking distance to Museum Rafael Nuñez. Location Location Location!!

****STRICT NO PARTY POLICY*****
****No unauthorized “Visitors”**** 

This place is the perfect getaway to visit Cartagena and relax while you're at it. Condo comes with air conditioning units in every room, hot water, washer and dryer, Excellent balcony overlooking the Ocean. Both bedrooms have full view of the ocean. And did we mention HOT WATER available?
Everything is modern and new.

You can enjoy the view of the ocean from every bedroom in the condo and living room.

Bedrooms:
There are two bedrooms that have the beautiful view of the ocean. In the master bedroom, there is a Queen bed with its own restroom. Second bedroom has a double bed and twin bed. Both bedrooms have AC and come with 43 inch TVs

Bathrooms:
There are 3 full bathrooms with showers. 

Kitchen:
The kitchen is stacked with basic cooking necessities to ensure your pleasant stay. Enjoy a complimentary cup of Colombian Coffee.

Living Room:
The living room has a smart TV with cable. The couch also turns into a sleeper bed. This room also has ocean view.

Guests have access to the entire condo to themselves. There is a full sized washer and dryer inside the condo to your disposal. Access to the beach across the street. Access to two rooftop pools and steam room.

I am available for any questions and recommendations.

El Cabrero - This is a very quiet safe neighborhood located just 5-10 minutes walking distance to the Old City (Walled City). You will be on the same street as the Casa Rafael Nuñez (Museum) and only 10 minutes away from the airport. El Cabrero also has beaches to swim at.

Airport is a 5-10 minute car ride. Should cost around $10,000-$12,000 COP to get there. You can walk to the Old city. Taxi ride to Old City around $7,000-8,000 COP. DOWNLOAD THE “InDriver” app! It will save you money and you can request transportation and offer what you want to pay for the fare.

This condo is brand new. Everything inside is new. We tried to make it as comfortable and home-like as possible for each stay to be a one of a kind experience. There is Fiber WiFi to ensure the highest speed internet is available for those who need to work while on vacation ;) Conveniently, there is also a grocery store under the building and coffee shop for you to buy groceries and last minute items as needed and then enjoy some coffee.

Please be aware that the building does not allow entry to anyone that has not been authorized prior--so please take consideration of this before your booking. 

Update as of Oct 2020:
Virus update for your safety: We have completely improved the cleaning protocol. Cleaning crew washes hands multiple times before and during each cleaning. All surfaces are thoroughly cleaned using CDC recommended solutions to kill corona virus and other viruses. This includes all handles, counters, tables, chair backs, bedside tables, door knobs and the TV remote control. All bedding and towels are washed and sanitized.

Regarding "Visitors":
Sexual "visitors" are NOT allowed and they will not be allowed entry in the building. All guests must be registered prior to arrival with information above. If this is your motive, please find another place that allows this in order to avoid problems.

During COVID pandemic, guests MUST wear masks (as mandated by Colombian Government & Building Policy) in public spaces of building and upon checkin.

Prior to arrival, we need the following information to submit to Building:
- Names of ALL guests 
- Document number for guests (passport number or ID number)

neighborhood_overview:
Lo mejor del barrio es estar en primera linea sobre el mar , salir de su edificio y estar a 10 metros de el mar,  es una zona de playa por excelencia el barrio está en la zona de Marbella,   fue escogido por la cadena internacional  Ibis para su hotel en cartagena  brinda a la comunidad el servicio de restaurante con desayunos y almuerzos buffet  y cenas a la carta,  tambien detras del edificio hay una completa zona de carritos de comida a  precios y calidad buena que le ofrece variedad de sushi , hamburguesas,  carnes, pastas y pizzas, en este momento de pandemia estos servicio no se estan prestando-
Contamos con supermercados en la zona a una cuadra y  media sobre la avenida Supermercado  Ara  y el otro es el Megatiendas un poco más retirado a 15 minutos a pie, también servicios de domicilios y con tarjeta de la tienda del barrio y estamos muy bien surtidos de domicilio 24 horas en droguerias
notes: En este momento de crisis mundial por la pandemia del covid 19 tomamos la mayo prudencia para no afectar el desarrollo de la recuperacion personal y mundial y podamos terminar este periodo con exito #QUEDATEENCASA#
additional_house_rules:
Los huéspedes deberán tener cuidado con no tener la puerta del balcón abierta , por los vientos fuertes cuando se va a abrir la puerta principal. La puerta del balcón deberá estar cerrada para abrir la puerta principal, por los vientos fuertes
Puede causar daños severos en la puerta principal y serán cargados al huésped.

Favor sacarse la arena en las duchas del primer piso para ingresar al apartamento, esto puede tapar las cañerías!

No se puede freír pescado en el apartamento queda un olor permanente !

No se permite el ingreso de acompañantes, ni visitas que no estén registrados desde el primer día del ingreso, ni al apartamento ni a las áreas comunes.
No se pueden beber bebidas alcohólicas en la piscina. 

Favor antes de salir de la apartamento verificar que todos los aires estén apagados, un consumo exagerado del aire acondicionado será cargado a su cuenta.
interaction: Siempre podrá contar con migo cuando lo requiera,  está detrás de usted un completo equipo a su servicio respaldando su estadía , desde la reserva hasta el final de su visita,  yo vivo en Cartagena y estoy muy cerca de usted así que si me necesita con mucho estoy para colaborar, de forma rápida y precisa.
access:
Nuestro edificio cambio para estar a la medida de lo que ordena el gobierno en bioseguridad, encontrara en la recepcion kit de desifeccion personal, los guardas de seguridad tienen el protocolo para cuidar de usted y cuidar a ellos,  siempre con tapabocas, guantes y un buen gel al 65% del alcohol para desifeccion.  Cambiamos los protocolos de aseo en areas comunes para optimizar la desifeccion, acojiendonos a la normas del gobierno para coopropiedades en funcionamiento para momentos de pandemia, contamos con dispensadores de gel al 75% de alcohol en los ascensores. el personal de aseo cumple con sus normas de seguridad personal.

El edificio ofrece servicios semi-hoteleros de alta calidad,  por su diseño arquitectónico novedoso y   nuevo  en impecables condiciones, moderno con 32 pisos se presenta imponente a sus huéspedes en primera línea sobre el mar,  todos los aptos son exteriores  brindando una vista espectacular en cada uno de  los apartamentos.
Se ingresa por un estupendo lobby con doble altura espejo de agua interna y aire acondicionado comunicando de inmediato confort en el huésped,  complementa un recibimiento de confort y buen gusto.
Dentro de sus generosos servicios  piscina sin fin sobre el océano,  dotada con asoleadoras  y  salas para cada grupo de visitantes,  piscina infantil,  dos jacuzzi  con agua caliente,  turco,  sauna y completo gimnasio,  BBQ,  tenis de mesa,  completa batería de baños de piscina,  baños de ingreso al edificio desde la playa,  para que usted pueda ingresar sin arena al edificio. Estos servicios estarán disponibles a discreción de las medidas del gobierno y de la administración para conjuntos residenciales hasta superar la situación de pandemia por covid  19! Favor consultar si estos servicios están en funcionamiento.
transit:
El transporte en la zona resulta ser muy cómodo por su ubicación estratégica,  lo lleva a cualquier sitio de interés  entre 5 y 10 minutos con un costo promedio  maravilloso para su presupuesto,  entre $ 2 y  $ 3 dólares por recorrido !!!
De destacar la cercanía al aeropuerto a 5 minutos de distancia  y trayecto $ 5 dolares!!

description:
Moderno y cómodo apartamento frente a las playas de Bocagrande, con espectacular vista al mar y al centro histórico.

Modern and confortable apartment in front of Bocagrande's beaches, with amazing view to the ocean and downtown Cartagena.

Ubicado en un onceavo piso, el apartamento cuenta con un cuarto de buen tamaño, con una cama doble y un sofa-cama, dos baños con ducha, sala, comedor en balcón con hermosa vista, cocina equipada y zona de lavado con lavadora y secadora. 
Además el apartamento cuenta con televisión, wifi, aire acondicionado, tanto en la sala como en el cuarto y calentador de agua para la ducha.

Located on an eleventh floor, the apartment has a good size bedroom with a double bed and a sofa bed, two bathrooms with shower, living room, balcony with beautiful view, equipped kitchen and laundry area with washing machine and dryer .
In addition the apartment has television, wifi, air conditioning (both in the living room and in the bed room) and bathroom water heater.

El edificio cuenta con una espectacular y amplia piscina, jacuzzi, sauna y gimnasio.

The building has a spectacular and large swimming pool, sauna and gym.

Bocagrande cuenta con una gran variedad de locales comerciales, supermercados, restaurantes, casinos, salas de cine, droguerías y demás. A solo 5 minutos del centro histórico, 30 minutos de las playas de Morros, 20 min de Tierrabomba y fácil acceso a las demás atracciones de la ciudad. 


Bocagrande has a large variety of shops, supermarkets, restaurants, casinos, cinemas, drugstores and more. Just 5 minutes from the historical center, 30 minutes from the beaches of Morros, 20 min from Tierrabomba and easy access to the other attractions of the city.

Ideal para una persona, parejas solas , parejas con uno, máximo dos niños pequeños o un acompañante adulto.

Ideal for one person, single couples, couples with one, maximum two small children or an adult companion.

The building have a private pool and jacuzzi that are available only for people staying in the building. You can also use the garage and cleaning service.

This is the safest town in Cartagena, building security 24/7, the building is infront of the beach, next to the building you will find a Juan Valdez (best coffe of Colombia) and there is a súper market and great restaurants really close (walking distance). The old city is just 5 minutes away in a taxi (3 usd) and walking distance will be 25 minutes.

The host have a business of boats so he can help you to rent a private boat or yacht and visit the beautiful islands of Cartagena. 
The host will also help you with restaurants, bars and clubs reservation.

additional_house_rules:
Restricción de Visitas (situación especial motivada por el COVID)
A fin de proteger la salud y la seguridad de nuestros huéspedes que puedan estar dentro del alojamiento, durante su estadía no podrán recibir visitas o personas que no estén incluidas dentro de su reserva. 

PROTOCOLO DE USO DE ÀREAS COMUNES
-El uso del gimnasio será de 6 a 10 am
Así mismo debe cumplir con los siguientes protocolos de bioseguridad en las áreas húmedas.
Protocolos de bioseguridad para el ingreso a las piscinas
● Piscina de propulsión piso 3 :2 personas
● Piscina de relajación piso 3 : 4 personas
● Jacuzzi piso 3: 1 persona
● Piscina piso 40 : 14 personas
● Por apartamento se puede reservar un máximo de 6 personas al siguiente
correo admonedificiomuranoelite@gmail.com.
● Delimitación del tiempo máximo de 2 horas con reservación previa al correo antes mencionado.
● Restringido los eventos sociales en las piscinas.
● Se deberá suministrar la información para diligenciar el formato de control donde se realice el registro de los bañistas que usan la piscina cada hora y hacer seguimiento para no superar el aforo reducido.
● Se tomará la temperatura a los usuarios antes del ingreso.
● El uso de mascarilla o tapabocas en las instalaciones es obligatorio, salvo
cuando estén dentro de la piscina.
● Se recomienda a los principales grupos vulnerables, como lo ha
definido la autoridad sanitaria: personas mayores de 60 años y aquellas con diagnósticos de hipertensión arterial, diabetes, enfermedades cardiovasculares, enfermedades pulmonares crónicas, cáncer, inmunodeficiencias y embarazadas, que se abstengan de hacer uso de la piscina, y si lo hacen, es bajo su completa responsabilidad.
● Evitar el consumo de alimentos, bebidas y bebidas alcohólicas.
● Obligatorio ducharse antes y después de utilizar la piscina
● Desinfectarse las manos antes y después de tocar cualquier elemento del entorno de la piscina, como escaleras, barandillas, etc.
● Se publicarán los resultados de las pruebas físico químicas de la piscina.
● Mantener las prácticas de distanciamiento social en duchas y zonas playas, jacuzzis.
● Se recomienda la utilización de gafas y gorros de baño.

El ejercicio de la prostitución está prohibido en el apartamento,en cuanto afecta a la convivencia normal de la comunidad de vecinos. Igualmente, no se permite el consumo de drogas dentro del edificio.

summary: Acogedor y completamente dotado apartamento, ubicado en inmejorable locación. A pocos metros de la plaza Santo Domingo, Plaza Simón Bolívar, La catedral, bares,  heladerías, restaurantes, almacenes de ropa, tiendas de artesanías, etc. Con acomodación para cuatro personas.

description:
Acogedor y completamente dotado apartamento, ubicado en inmejorable locación. A pocos metros de la plaza Santo Domingo, Plaza Simón Bolívar, La catedral, bares,  heladerías, restaurantes, almacenes de ropa, tiendas de artesanías, etc. Con acomodación para cuatro personas.

La  amplia  sala te da la bienvenida y los  altos ventanales iluminan el espacio, destacando el piso en piedra y un cocina abierta con barra y completamente equipada para compartir en pareja o con amigos.  En la habitación una muy cómoda cama king size es protagonista del cálido espacio, en donde ademas las luces tenues, una hamaca fabricada en los pueblos artesanales del norte de Colombia y la mezcla de tonos crudo invitan al descanso. Es especialmente destacable la vista nocturna de La Catedral desde la habitación.

Nos gusta darle la intimidad y privacidad que el cliente necesita. Pero estamos prestos para resolverles cualquier inquietud, ayudarles en algún problema o simplemente brindarles las mejores recomendaciones de la ciudad para que puedan aprovechar su visita al máximo.

El apartamento esta perfectamente ubicado en una de las mejores zonas de la ciudad. Esta en todo el corazón del centro histórico de la ciudad, por lo cual podrás disfrutar de números sitios sin tener que desplazarte demasiado.

La mejor forma de llegar al apartamento desde el aeropuerto es en carro. Sin embargo ya qué hay ocasiones en que la Alcaldía local cierra las calles para el tránsito de turistas, nosotros prestamos también el servicio de transporte desde el aeropuerto. Es un servicio que prestamos con el ánimo de hacer la llegada más fácil, ya que por ser residentes tenemos permiso para transitar por las vías. Es un servicio adicional con pago en el momento de recogida y debes hacernos conocer tu interés en utilizarlo para que podamos recogerte. Así como tú hora de llegada, lugar de procedencia y número de vuelo.

El apartamento esta ubicado en el cuarto piso del Edificio Elejamin un antiguo edificio de la época de la colonia. Para subir al apartamento debes utilizar  escaleras.

name: Stunning Views, Oceanfront 2 Bedroom Condo
summary: This modern 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo is perfect for a vacation with your closest friends and family. Overlooking the sea from the 35th floor, the condo has the best views of Cartagena. It is centrally located and it is just a quick taxi ride from the old city. You can easily walk to cafés, restaurants, and shops from the condo. The apartment is well kept and comes with everything you will need for an unforgettable stay. Your host is happy to answer any questions, so feel free to ask.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Wifi,Kitchen,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Smoke alarm
description:
This modern 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo is perfect for a vacation with your closest friends and family. Overlooking the sea from the 35th floor, the condo has the best views of Cartagena. It is centrally located and it is just a quick taxi ride from the old city. You can easily walk to cafés, restaurants, and shops from the condo. The apartment is well kept and comes with everything you will need for an unforgettable stay. Your host is happy to answer any questions, so feel free to ask.

The spacious balcony is a great place to have your morning coffee or a glass of wine after a day at the beach.

The master bedroom includes a queen bed and a twin/single bed with a spacious closet and en-suite bathroom.

The second bedroom has a queen bed and its own en-suite bathroom. 

Each bedroom has a TV and its own mini split AC unit. There is hot water throughout the condo as well as AC and Wifi. 

The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you will need to make a dinner with family or friends. There is also a washing machine and dryer in case you want to do laundry during your stay. 

The buildings has two pools, one rooftop pool and one waterfront pool.

My assistant or I will meet you to check you in and handover the keys, from there, I am as hands on or hands off as you would like during your trip. You can feel free to ask any questions, prior, during or post stay, without judgement. I just want to make your trip as hassle-free as possible.

Laguito is a modern safe neighborhood. You can walk around to different shops and restaurants day or night since the area is well-policed. You are can go to the Laguito beaches or walk to the Bocagrande or Castillogrande beaches which are nearby. All are a common tourist destination. If you would like to see the real crystal blue water of the Caribbean, you can always take a trip to the Rosario Islands for the day. The old city is just a 10 minute taxi ride from the building. Once in the old city, you can wander the colonial style streets and visit the local restaurants, shops and bars.

You can call a cab or an Uber from the building. Most times they will be waiting right outside on the street for their next ride, day and night. It is normally about 4usd for a ride between the condo and the old city. I can also recommend a private taxi or van driver for you to pick you up at the airport or take you to local tour destinations around the city if you would.

name: Morros City Bocagrande
summary:
Morros City Bocagrande se encuentra en Cartagena de Indias, a solo 3,1 km del parque Bolívar, y ofrece alojamiento frente al mar con piscina al aire libre. 

El Museo del Oro de Cartagena y el Palacio de la Inquisición se encuentran a 3,1 km del Morros City Bocagrande. El aeropuerto más cercano es el aeropuerto internacional Rafael Núñez, a 8 km del apartamento.

Bocagrande es una opción genial para los viajeros interesados en la playa, hacer turismo y los atardeceres

summary: In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 2 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. description:
In the most modern part of Cartagena you'll find this amazing 2 bedroom apartment. Located in Laguito on the tip of our Manhattan look-a-like peninsula called Bocagrande. Well furnished, fully equipped kitchen, warm water, A/C, fast internet, WiFi, SMART TV's and an amazing balcony to enjoy sunsets. Gym, Pool and Jacuzzi on the rooftop. Restaurants, nightlife, casino, supermarkets, shopping malls and beaches easily reached within walking distance. Old city (10 min) & airport (20 min) with taxi.

This apartment is about 100 sqm and can accommodate up to 6 persons with its 2 bedroom(s) and floor mattress* in the living room. Free internet, WiFi in the apartment and parking in the buildings garage*. The fully equipped open american kitchen gives a spacious feeling where you can cook while socialize with the person(s) that are hanging out in the living room. In the living room you'll find the dining area and the comfy sofa & SMART TV. The apartment has 2 bathroom(s) with toilet, shower, body towels (not for beach use), a set of hygiene paper, shampoo & soap. Hair dryer is available upon request at check in. The comfy bed(s) and hot water in the showers will make you feel like home... only even better thanks to the amazing sea view! This flat is perfect for couples, families, business or solo travelers and friends, even pets*. For more detailed info please see "Amenities" & "sleeping arrangements". *Let us know asap before arriving

The whole apartment will be reserved for your use only, it's NOT shared with anyone. Feel the breeze from the balcony, from here you can delighted with a great view of the sea and Tierra Bomba Island. The building is very modern, has two unique pools, one on the main floor along the ocean and one on the rooftop where you also find the Jacuzzi (on the 43rd floor). There is a large lobby open 24/7, parking, gym and three elevators.

If you have questions or wishes please don't hesitate to ask, I will be available to attend and answer whatever you need before and during your stay, please use the mobile number sent when the reservation has been made (WhatsApp or calls). I have my office, a vacation rental, just beside the main entrance where you can go to if you have any questions or to reserve tours, activities, islands, boats, transport or just ask for a good restaurant or something worth seeing. The name of my office is Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena and is the 3rd "store/shop" from the main entrance.

The neighborhood is in the elite and prominent area of Cartagena (Laguito & Bocagrande), our version of Beverly hills or Miami Beach. You'll find the famous "Hollywood beach" where you can surf and practice some water sports. The area is safe and you'll find supermarkets, clothing stores, pharmacies, shopping malls, banks, casinos, hotels, restaurants, buildings and residential homes, and all this just within a few blocks from the building. It's normally quiet, but you might find some streets a little noisy during some hours of the day. Its the most tourist friendly place and close to the Historical Center (the Walled City, a magical historic preservation of ancient Cartagena) around 10 min away with taxi, Rafael Nuñez International Airport around 20 min, and more landmarks nearby.

You can walk, rent bikes or use buses. But I recommend taxi or Uber, they cost from COP $7.000 (approx. $2-3 USD) and will take you just about anywhere!... From the Airport we recommend that you take an authorized taxi from inside the airport, the cost is COP $18,000 on average all the way to Laguito. If you need a private shuttle service or tours, please let me know.

1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests and visitors must present Passport (or Colombian ID) in original.
 
2. BUILDING FEE: 10,000 COP (approx. $2,90 USD) per person & has to be payed to the building, you pay the fee in my office.

3. WRISTBAND: Palmetto Sunset wristband must be worn over time (for access). Lost or removed wristband will be charged by the building. 
 
4. MINORS: Minors must be accompanied by at least one of their parents presenting the minors identification in original. For Colombian minors "registro civil" in original or ID has to be shown and both parents has to be present. If only one parent are present an authorization in written from the parent (not present) has to be shown. 

5. PETS: are allowed only if an "emotional support animal" certification can be shown. 
 
6. SOCIAL AREAS: 
Pool 1st floor      10:00AM-06:00PM  (Wednesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
Pool 43rd floor  09:00AM-06:00PM (Tuesday 12:00PM-06:00PM)
GYM                       07:00AM-06:00PM (Friday 07:00AM-12:00PM)
SAUNA                 09:00AM-06:00PM (Let reception know 15 min before) 

7. ENVIRONMENT: At anytime you leave the apartment make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, be friendly with the planet. Sunset Apartment Rental Cartagena S.A.S is authorized to enter at any time and turn them off. It's not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies. Please save water and light as much as possible and please take care of your waste and garbage (especially when out in the nature like the beach or if you visit the islands) even if you see locals or other tourist not respecting this. 

8. ADDITIONAL SERVICES: Cleaning services or cooking are available upon request for an extra fee, please ask us.

9. PARKING: If you need parking, you must inform us before your arrival.
 
10. We are not responsible for any loss of personal belongings or accidents, injuries or illnesses that occur on the premises or its facilities in our property. We are not responsible for damage caused by rain, flooding or natural disasters.  

11. You must inform me immediately if there is something you feel is not fulfilling with the listing details so that we can fix it in the best possible way as soon as possible. 
 
12. All the rules of the building and local law must be respected.  

13. Read the "Additional rules" before confirm the last step of the reservation.

additional_house_rules:
Strict Rules:
1. ID/PASSPORT: All guests must present original Passport/Colombian ID.
2. CHECK IN/OUT: Check out is strictly at 12 PM or before, otherwise, a fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged. Check in is at 3 PM or after.
3. VISITORS: if you bring visitors you have to register them at the reception, visiting hours are between 10 AM - 9:30 PM. You can have a "permanent guests" please ask for more info. 
4. NOISE: Please limit the noise at all time but especially after 11 PM. Parties and high noise levels are prohibited (this includes music, TV & high volume conversations).
5. SMOKING: is prohibited inside the property (except on the balcony). 
6. SEXUAL EXPLOITATION: of children and adolescents is a crime.
7. DEPOSIT/KEYS: If you break something in the apartment/building you must pay the damages. If you lose the keys you'll be charged 80,000 COP.

El edificio por reglamento no permite visitantes. Solo pueden ingresar las personas que están en la lista de huéspedes que solicitamos unos días antes de su llegada. Por favor no insistir en solicitar que otra persona ingrese porque no va a ser posible. Debemos cumplir las normas del edificio y del reglamento de convivencia.

El edificio por reglamento no permite visitantes. Solo pueden ingresar las personas que están en la lista de huéspedes que solicitamos unos días antes de su llegada. Por favor no insistir en solicitar que otra persona ingrese porque no va a ser posible. Debemos cumplir las normas del edificio y del reglamento de convivencia.
Las normas del edificio no permiten visitantes, solo se autoriza el ingreso a las personas que envían como huéspedes en una lista que se debe enviar un día antes de su llegada.
Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio.  Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio cuando lleguen sólo deben presenta su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio. Deberán portarla durante su estadía así podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin que les tengan que preguntar para dónde van. Lo hacemos por seguridad en el
Edificio.  Igualmente debo informar que no se aceptan visitantes.

additional_house_rules:
EDIFICIO TURÍSTICO MORROS CITY PROPIEDAD HORIZONTAL
 
 
HORARIOS AUTORIZADOS
 
Piscina y Jacuzzi.
Lunes a viernes de 8:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 9:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
 
Gimnasio y Baño Turco.
 
Lunes a viernes de 6:00 a.m. a 9:00 p.m.
Sábados, domingos y festivos de 6:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m.
 
NORMAS
 
Está prohibido en la zona social (piscina, jacuzzi, gimnasio y turco):
 
1. Celebrar fiestas, con o sin la presencia de agrupaciones musicales.
2. Llevar o mantener en la zona animales domésticos o mascotas.
3. Usar aparatos de música, excepto dispositivos de audio personal (con audífonos).
4. Correr, patinar, montar bicicleta o triciclo, jugar con pelotas y raquetas.
5. Llevar a cabo actividades que puedan incomodar a las demás personas que se encuentren en el lugar o que puedan ocasionar daños en bienes privados o comunes del edificio.
6. Consumir alimentos, a excepción de mecatos.
7. Usar envases o recipientes de vidrio.
8. Reservar, maltratar, manchar, ensuciar y dañar las sillas, asoleadoras y cojines. Para conservación e higiene de las colchonetas, se deben utilizar toallas sobre estas.
9. Colocar los cojines de las asoleadoras en el piso, meterlos a la piscina o retirarlos de la zona.
10. Retirarse de la zona dejando elementos personales o desechos.
11. Dejar niños solos en la zona. Será absoluta responsabilidad de los padres o adulto responsable del niño, cualquier accidente que les pueda ocurrir por el hecho de dejarlos solos en esta zona.
 
Está igualmente dentro de la piscina:
 
1. Usar la piscina padeciendo enfermedades infectocontagiosas o de lesiones en la piel.
2. Fumar, comer chicle y consumir cualquier clase de alimento o bebida.
3. Bañar a menores con o sin pañales. Para esto deben usarse pañales para piscina.
4. Introducir o jugar con elementos claramente peligrosos.
5. Bañarse sin ducharse previamente o sin retirar del cuerpo aceites, bronceadores, protectores, lociones o similares.
6. En general desplegar cualquier tipo de actividad o conducta que pueda causar incomodidad o perjudicar a los demás bañistas o a los equipos de la piscina.  
 
En la zona social y en el lobby del edificio no se permite fumar.
 
SEGURIDAD
 
1. Los menores de edad SIEMPRE deben estar acompañados de un adulto responsable. No se permite el ingreso de menores de 14 años al gimnasio.
2. Antes de salir del apartamento verifique que las puertas y ventanas se encuentren debidamente cerradas.
3. Al salir de viaje asegúrese de dejar cerrados los registros de agua, gas y baje los tacos eléctricos (sin incluir el de la nevera). El personal de mantenimiento del edificio se encuentra en disposición de realizar el cierre de las llaves de agua y gas cuando se le solicite.  
4. El uso de las manillas es obligatorio tanto para arrendatarios temporales como para los invitados de propietarios y deben ser utilizadas durante toda su estadía en el edificio.
5. Los Conserjes NO se encuentran autorizados para recibir llaves de los apartamentos. En casos excepcionales y sólo por motivos de fuerza mayor se podrán dejar en sobres cerrados, los cuales serán facilitados por los conserjes y deben ser retiradas dentro de las 24 horas siguientes. Los sobres deben ser firmados por la persona que los deja y debe escribirse en estos en nombre de la persona que lo recibirá.
6. Al edificio no se permite el ingreso de vendedores ambulantes.
7. Al dejar su vehículo en el parqueadero de visitantes, asegúrese de no dejar objetos de valor en su interior.
8. Al ingresar al parqueadero interno debe detenerse y bajar el vidrio del vehículo para poder ser identificado plenamente por el Conserje y/o guarda de seguridad.
 
CONVIVENCIA
 
1. No se permitirá el uso de equipos de sonido en el interior de los apartamentos a volúmenes altos que perturben la tranquilidad de los vecinos. (Los Conerjes están autorizados para llamar a la Policía en caso de no atender los requerimientos).
2. No se permiten grupos musicales y/u orquesta dentro de los apartamentos
3. Está prohibido colgar alfombras, ropa, letreros, avisos, carteles y otros elementos similares en las paredes externas, puertas, ventanas, rejas, balcones o áreas comunes.
4. Está prohibido lanzar papeles, colillas de cigarrillos, basura o cualquier otro objeto desde los balcones.
5. Los animales domésticos o mascotas podrán circular (no permanecer) por las áreas comunes del edificio, a excepción de los ascensores, siempre acompañados de un adulto responsable y sujetos con traílla.
6. Los arrendatarios temporales no podrán recibir visitas en su estadía dentro del Edificio.

name: RENOVATED DUPLEX  in the historic center
summary:

En este lujoso apartamento  en el piso 29 puedes disfrutar de una hermosa vista e increíbles amaneceres y atardeceres de la bahía de Cartagena. Cuenta con todas las comodidades que necesitarían para disfrutar de una estadía inolvidable.

In this luxurious apartment on the 29th floor, you can step in, relax and enjoy the incredible view of the Cartagena Bay. Equipped with all the amenities and commodities you could possibly need; we are committed to provide our guests with a pleasant stay.

This space is designed so our guests feel as comfortable and relaxed as possible during their stay.

The bedroom is furnished with a King bed, has a walk-in closet and private bathroom. In the Salon you will find a fully decked kitchen, guest bathroom and living room with a beautiful sofa bed that turns into a comfy queen bed.

El espacio está diseñado para que nuestros huéspedes se sientan lo más relajados y cómodos durante la estancia.

La alcoba está dotada con una cama king, walk in closet y baño privado. En el salón principal encontrarás una cocina completa, un baño social y una sala con un hermoso sofá-cama queen de alta calidad.

El balcón está dotado con un comedor y unas sillas tipo nido súper cómodas. En ellas pasarás mucho tiempo disfrutando de la maravillosa vista o aún, trabajando en un ambiente relajado.

The Infinitum building has a hotel type Lobby with 24hr private security. Amenities include a Pool, 2 Jacuzzis, Kids Pool, Sauna, Gym and smokers terrace are located on the 7th floor.

• NO VISITORS allowed past the reception of the building to this guarantee the good order, security of the guest and building.

Ubicado en el barrio de Bocagrande, fácil acceso a supermercados, farmacias, bancos, restaurantes, bares y los muelles a tan solo pasos del edificio.

description:
Lujoso apartamento frente al mar en Cartagena de Indias de 94 m2 con espectaculares vistas a la playa y la ciudad, ubicado en el exclusivo sector de Bocagrande, rodeado de restaurantes, bares, cafés, centros comerciales, supermercados, casinos, droguerias. El centro histórico (ciudad amurallada) y el centro administrativo y financiero de la ciudad se encuentra a 5 minutos en carro. A 12 minutos en carro del aeropuerto.
RNT(Registro Nacional de Turismo): 55315

El apartamento consta de dos habitaciones:
*Habitación 1: con cama doble y cama sencilla, baño, closet, aire acondicionado y TV.
*Habitación 2 con cama doble y cama sencilla, baño, closet, aire acondicionado y TV
Todas las habitaciones cuentan con vista al mar.

Sala con mueble muy cómodo, TV. Acceso a WiFi en todo el apartamento.

Cocina integral totalmente equipada: nevera, horno microondas, vajilla, exprimidor de jugos, vasos, utensilios de cocina.

Cuenta con lavadora-secadora, lavadero, plancha, tendedero de ropa, secador de pelo.

El edificio cuenta con  lobby tipo hotel,  celaduria 24 horas, tres ascensores,dos piscinas panorámicas para adultos,una piscina para niños, Lounge, BBQ, planta de emergencia de cobertura total.

Horario Pisicina:
Lunes-Viernes: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM
Sábado, Domingo y Feriados: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
Martes: Por mantenimiento general sólo de 2:00 PM-7:00 PM

Estaré disponible por mensaje o correo por si me necesitan

Bocagrande es un gran sector turístico con playa y con amplia variedad de bares, restaurantes, discotecas, cafés, supermercados, centros comerciales, droguerías, peluquerías, bancos y consecución de actividades turísticas. Dentro del barrio se encuentran cadenas hoteleras muy importantes. Es famoso por su vida nocturna, y por ser centro comercial de la ciudad.

Está a 5 minutos en taxi de la Ciudad Amurallada y Muelle de los Pegazos (Donde salen embarcaciones a islas), a 12 del aeropuerto.

Se pueden acceder a la mayoría de servicios y atracciones caminando. Sin embargo, en taxi de 3 a 5 USD a los puntos más importantes de la ciudad. El taxi desde/hacia el aeropuerto cuesta 7 USD

INFORMACIÓN PROTOCOLOS COVID:

Se le solicitará a todos los huéspedes respetar con los protocolos de Bioseguridad del edificio, así como portar tapabocas en zonas comunes. Se les solicitará la siguiente información para pre-registro, de acuerdo a protocolos COVID, una vez confirmada la reserva: nombres completos, cédula/identificación, fecha de nacimiento, nacionalidad de todos los huéspedes. Sí llevan carro se necesita: placa, color, modelo, ciudad de la placa.

También por protocolos COVID se ha limitado el aforo máximo de las piscinas, por lo que se pudiera utilizar sin problema hasta que se complete el aforo máximo. Sí hay muchas personas esperando para entrar el tiempo máximo para estar en ellas es de 1 hora y media, sí no hay personas esperando para entrar no habría límite de tiempo.

Encontrará los protocolos de bioseguridad aprobados por la alcaldía de Cartagena dentro del apartamento.

description:
Beautiful apartment with amazing view and great location in Cartagena. This property has three rooms, two bathrooms, kitchen and a balcony. It also includes Air Conditioner, TV, Internet, bed sheets, blankets, bath soap and toilet paper. Close to the most iconic places in the city. This place is perfect for couples, business travelers and families with kids. 

Registro Nacional de Turismo (RNT) No. 31382

This three bedroom apartment is completely independent, you will not share it with anyone. It has three queen size bed. The two bathroom are completely equipped as well as the kitchen. You will find a fridge, microwave, blender, crockery, pots and cutlery. If you come with a baby please let me know and we will leave a baby crib. There is also free parking if you bring your vehicle. The building has 24 hours concierge/security service.

You will have access to the pool, jacuzzi, gym and sauna of the building. There is free parking and exclusive WiFi for the apartment.

I like to communicate with my guests before and during their stay. I will be available to help them with any question or recommendation they need.

Call me or text me any time you need.

This place is located right in the heart of El Laguito, which is a touristic and safe area. You will find plenty of amazing restaurants which serve authentic Colombian food and also international food. It is also close to supermarkets, ATM machines, coffee shops and pharmacies. Best beaches of Cartagena are all around this neighborhood. The old city and airport are just 10 and 20 min by taxi respectively.

We recommend to take Taxi or Uber. Ask the price before taking a Taxi.

Airport is 20 minutes away by taxi (approximately $6 US Dollars).

Old City is just 5 minutes by taxi (approximately $3 US Dollars).

You will find some water at the fridge, coffee, soap and toilet paper for one day. Once you have settled in the apartment, you can do your shopping.

If you need additional cleaning services please inform, there is an extra charge of $12 US Dollars.

If you need parking, you must inform before your arrival. It has no additional cost.

Upon arrival, guests must show their ID to the building staff and pay 6.000 pesos (around $1.5 US Dollars) per person as this building is located in a touristic area. This has to be paid just once.

additional_house_rules:
English:

1. All guests must show their ID  at the entrance of the building for check in.
2. Check in after 15:00, unless the apartment is available before. If you arrive before, we can keep your luggage.
3. Check out at 12:00 or before, otherwise, a fine equivalent to the value of one night will be charged.
4. Whenever you leave the apartment, make sure you turn off the Air Conditioner, lights and close the windows.
5. Please limit the noise. After 22:00 it is prohibited to play loud music.
6. Smoking is prohibited.
7. No drugs or prostitution.
8. Visitors are not allowed.
9. It is not allowed to throw papers, cigarettes, trash or other objects from windows or balconies.
10. If you are not satisfied with something of the apartment, you must inform it immediately. We can fix it in the shortest possible time.
11. If you break something of the apartment or building, you must pay for that.
12. We are not responsable for any loss of personal belongings or accidents in the apartment.
13. All other rules of the building or local policies must be respected.

Español:

1. Todos los huéspedes deberán mostrar un documento de identificación válido en la portería al momento de registrarse.
2. El Check in se realizará luego de las 15:00. El ingreso previo podrá realizarse siempre y cuando el apartamento esté disponible y limpio.
3. El Check out será a más tardar a las 12:00, de lo contrario, una multa equivalente al valor de una noche será cargado.
4. Siempre que salga del apartamento, asegúrese de apagar el aire acondicionado, luces y cerrar las ventanas.
5. Por favor limitar el ruido. Después de las 22:00 se encuentra prohibido poner música con alto volumen. 
6. Fumar está prohibido. Ignorar esta regla causará una penalización del valor de una noche.
7. No se permiten drogas o prostitución en el apartamento.
8. No se permiten invitados en el apartamento.
9. No está permitido arrojar papeles, cigarrillos, basura u otros objetos desde las ventanas o balcones del apartamento.
10. Si no te encuentras satisfecho con algo del apartamento, deberás informarlo inmediatamente. Intentaremos arreglarlo en el menor tiempo posible.
11. Si algún huésped daña algo del apartamento o edificio, deberán pagar antes del check out.
12. No somos responsables por pérdidas de objetos personales o accidentes al interior del apartamento.
13. Todas las demás reglas del edificio o las políticas locales deberán ser respetadas.

name: Casa Bijou, a little house in the Old City
summary: This is our dream holiday home in our favourite city! We invite you to enjoy it too. This beautiful historic home is perfect for your holiday with colonial charm, modern conveniences and beautiful furnishings. Our home is located in the heart of the Old City. It really is the perfect location to experience Historic Cartagena. With a private entrance & balcony you won't want to leave. This isn't an apartment, it's a house!
amenities: Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Fire extinguisher,Smoke alarm,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Refrigerator,Stove,Private entrance,Paid parking off premises,Host greets you
description:
This is our dream holiday home in our favourite city! We invite you to enjoy it too. This beautiful historic home is perfect for your holiday with colonial charm, modern conveniences and beautiful furnishings. Our home is located in the heart of the Old City. It really is the perfect location to experience Historic Cartagena. With a private entrance & balcony you won't want to leave. This isn't an apartment, it's a house!

A private entrance and stairs lead to the first floor. The first floor contains a sitting room with a balcony to enjoy the street (perfect for morning coffee and evening wine), a dining area and a kitchenette with everything you need.  This floor also contains a zen inspired bathroom with hot & cold water.  The bathroom also has a washer and dryer. 

A floating staircase leads to the mezzanine bedroom which overlooks the first floor. It has one Queen sized bed (UK - King). From the bedroom there is a sprial staircase leading to another floor with a lounge area overlooking the rooftops of Cartagena.

Guests enter the stairs to the main house through a secure hallway. ( Please note: the hallway also leads to a ground floor studio apartment which is also listed on Airbnb as Apartamento Bijou). The main house has its own door with locks and is featured in these photos.  It contains the sitting room, dining area, balcony, kitchenette, 1  bathroom & 1 bedroom, as well as a lounge on the top floor.  Guests will have access to all of these spaces with complete privacy.

Casa Bijou is our holiday home so we won't be around when it is rented out. Our Co-host and good friend, Milena, lives in Cartagena and will be the person who meets you at the house with the keys and is around in case you need any help during your stay. Of course feel free to send us a message if you need anything before/during your stay. We try our best to respond right away.

San Diego is the best neighbourhood in Cartagena. Historic and beautiful, it's where you'll find 5 star hotels, top restaurants and beautiful bars. The plazas are the centre of the city scene. All of this is on your doorstep waiting for you to explore. On one end of the street you have Plaza San Diego with the world famous Hotel Sofitel Santa Clara and on the other you have Plaza Fernandez de Madrid where you can enjoy a beer listening to live music on most nights! 
Some of Cartagena's finest restaurants are less than 2 minutes walk.

You can walk to everything in the Walled City, nothing is more than about 15 minutes from Casa Bijoux.  Taxis are always available in Plaza San Diego but it is never difficult to get one on the street. The yellow taxis are generally cheaper than the white ones (which are a bit bigger and slightly more comfortable). If taxis aren't your thing, you can always try a horse and carriage in the evening!

Please do not use the directions on the general listing page. That address is used to get the map to display the area where the house is located. Exact directions for the taxi are available on the house manual section of the listing which you can access after you book. The taxis will not know where you are going without this, so please take note!
neighborhood_overview:
San Diego is the best neighbourhood in Cartagena. Historic and beautiful, it's where you'll find 5 star hotels, top restaurants and beautiful bars. The plazas are the centre of the city scene. All of this is on your doorstep waiting for you to explore. On one end of the street you have Plaza San Diego with the world famous Hotel Sofitel Santa Clara and on the other you have Plaza Fernandez de Madrid where you can enjoy a beer listening to live music on most nights! 
Some of Cartagena's finest restaurants are less than 2 minutes walk.
notes: Please do not use the directions on the general listing page. That address is used to get the map to display the area where the house is located. Exact directions for the taxi are available on the house manual section of the listing which you can access after you book. The taxis will not know where you are going without this, so please take note!
additional_house_rules:
Maximum number of guests: 2, strictly no extra guests allowed. 
Smoking is only allowed on the front balcony. 
Please respect our neighbours after 10pm by keeping noise levels to a minimum. 
In order to prevent any one aircondition unit from overworking, please use ALL three at the same time or NONE at all.
interaction: Casa Bijou is our holiday home so we won't be around when it is rented out. Our Co-host and good friend, Milena, lives in Cartagena and will be the person who meets you at the house with the keys and is around in case you need any help during your stay. Of course feel free to send us a message if you need anything before/during your stay. We try our best to respond right away.
access: Guests enter the stairs to the main house through a secure hallway. ( Please note: the hallway also leads to a ground floor studio apartment which is also listed on Airbnb as Apartamento Bijou). The main house has its own door with locks and is featured in these photos.  It contains the sitting room, dining area, balcony, kitchenette, 1  bathroom & 1 bedroom, as well as a lounge on the top floor.  Guests will have access to all of these spaces with complete privacy.
transit: You can walk to everything in the Walled City, nothing is more than about 15 minutes from Casa Bijoux.  Taxis are always available in Plaza San Diego but it is never difficult to get one on the street. The yellow taxis are generally cheaper than the white ones (which are a bit bigger and slightly more comfortable). If taxis aren't your thing, you can always try a horse and carriage in the evening!

name:
El laguito Sunsets 
Serviced by MARIELA
summary: Modern, ocean front, brand new apartment located on the 34th floor in el Laguito, with breathtaking sunset views and in close proximity to the great restaurants and nightlife the city has to offer. Full maid service is included in the price.

description:
Modern, ocean front, brand new apartment located on the 34th floor in el Laguito, with breathtaking sunset views and in close proximity to the great restaurants and nightlife the city has to offer. Full maid service is included in the price.

It’s one of the most beautiful, elegant and perfectly located buildings in Cartagena. Your stay will be an unforgettable experience. The apartment is fully equipped with everything you need for your stay. In addition, each bedroom has it’s own safe deposit lock box. Every room has mini split ACs. Remember, maid service is included in the price, she does not sleep in the premises, she is available to service at the time that is convenient for you, daily, or any other day, plus she is an excellent cook!

The apartment has a fully equipped modern kitchen, washer/dryer, beautiful comfortable furniture, uhd TVs in bedrooms and living room, high speed internet, and a fully furnished terrace to enjoy amazing sunsets. The building also has a gym, 2 pools ( 1 on the main floor and one on the rooftop), there is also a private parking spot available.

I will not be available in person, but you may contact me via cell or email if there is anything you need. In addition, the rental includes my house attendant MARIELA, she is a sweet, hard worker and excellent cook that is available for all your needs

The apartment is conveniently located in El Laguito , within close proximity to the vibrant nightlife, excellent restaurants, and beaches the city has to offer. In my opinion, the apartment has hands down, the best views of the city, ocean, beach and sunset in all of Cartagena

The beaches in laguito, bocagrande, and castillo grande are walking distance, unless you want to take a 10 min boat ride to Tierra bomba beaches, the walled city is only a 10 min  ride away and the airport is a 15-20 min ride away.

When you register at the front desk, each guest will be provided with a bracelet to be worn during the entire stay. Access to the building will only be granted to guests wearing the bracelet.  As a guest, you can have visitors come where you can wait for them in the lobby and they must show ID at the front desk. For registration, please notify me the names of the people staying at least 24 hrs prior to check in.

name: Luxury Frente al Mar, a 4 minutos Centro histórico
summary: Nuestro apartamento tiene una de las mejores vistas en Cartagena. Se encuentra ubicado frente las playas de Marbella, que son amplias y muy tranquilas, a solo 4 minutos del Centro Histórico. El Apto. tiene vista al mar desde su cocina, sala-comedor, balcón y sus dos habitaciones, también cuenta con 2 baños, área de labores y parqueadero. En el edificio puedes disfrutar de gimnasio, piscina de adultos, de niños, sauna, turco, jacuzzis, parque infantil. Es el lugar ideal para descansar o trabajar.

description:
Nuestro apartamento tiene una de las mejores vistas en Cartagena. Se encuentra ubicado frente las playas de Marbella, que son amplias y muy tranquilas, a solo 4 minutos del Centro Histórico. El Apto. tiene vista al mar desde su cocina, sala-comedor, balcón y sus dos habitaciones, también cuenta con 2 baños, área de labores y parqueadero. En el edificio puedes disfrutar de gimnasio, piscina de adultos, de niños, sauna, turco, jacuzzis, parque infantil. Es el lugar ideal para descansar o trabajar.

Es un apartamento amplio, moderno luminoso, con vista a las playas de Marbella, tiene la ubicación perfecta para disfrutar de las amplias playas de la ciudad, y poder desplazarte en 4 minutos al centro histórico, ya que estamos a unas 7 cuadras del mismo y 7 minutos del aeropuerto, al igual que a diferentes lugares de interés, como restaurantes, puertos turísticos, bancos.  

Si su visita a la ciudad es para descansar, la ubicación es ideal ya que durante el día pueden ir a la playa, o disfrutar de las áreas sociales del edificio y visitar la ciudad amurallada con frecuencia por la cercanía. El apartamento esta recientemente amueblado, es fresco y bien iluminado.
En la alcoba principal, con vista directa al mar, tenemos una cama doble y un sofá cama. Esta alcoba tiene su propio closet y baño en suite con vista panorámica al mar.

En el segundo cuarto, con vista lateral al mar, tenemos dos camas semi-dobles.

El apartamento cuenta con un segunda baño completamente equipado, cocina con todo lo necesario para preparar las comidas que necesiten, sala - comedor con vista al mar y balcón con un juego de sala y una hamaca para disfrutar de la brisa y la vista.

El apartamento cuanta con aire acondicionado en ambos cuartos y en la sala, así como lavadora, secadora, calentador de agua y parqueadero propio.

Los huéspedes tienen acceso a la piscina de adulto con vista infinita frente al mar, jacuzzi, sauna, baño turco, gimnasio, zona social, piscina de niños, parque infantil.

Con gusto, estaré atenta a sus consultas, por medio de mensajes telefónicos, para hacer de su instancia una excelente experiencia.

El Edificio Alta Mar tiene una ubicación estratégica, frente a la playa, a solo pocas calles del centro histórico y 5 minutos del Aeropuerto, con vista a lugares de interés de la ciudad como el Cerro de la Popa y  el Castillo de San Felipe, además encontrará fácilmente restaurantes y tiendas.

Situado frente a una de las avenidas principales de la ciudad y a pocas calles del Centro Histórico, con fácil acceso a transporte público como taxi, InDriver, Bus.

El apartamento es impecable,  en excelente estado. Cada día trabajamos bajo políticas del buen servicio, guiándonos de los mejores estándares de calidad.

Usted podrá disfrutar del gimnasio, jacuzzi, piscina, habitaciones y un amplio balcón,  experimentando al mismo tiempo de la magia de atardeceres y amaneceres con vista al Mar Caribe.

name: 🛩 Airport Luxury Condo 2 BD 2 BA + Rooftop pool
summary:
If you wish to stay close to the airport, Crespo beach, Boca Grande, or the Walled City this is the perfect location!  

This condominium features a Rooftop Pool with sea view and aerial view of airport. This condominium is zoned for hotel and residential use in one of the safest neighborhoods in Cartagena (Status 5).

You can choose from 2 of the 3 bedrooms available - 1 King, 1 Queen, or 2 Full-Size beds. There is also 2 Full Bathrooms including HOT WATER with new Samsung washer and dryer.

You can choose from 2 of the 3 bedrooms available - 1 King, 1 Queen, or 2 Full-Size beds. There is also 2 Full Bathrooms including HOT WATER with new Samsung washer and dryer.

Perfect for business travelers, remote workers, families, small groups, or all visitors with short term stays and extended/modified travel plans. 

This spacious condominium has DirectTV and Netflix in all rooms and is WiFi Intelligent with all SAMSUNG appliances featuring a 75 in SAMSUNG SMART UHD TV, Two 50 inch SAMSUNG OLED TV's, SAMSUNG refrigerator, AC (each room), washer and driver.

The King and Queen Bedrooms each contain a computer desk perfect for remote workers and learners. The fourth bedroom (not pictured) contains a bathroom normally reserved for hospitality, service, and utility. It can be converted for additional space and lodging by request.  There are also headboards and mirrors in each room that are not pictured (soon to be updated online).

This is a full service AirBnB and we take pride in our ability to maximize the enjoyment of your stay. You are our guest and we care about your experience here in Cartagena.  Our guest policy is simple, secure, and standard with most tourism and travel guidelines. You can check in guest/visitors at anytime with approved passport or government identification.

Crespo is one of best areas to enjoy your stay in Cartagena. La Frontier is a new building approx. one block away from the arrivals section of the CTG airport. This area features all amenities for local  grocery shopping and essentials.

The close proximity to the beach/boardwalk for exercise/leisure, CTG airport, and walled city makes Crespo is a one of the fastest growing and convenient areas in Cartagena to plan your vacation. 

We will kindly provide access to our team of trustworthy, affordable, and reliable taxi drivers and concierge for all hours or travel, grocery delivery, catering, and tour purposes as per request.

I have staff that helps me with everything in Cartagena. I'll be always on top of what is happening. So you can call me or write me and I'll send someone to check in case you need help with anything.

The Bocagrande (Big Mouth) area contains the bulk of the city's tourist facilities, such as hotels, shops, restaurants, nightclubs and art galleries. It is located between Cartagena Bay to the east and the Caribbean Sea to the west, to include El Laguito (The Little Lake) and Castillogrande (Big Castle), two neighborhoods. Bocagrande has long beaches and commercial activity found along Avenida San Martín

Transportation is easy to get on this part of Cartagena. BocaGrande is one of the most exclusive sectors of Cartagena. Lots of great restaurants, hotels, stores and only a 5-10 min drive to "La Amurallada" or the city center.

Only the people registered in the apartment are the ones allowed in the building. To register someone you must send me full names 24 hours before arrival. This apartment can register maximum of 6 people in total! No other guests are allowed inside the building.

The apartment has two bedrooms, one with a king size bed and one with two full size beds. In the living room there’s a sofa bed, two chairs, a 49” TV with cable and a PS4 with a few games. Each room has AC. 

The building (Edificio Ayos) includes an elevator and stairs that lead to the third-floor apartment.  One bedroom includes a king size bed and a desk. Another bedroom includes two full-size beds that could be joined together. The living room includes a table with six dining chairs, two armchairs, a sofa that may be converted into a single bed, a TV with cable, a PS4 and a few games.

The apartment building is within short walking distance to many cafes and restaurants. 

The lobby front desk is staffed with a receptionist 24 hours a day. After 10 pm, guests who are not registered will not be allowed to enter the building. All guests must be registered at the front desk.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment, which includes a washer and dryer. It also includes a small kitchen with oven and refrigerator. Showers include hot water.

Guests will also have access to the rooftop terrace, where there is a common hot tub and a barbecue. There is also a common use pool in the lobby area.

I am usually available by Airbnb email, text message, and email. I can also be reached by phone: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).  

You can also call the receptionist of Edificio Ayos by day (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) from the apartment phone. If you are using a (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), dial (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).

There are many cafes and restaurants near the apartment, which overlooks a lively street just north of the Cathedral de Santa Catalina de Alejandria, which is a prominent cathedral also known as Cartagena Cathedral and is a great landmark because of its size and vibrant colors; it can be seen from the perimeters of the city. Ábaco is a bookstore with a cafe and is one of our favorites. Across from Abaco is Mila, which has excellent desserts and coffee. Zaitun is a Lebanese-Colombian fusion restaurant and is also one of our favorites. Peru Fusion makes splendid sushi. Cande serves authentic Cartagenan food and features nightly entertainment.

Everything in the walled city is within walking distance. Bike rental shops are scattered throughout the center. You can also take one of the many horse-drawn carriages. A horse-drawn carriage, which accommodates up to six people, can be hired to tour the walled city for 65,000 pesos (about $20). 

If you need to park a car, drive to EasyPark, located near University de Cartagena at Carrera 6 $36-177, a five minute walk from the apartment.

In the showers, hot and cold water control is reversed; blue is hot and red is cold. Help yourself to any food and drink in the apartment. Wine glasses are stored in the cupboard directly under the TV. Tea is stored in the bottom cupboard next to the refrigerator.

We try to minimize our impact on the environment, therefore we encourage you to use the aluminum canteens provide by us (in the kitchen cabinet) to carry your water while you walk around the city. Please use them and return them before you check out.

Ábaco is a bookstore with a cafe and is one of our favorites. Across from Abaco is Mila, which has excellent desserts and coffee. Zaitun is a Lebanese-Colombian fusion restaurant and is also one of our favorites. Peru Fusion makes splendid sushi. Cande serves authentic Cartagenan food and features nightly entertainment.

description:
Apartamento piso 22 en Cartagena Bocagrande, cómodo, totalmente dotado, espectacular vista al mar y las playas, estratégicamente ubicado, excelentes rutas de transporte, sector seguro y altamente turístico. Exclusivo edificio que cuenta con piscina y jacuzzi.

Apartamento con 2 habitaciones, cada habitación dotada de cama tamaño Quinn, colchón adicional para acomodación extra. Cocina totalmente dotada, cuenta con lavadora y secadora, calentador de agua, 3  tv por cable, wifi. Brindamos un espacio totalmente dotado para tu estadía a partir de 2 noches. 
La vista es espectacular sin importar si es de día o de noche.
Cerca al centro histórico, centros comerciales, restaurantes y discotecas, frente a la playa.

Tenemos un agente turístico presente en el sector para que te resuelva cualquier necesidad o inconveniente en el menor tiempo posible

A 5 minutos en carro del centro histórico (ciudad amurallada) y a 10  minutos en carro del aeropuerto.
additional_house_rules:
No se aceptan mascotas
Menores sin compañía de sus padres, deben presentar autorización de uno de los padres hecha en notaría. 
Servicio de limpieza es adicional, cada servicio tiene costo de $50.000. Es obligatorio cancelar 1 servicio de limpieza para asear el apartamento al momento de la salida del huésped.
Los huéspedes pueden fumar en el edificio donde esté estrictamente permitido, en el apartamento solo es permitido fumar en el balcón.
los visitantes son permitidos desde las 9 am hasta las 9 pm. en caso de que se desee que el invitado amanezca, este debe ser registrado por lo menos 8 horas antes del ingreso. en este caso debe tener en cuenta que si cuente con la capacidad el apartamento (6 en total) y deberá enviar nombre y numero de identificación del invitado.
