name: Exclusive Beachfront Apt in Bocagrande+Walled City
summary:
Welcome to this luxurious beachfront property with stunning views & amenities in the most exclusive zone in Bocagrande.
Only 15 min from the airport & 5 min from the Walled Cit. It includes a spectacular rooftop pool on the 40th floor that offers a panoramic view of Cartagena. It is near major malls, bars, restaurants & supermarkets
Modern & comfortable suite with tasteful & stylized functional furnishings.
I am delighted to share this upscale property, hoping that friends & guests feel at home!
amenities: Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Hot tub,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Beach essentials,Ethernet connection,Hot water,Children’s dinnerware,Room-darkening shades,Paid parking off premises,Single level home,Free street parking,Barbecue utensils,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Cleaning before checkout,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Beachfront,Ski-in/Ski-out,Waterfront,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm
description:
Welcome to this luxurious beachfront property with stunning views & amenities in the most exclusive zone in Bocagrande.
Only 15 min from the airport & 5 min from the Walled Cit. It includes a spectacular rooftop pool on the 40th floor that offers a panoramic view of Cartagena. It is near major malls, bars, restaurants & supermarkets
Modern & comfortable suite with tasteful & stylized functional furnishings.
I am delighted to share this upscale property, hoping that friends & guests feel at home!

The building, Murano Elite, is located in the exclusive area of Bocagrande, just 15 min from the Rafael Núñez International Airport and 5 min from the Walled City; next to the new Hyatt Regency and Estelar Cartagena Hotels, whose bars, spa and restaurants I am sure you will enjoy. The apartment is a few minute walk from the Bocagrande Mall as well as shops and supermarkets, restaurants, discos and casinos. Definitely the best area in Cartagena due to its safety and excellent location and perhaps one of Bocagrande’s condos that is closest from one of Cartagena’s greatest treasures- The Walled City.

This beachfront luxury suite is located on the 27th floor on the shores of the Caribbean Sea and features an open concept living room, dining room, kitchen and balcony. Floor to ceiling sliding doors and windows in the living room and bedrooms let the sunlight in permanently and will allow you to enjoy the beauty of its views from every corner of the apartment day and night, it will definitely tempt you to stay in!
This modern apartment, newly built, has an area of 100 m2 plus balcony, two spacious rooms with A/C and TV, two + one bathrooms, laundry area plus all the available services of a tasteful furnished apartment including a large social area. An ideal space for families and groups of maximum 6 people. Amenities include a beautiful swimming pool with Jacuzzi, social areas and beach.

Our guests have access to the complete apartment as well as many resort amenities including all of the buildings' pools on the 3 and 40 floors, Jacuzzis and sunbathing beds and chairs, Gym facilities and all lounging areas along with visitor parking and elevators.
Kindly help yourself to anything in the apartment, bathrooms and kitchen. 
Everything is for your comfort and enjoyment!

I will be available throughout your stay to help with anything you may need. I'm always a phone call,  e-mail or text away any time of the day.

In this neighborhood you will find a large variety of restaurants that offer different cuisines as well as bars and casinos. We are adjacent to a Shopping Center with cinemas and banks as well as grocery stores. There are also various spas, beauty salons, pharmacies, and gas stations.
You will be close to a variety of luxurious businesses and boutiques, but will also get a chance to see and experience the beautiful artisan craft goods that are sold by locals
in the area. Everything you need in a very safe and quiet space.

The apartment is located in the Bocagrande neighborhood. It is about a 15 min taxi ride from the Rafael Núñez International Airport and a 5 minute cab ride from the old town. 
Local transit:
Walking from the apartment to the Santander monument (which is where the walled city begins) will take you, at a normal pace, about 13-15 minutes maximum along the coast sidewalk.
Taxis are found all over the city and you can hail them on the spot (keep in mind that in Cartagena taxis do not use taximeters, so before you get in ask how much they will charge beforehand). 
Buses are also available at the designated bus stops and terminals. 
Parking:
Parking is free on the street and is also available for a fee at different locations such as the Boca Grande mall or other private lots around the apartment’s vicinity.

Due to the buildings' policy and for security reasons, every guest must be duly registered at the front desk. 
Please note, some spaces in the building are restricted to residents only. This includes the spa, event room, business center.

Las normas del edificio no permiten visitantes, solo se autoriza el ingreso a las personas que envían como huéspedes en una lista que se debe enviar un día antes de su llegada.
Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio.  Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio cuando lleguen sólo deben presenta su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio. Deberán portarla durante su estadía así podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin que les tengan que preguntar para dónde van. Lo hacemos por seguridad en el
Edificio.  Igualmente debo informar que no se aceptan visitantes.
notes:
Gracias por contar con nosotros para su alojamiento Para poder cumplir con las políticas de ingreso del edificio es necesario enviar una autorización de ingreso con los nombres y número de identificación de los huéspedes mínimo 2 días antes Si no cumplimos con este requisito no permitirán el ingreso. 
El edificio por reglamento no permite visitantes. Solo pueden ingresar las personas que están en la lista de huéspedes que solicitamos unos días antes de su llegada. Por favor no insistir en solicitar que otra persona ingrese porque no va a ser posible. Debemos cumplir las normas del edificio y del reglamento de convivencia.
Las normas del edificio no permiten visitantes, solo se autoriza el ingreso a las personas que envían como huéspedes en una lista que se debe enviar un día antes de su llegada.
Nuestros huéspedes deben enviar sus nombres y número de identidad para generar una orden de ingreso al edificio.  Estos datos estarán en la portería del edificio cuando lleguen sólo deben presenta su documento de identidad. Les pondrán una manilla que los identificara como huéspedes del edificio. Deberán portarla durante su estadía así podrán ingresar y salir del edifico sin que les tengan que preguntar para dónde van. Lo hacemos por seguridad en el
Edificio.  Igualmente debo informar que no se aceptan visitantes.
interaction: Nuestro equipo de trabajo y de seguridad del edificio estará atento para colaborar.
access:
El
Edificio cuenta con vigilancia de 24 horas, piscina, baño turco, gimnasio jacuzzi.

"Un gran lugar para quedarse. Apartamento muy confortable, limpio y en excelentes condiciones. Me encanta el Jacuzzi en el balcón con una vista increíble. Muy relajante. Las personas a cargo son muy amables, amigables y serviciales. Cerca del aeropuerto, restaurantes y tiendas. Recomiendo mucho este lugar" -Robert, Febrero 05

Nuestro hermoso Apartamento en un 5to nivel ofrece un escape tropical frente a la playa de La Boquilla. Nade o bucee en el mar Caribe y explore la histórica ciudad amurallada del casco antiguo de Cartagena, que se encuentra a solo unos 15 minutos en auto. Con nuestra piscina sin fin en la terraza (nivel 11) con vista al mar y Jacuzzi privado en el apartamento, no querrá irse. Cuando deba dirigirse a su hogar, el Aeropuerto Internacional Rafael Núñez (CTG) se encuentra a menos de 5 kilómetros del Apartamento.

→ Apartamento ubicado la zona más exclusiva cerca al Hotel Radisson
→ Luz natural en todos los espacios
→ Cortinas Black Out en todas las habitaciones 
→ Jacuzzi privado
→ Incluye persona de aseo todos los días, SIN cargo adicional (opcional)
→ Lavadora y secadora
→ Agua caliente en todos los baños y cocina
→ Cocina totalmente equipada
→ Estacionamiento privado cubierto
→ Acceso directo a la playa


Aspectos que debe tener en cuenta:
→ No se aceptan fiestas o ruidos 
→ No se permite ingresar personas diferentes a las que reservaron (visitas)
→ El vidrio del balcón junto a el jacuzzi está reparado, solo estuve malo el día en que se tomaron las fotos 


• ¿Es esta tu primera reserva en Airbnb? Use este enlace para recibir $ 155.000 de descuento en su estadía: 
→   https://es-l.airbnb.com/c/estebanl502

Este apartamento le quitara el aliento desde el primer minuto en que ingrese por su hermosa vista, estilo y espacios acogedores e iluminados.
Los huéspedes tendrán disponible toda la propiedad incluido
• Jacuzzi privado
• Piscina sin fin en la terraza
• Acceso a la playa
• Estacionamiento privado
• Gimnasio

La persona encargada del aseo sera la encargada de atender cualquier requerimiento urgente y sera la persona que lo reciba y realice el aseo cada día. Yo también estaré disponible cuando lo necesite.

Esta cerca de todo, Aeropuerto a 5 kms, Ciudad Amurallada a 15 minutos, cerca de los mejores hoteles y al frente de la playa de La Boquilla la cual es una de las mas exclusivas zona de Cartagena.

Le recomendamos realizar las siguientes actividades:
• Ciudad Amurallada (15min en carro)
• Castillo de San Felipe de Barajas
• Playa Blanca (45min en Bote)
• Baile Salsa en el Cafe Habana
• Disfrute de Flyboard (renta en el hotel Radisson)
• Isla del Rosario, incluyendo Barú, Cholon y Playa Blanca

• Taxi
• Vehiculo propio
• Uber
• Moto
• Bicicleta

Descuento para recogida en el Aeropuerto o Cartagena con el código Uber 
→  uberferrarimedellinueue

Si surge algún problema, haremos nuestro mejor esfuerzo para tomar medidas lo antes posible, contamos con una persona amable que le ayudara con cualquier detalle durante su estadía y estará  en el apartamento, puede coordinar con ella su horario

name: Light-flooded 2BR Luxury Apartment 2808
summary:
While staying at Light-flooded 2BR Luxury Apartment, you'll be treated to gorgeous water views and private relaxation areas with a infinity pool. This elegant Apartment features plenty of sun and is one of our top bocagrande apartment. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, It is recognized for the number of activities you can do in the same building, cinema, shopping stores, beaches, gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi.

On warm afternoons, go for a dip in the large pool, it's surrounded by a deck with lounge chairs and tropical sky view and overlooks the sea.

Step into the living room it opens up to the Balcony, perfectly blending the comforts of indoor and outdoor living. The decor is a mix of colonial and contemporary styles with plush sofas and accents done in soft, neutral colors. The fully equipped kitchen has stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. You'll also find extra gadgets like a dishwasher and an espresso machine for early morning lattes.

Up to four guests can stay in the Light-flooded 2BR Luxury Apartment on either side of living room, allowing for maximum privacy. Both feature Queen-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and televisions.
The beaches at Bocagrande offer a bounty of activities from snorkeling to deep-sea fishing to wind surfing and sailing or simply just taking in some sun on the sand, the nearest one is just 1 minutes away. 

Bedroom 1:  Queen size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, US satellite television, 
 
Bedroom 2:  Queen size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Safe, US satellite television, DVD player, Ocean view

Español 

Durante su estadía en el apartamento de lujo 2BR inundado de luz, disfrutará de hermosas vistas al mar y áreas privadas de relajación con una piscina infinita. Este elegante apartamento cuenta con mucho sol y es uno de nuestros mejores apartamentos en bocagrande. 
Ubicado en el Mar Caribe, es reconocido por la cantidad de actividades que puede realizar en el mismo edificio, cine, tiendas, playas, gimnasio, piscina, jacuzzi. 

En las tardes cálidas, date un chapuzón en la gran piscina, que está rodeada por una terraza, vistas al cielo tropical y con vistas al mar. 

Ingrese a la sala de estar que se abre al Balcón, combinando perfectamente a las comodidades de la vida interior y exterior. La decoración es una mezcla de estilos coloniales y contemporáneos con sofás y asientos lujosos hechos en colores suaves y neutros. La cocina totalmente equipada tiene electrodomésticos de acero inoxidable y mucho espacio en el mostrador. También encontrarás aparatos adicionales como un lavaplatos y una máquina de café expreso para tomar café con leche temprano en la mañana.

Hasta cuatro personas pueden alojarse en el apartamento de lujo 2BR inundado de luz a ambos lados de la sala de estar, lo que permite la máxima privacidad. Ambas cuentan con camas Queen, baños dentro de cada habitación, aire acondicionado, ventiladores de techo y televisores.

Las playas de Bocagrande ofrecen una gran cantidad de actividades, desde snorkel hasta pesca en alta mar, windsurf y vela o simplemente tomar el sol en la arena, la más cercana está a solo 1 minuto. 


Habitacion 1: cama de matrimonio, baño privado con ducha, aire acondicionado, ventilador de techo, televisión por satélite 

Habitacion 2: cama de matrimonio, baño privado con ducha, aire acondicionado, ventilador de techo, caja fuerte, televisión, Reproductor de DVD, vista al mar


IMPORTANT: This is a residential building so we don't allow guests that are not registered prior to checkin. Not visits are allowed. Maximum occupancy can't be surpassed.

IMPORTANTE: Este es un edificio residencial por lo que no aceptamos huespedes/invitados que no estén debidamente registrados antes del check-in. No aceptamos visitas. La maxima ocupación de la propiedad nunca podrá ser superada.

- Standard Check-in is at 15:00 pm and Check-out is at 12:00 pm / Check-in es a las 15:00 PM y Check-out es a las 12:00 PM

To ensure a 5-star experience, Huespedia offers professional online concierge services (free of charge) to help guests with recommendations, venue reservations, tours or anything else that might be required during your stay. You can use this service from the time you make your reservation - take advantage of this service to help you plan your trip for free!

Para asegurar una experiencia 5 estrellas, Huespedia ofrece (sin costo alguno) su servicio de conserje profesional en línea para ayudarlo con recomendaciones, reservas de restaurantes, alquiler de yates y otras necesidades que pueda tener durante su visita. Lo invitamos a que utilize este servicio desde el momento de su reserva para ayudarno a planear sus vacaciones!

Bocagrande

Best way to get to the unit from the Airport is to take a Taxi for ~19,000 Colombian Pesos (~$7 USD). Please tell the driver to take you to Calle san juan de Dios #3 - 121, next to el corral and meters before the San Pero Claver Church in Centro Amurallado or Old City (Walled City) / La mejor forma de llegar a la propiedad desde el aeropuerto es tomar un taxi certificado por aproximadamente 19.000 pesos colombianos (~7 USD). Por favor pidale al conductor que lo lleve a la Calle san juan de Dios #3 - 121, justo antes de el corral y a metros de la plaza de san pedro en la ciudad amurallada.

- Check Out: 10:00 am

name: This home, is where I want to be...
summary: This is one of the very few Luxury buildings you’ll find in the old city. Counts with a 24/7 doorman/concierge, Two Rooftop Pools, Sauna, great common spaces and beautiful interior garden. It also counts with a Generator, very important in Cartagena. Location is unbeatable it’s half a block away from Plaza San Pedro, a plaza full of life, art, restaurants and bars. The apartment is on a first floor, has a full kitchen, A/C, patio with views to the central garden of the building.
amenities: Elevator,Gym,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Babysitter recommendations,Room-darkening shades,Single level home,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Luggage dropoff allowed,Bed linens,Patio or balcony,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit

This is one of the very few Luxury buildings you’ll find in the old city. Counts with a 24/7 doorman/concierge, Two Rooftop Pools, Sauna, great common spaces and beautiful interior garden. It also counts with a Generator, very important in Cartagena. Location is unbeatable it’s half a block away from Plaza San Pedro, a plaza full of life, art, restaurants and bars. The apartment is on a first floor, has a full kitchen, A/C, patio with views to the central garden of the building.

The apartment has an open kitchen engaging with the living room and a private patio. The generous sized living room has a TV and STRONG A/C all throughout the apartment. The bedroom has a King Size bed, TV, closets and A/C.

Included in quote:

- Fresh towels and linens.
- Cabled TV
- High Speed Wireless Internet
- Basic Amenities such as shampoo, soap, etc.
- Patio
- Two Rooftop pools (building amenity)
- Sauna (building amenity)
- Small gym (building amenity)

Additional:

- Housekeeper ($20 USD / Day) *** PLEASE LET US KNOW 1 DAY AHEAD OR BEFORE 10AM FOR SAME DAY SERVICE ***
- A yacht or boat can be arranged for a fee
- Transportation to and from the airport for a fee

We just a phone call, text or email away to help you with anything you may need!

LOCATION LOCATION !!!!! The Building is centrally located there is a Super Market just one block away. And Plaza San Diego also just a block away where you can find some of the Top Cartagena Restaurants and bars.

There are NO overnight visitors allowed. The only guests that can spend the night are those who are in the check in. No parties allowed the building is residential.

Espectacular y lujuso apartamento en la zona mas exclusiva de Cartagena,con la mejor vista de la ciudad, totalmente dotado con todas las comodidades para que tu estancia sea igual que un hotel 5 estrellas, zonas humedas increíbles, jacuzzi, sauna, turco, gym,cuenta con aparcamiento gratuito, aire acondicionado, y confortables camas que haran de tu estancia la mejor experiencia!
Se encuentra ubicado a 2 minutos de la playa, a 10 min de la ciudad amurallada y en el mejor sector de Cartagena!

Nuestro espacio te encantara ya que fue diseñado con exclusivas comodidades que un huesped como tu se merece! Comodas camas que hacen de tus vacaciones la mejor estancia! 
Ubicado en el mejor sector de Cartagena cerca de todas las tiendas y restaurantes a 10 minutos del centro histórico y a solo 3 cuadras de la playa!! Cuenta con agua caliente, aire acondicionado en todas las habitaciones,toallas de playa y una cocina totalmente equipada para ti y tu familia!
Si deseas podemos brindarte una persona que te ayude cada dia en tu estancia por un precio adicional! 
también tenemos servicio de lancha hacia las islas para que puedas disfrutar con tus amigos.
Este apartamento tiene la mejor vista de la ciudad ! Te encantará!!!

Nuestro alojamiento cuenta con una extraordinaria piscina para adultos, también piscina de niños y dos espectaculares jacuzzis que estaran abiertos de 8am a 7pm todos los dias!
Este moderno edificio cuenta con 4 modernos ascensores, sauna, gimnasio todo esto a tu disposición!
Vigilancia  y acceso al edificio 24 horas.

por medio de mi teléfono,llamadas y msj estare atenta a responder cualquier inquietud que este a mi alcance solucionar! tenemos servicio de lancha privada para ir a las islas con tu grupo familiar o de amigos!!

Este apartamento esta ubicado en el mejor sector de Bocagrande cerca a todo !!

puedes tomar un taxi o un Uber desde el aeropuerto hasta el apartamento por un valor de 8 dólares o 20 mil pesos Colombianos

se debe usar tapanen las áreas comunes como recepción, elevador.

la piscina y el gimnasio se reserva previamente a tu llegada, me comunicare contigo para reservar para ti las fechas que requieras en tu estadía.

name: Stunning 3 Bedroom Apartment on the beach
summary: 3 bedrooms. Sleeps 7. Enjoy this beachfront 3 bedroom 3 bathroom condo on the 32th floor is perfect for a large family or group of friends. You will find all the creature comforts of home including fast WIFI, strong A/C in every room, a fully equipped kitchen, hot water, and a washer/dryer combo. The building is located in one of the safest areas of Cartagena with 24-hour supermarkets, restaurants, shops and pharmacies within walking distance. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.

Todo el apartamento

Guests have access to the pool, parking garage, and lobby. There is no gym available to guests. Visitor hours are from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. All guests and visitors must present a valid government-issued photo ID upon arrival. Only registered guests are allowed access to the building 24 hours and to the pool area. Any visitors who would like to stay past 10pm need to be registered with the front desk as a guest before 10pm.

si todo el tiempo

bares, cafe, droguerias, cetro comerciales, hospitales todo muy cerca

The neighborhood is very safe. You can easily walk around in Bocagrande or hail a taxi from the building to the Old Walled City. You can also use Uber in Colombia. The Old Walled City is just a short taxi ride away, about a 5-minute ride, which costs about $2-3usd. Tipping cab drivers is not common in Cartagena, and it is always better to pay in pesos rather than with dollars.

Has 3 bedrooms each with its own television and air conditioning, 3 bathrooms, living room and dining room with air conditioning, kitchen, laundry room with washer/dryer, large balcony and at the same time very well equipped with an impeccable cleanliness. Wi-fi  20 mg and hot water heater.

Beautiful Ocean view. Very well located, close to tourist places. The social area has a large adult pool, two jacuzzis, sauna, steam room, gym and a kiddie pool and park for children. 24 hour private surveillance.

The apartment has free, indoor, covered parking. You can easily get taxis and delivery service for meals and drugstores. By car, it is located just 5 minutes from the airport and 5 minutes from the historic old town section of Cartagena.

The beach and sea are across the street from the building. On the beach you will find vendors that rent sunshade canopies and chairs also mobile vendors that sell food and drink.

Taxis and public buses are abundant and inexpensive.

name: Casa Tucan
summary: A charming two bedroom, 2.5 bathroom House in the heart of Getsemani, a few steps from Plaza de la Trinidad and Cartagena’s coveted restaurants, galleries and shops. The property includes a large living room, dining area, kitchen, outdoor patio and swimming pool. Housekeeping is included every other day (except Sundays & holidays) to ensure a stress-free stay.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Pack ’n Play/travel crib,Paid parking off premises,Single level home,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Refrigerator,Stove,Lockbox,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Shower gel,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
A charming two bedroom, 2.5 bathroom House in the heart of Getsemani, a few steps from Plaza de la Trinidad and Cartagena’s coveted restaurants, galleries and shops. The property includes a large living room, dining area, kitchen, outdoor patio and swimming pool. Housekeeping is included every other day (except Sundays & holidays) to ensure a stress-free stay.

As you walk through the private entrance, you will find a large living room and dining room area with high ceilings. Just beyond it you will find the kitchen, which gives access to a small external hallway with two bedrooms on the left hand side. As you reach the end of the hall, the space opens up to a generous outdoor patio with a lounge and a swimming pool. The Master bedroom accommodates up to three guests, and boasts a full bathroom with a spacious independent shower. Next door, a second bedroom accommodates up to three guests, and also includes a full bathroom with a spacious independent shower. With its high ceilings, the living room is ideal for hosting visitors or simply escaping the afternoon heat.

I am not always in Cartagena, however it is possible that we might coincide. My family home is only a few blocks away. Ana, our property manager, will be available at all times.

Getsemani is a lively neighborhood, and the people that live here like to listen to music, and can be seen in the streets playing dice games and partying. It is great fun to watch and they are all very friendly, however  it gets noisy, especially over the weekend. There is also a bar next door that plays live music until late almost every night of the week.

When you hop in the taxi at the airport, please tell the driver to take you to "la esquina de la Calle del Pozo con el Callejón Ancho" (the corner of Calle del Pozo and Callejón Ancho) in Getsemaní. The best way to get around Getsemaní and the Old Town is by foot, otherwise I highly recommend hiring a horse drawn carriage for a tour of the beautiful colonial streets. When arriving from the airport, the local taxi service is a good option. They will be able to drop you off about thirty meters from the entrance of the house.

Housekeeping is included (every other day) in the rental price (except for Sundays and holidays). Sheets and towels are changed every other day, however if the that day falls on a Sunday (or holiday), they will be changed on the Monday (or following work day).
neighborhood_overview: Getsemani is a lively neighborhood, and the people that live here like to listen to music, and can be seen in the streets playing dice games and partying. It is great fun to watch and they are all very friendly, however  it gets noisy, especially over the weekend. There is also a bar next door that plays live music until late almost every night of the week.
notes: Housekeeping is included (every other day) in the rental price (except for Sundays and holidays). Sheets and towels are changed every other day, however if the that day falls on a Sunday (or holiday), they will be changed on the Monday (or following work day).

interaction: I am not always in Cartagena, however it is possible that we might coincide. My family home is only a few blocks away. Ana, our property manager, will be available at all times.

The best way to get around Getsemaní and the Old Town is by foot, otherwise I highly recommend hiring a horse drawn carriage for a tour of the beautiful colonial streets. When arriving from the airport, the local taxi service is a good option. They will be able to drop you off about thirty meters from the entrance of the house.

summary:
Hermosa casa playera de 600mts que consta de 4cuartos, todos con aire acondicionado incluida zonas sociales. Adicional la casa cuenta con  3 terrazas, una de ellas se encuentra  en el último piso con Jacuzzi y vista a la playa, las otras  tienen vista a la  piscina.  
La casa se encuentra a 5 minutos de la ciudad amurallada. Cerca existen 6 restaurantes, de los cuales 2 se encuentran en el hotel las américas el cual se encuentra diagonal a la casa  y a 2 cuadras se puede encontrar un MiniMarket.

Excelente sitio para estar en Cartagena, una casa hermosa, un servicio de primera  y como lo dicen nuestros clientes " La calidad de los cuartos mejor que un hotel"

Las áreas comunes son muy amplias en el primer piso se encuentra una sala y un comedor muy amplios y con aire acondicionado para disfrutar del la estancia en todo momento. Adicional el jacuzzi en el ultimo piso con una hermosa vista a la playa

Para la atención a los huéspedes tenemos la empleada encargada del aseo de la casa que los acompañará durante su estancia. Así mismo estoy atento como anfitrión en solucionar sus inquietudes

La casa se encuentra en una ubicación inigualable, queda al lado del hotel las Américas sobre la
Mejor playa de Cartagena, con bandera azul internacional que la cataloga como una de las mejores playas del caribe colombiano

La boquilla, sector cielo mar 20 - 64 casa 2 conjunto solárium

Les prestamos a nuestros huéspedes el servicio de vuelta a la bahía en catamaran por un costo adicional.

name: Sunset penthouse private jacuzzi! Amazing view!
summary: Penthouse on the 39th floor of one of the most prestigious building in Cartagena. 2 master bedrooms with 2 full size beds each, private full bathrooms in each room and walk in closet as well. Fully equipped kitchen, dinning room area, private jacuzzi on balcony over looking the ocean and Tierrabomba island. Spectacular view! Beach two blocks away. Restaurant walking distance. Rooftop with pool and jacuzzi, and another pool on the first floor both over looking the sea.

name: House w/ Rooftop & private pool @Belocalagagency
summary: This is a vibrant Caribbean house, with nice spaces to gather some friends and family. It has a private pool, patio, and 100 sqm rooftop; very well located in a residential neighborhood, away from the noisy touristic center, and surrender by local restaurants. If you want to have an authentic local experience, full of fun,  good food, and popular music then you might enjoy spending time in our place. I'll be happy to help you discover how beautiful our culture is. Don't miss the opp to #BELOCAL.
amenities: Free parking on premises,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Free street parking,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Keypad,Private entrance,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Fire extinguisher,First aid kit
description:
This is a vibrant Caribbean house, with nice spaces to gather some friends and family. It has a private pool, patio, and 100 sqm rooftop; very well located in a residential neighborhood, away from the noisy touristic center, and surrender by local restaurants. If you want to have an authentic local experience, full of fun,  good food, and popular music then you might enjoy spending time in our place. I'll be happy to help you discover how beautiful our culture is. Don't miss the opp to #BELOCAL.

The house is located in a local neighborhood, 5.4km (33 miles)  away from Oldtown. The ride is only 3 USD,  so please do not miss the chance to see the reality of Cartagena, interact with friendly locals, and support our community. 

The house is very stylish, bright and comfortable, you will be delighted with all the features and things to do inside of our place. The romantic rooftop with  100sqm was designed for relaxation, you will be able to practice meditation, Barre, Yoga, or simply stretch your self with light workouts. We can provide your private instructors to do it so, just let us know what is your interest.  Don't miss the chance to organize a full pool BBQ day, hire our Chef Andres from Weatfoodyguide,  and have extraordinary meals with cold beers. 

The kitchen is perfect to have dinner parties or cooking lessons. The bedrooms are spacious, with cool AC and nice beds. The living room is very inviting to watch football games and movies. And the patio has a fresh environment to enjoy the pool, read a book, or have fresh Mango Juice from the Tree.

We provide a pick-up service to make sure your check-in is smooth and free of stress, (our drivers charge 10 - 15 USD).  We know how complex is the address structure in the city, it is even hard for locals. So please give us always your flight details and the right number of visitors to coordinate your arrival.

BONUS:  We also own a selection of boats, let us know your preferences, we can give you great rates per day.

Remember you are renting the entire place.

I love to show my guests the reality of the city, Cartagena is more than what it is shown in pictures,  our city has genuine people and places. I am more up to recommend cultural and outdoor experiences.   I usually invite my guests to practice kitesurfing or paddleboarding, check my suggestions if you want to enjoy the culture like a local.

Alto Bosque is a residential neighborhood, away from the noisy city center but only 13 minutes away from Oldtown (5,4 km or 33 miles). It is a safe place to be around, it has plenty of local restaurants,  3 of them are the best for local choices (Visit Rancho Grande, La Brasa, and Santadereano). You have many grocery stores around and supermarkets, Olimpica, D1, and Exito. 
Make sure to practice your Spanish we say "!Buenos Dias!" (Good Morning) - to everybody even though we do not know them :)

I always recommend my guests to take an UBER or Indriver (the new app in the city for public transportation). It is a faster, cheaper and safer way to travel inside the city.

I am very happy to share my place with you, so please contact me anytime. Especially, if you have an interest in what to do in Cartagena. I would be happy to show you our culture and traditions, and  I am sure that would occur only if you meet authentic people.

TIPS: 
 
Do not Exchange Money at the airport, (or maybe only 100 USD)  I hear from my guests they had some unfair behaviors. Pick a better one by the old town after comparing the rates. We also can help you with small amounts while you set down,  we usually don’t have more than 200 USD. 

If you want to get breakfast or lunch or have a special dinner, we especially recommend ANDRES from @weatfoodguide, the best Chef. He makes delicious Caribbean plates and can even offer lessons if you are interested. I deeply recommend his taste and experiences.  Very affordable.

We also own a selection of boats, let us know your preferences, we can give you great rates per day.

If you are the type of visitor that enjoys cultural experiences, I will be so happy sharing the most valuable tours of the city and the country.

It is a safe place to be around, it has plenty of local restaurants,  3 of them are the best for local choices (Visit Rancho Grande, La Brasa, and Santadereano). You have many grocery stores around and supermarkets, Olimpica, D1, and Exito. 
Make sure to practice your Spanish we say "!Buenos Dias!" (Good Morning) - to everybody even though we do not know them :)

name: Super Luxury 3 BR with Private Jacuzzi
summary: The Apartment is located in El Laguito / Bocagrande, close to the Hilton Hotel in Cartagena. It has all the facilities, private jacuzzi on the balcony, access to the beach, 2 pools, 24 hour security. Spectacular views! It has one large terrace over looking the ocean, Fast WIFI, Fully loaded kitchen, washer dryer. You will not find a better location than this one..

Spectacular views! It has one large terrace over looking the ocean, Fast WIFI, Fully loaded kitchen, washer dryer. You will not find a better location than this one..

Dear travelers,

We want to inform you that on our property we are aware of how important cleaning and disinfection of our space is to you, and that’s why we join Airbnb's advanced cleaning program.  Our entire work team will have the protective equipment while cleaning (personal items such as disposable gloves, aprons or gowns and face masks). All of our staff will be trained on measures to prevent the spread of germs. All our linen goods will be washed at the highest temperature recommended by the manufacturer.

It should be noted that on our property we will do everything possible to have our space free of infections, but we also ask our guests to be aware and responsible and follow the WHO recommendations.

You can use all the apartment and also the common areas such as both swimming pools one is located on the 35 floor and one on the first floor the one on the roof has a jacuzzi. You also have a parking spot for a car if needed, but I do not suggest renting a car because everything in Cartagena is so close and taxis are only about 2.50 cents for a local ride..

I’m always available by airbnb application, sms or phone call. Never hesitate if you need to reach me, always available..

name: Cartagena Bay
summary: On the 22th floor of a new building in front of Cartagena’s famous bay, you can enjoy amazing views and sunsets over the bay and city. In the safest neighborhood the apartment is equipped with fast wifi, powerful A/C everywhere, fully equipped kitchen, washer/dryer tower, iron/board, hot water, TV,  pool,  jacuzzi, private parking and more.
amenities: Elevator,Free parking on premises,Gym,Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Single level home,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
On the 22th floor of a new building in front of Cartagena’s famous bay, you can enjoy amazing views and sunsets over the bay and city. In the safest neighborhood the apartment is equipped with fast wifi, powerful A/C everywhere, fully equipped kitchen, washer/dryer tower, iron/board, hot water, TV,  pool,  jacuzzi, private parking and more.

The apartment can host up to 4 people. The master bedroom has two twin beds that can be made into a king or used separately. The living room is equipped with a comfortable queen size sofa bed.

The kitchen is fully equipped. You will find as a gift and totally free: GOURMET coffee capsules from the zona cafetera, the best in Colombia. We also offer you two small 187 ml bottles of spanish wine, origin CARIÑENA, that you can enjoy on the balcony upon arrival or at any time you choose.

The building features a pool and two jacuzzis with views on the bay and the city’s skyline. The pool has a wide low area for you to relax and take the sun while keeping yourself fresh. There is also a gym and sauna. 
The guests have access to a lobby and 1 private parking garage + 60 private parking spaces for guests.

Your host speaks english, french, some italian and spanish. I will be happy to provide guidance and tips to make your stay more enjoyable and easygoing. So please dont hesitate to contact me. Cartagena is a place you will keep in your heart.

The property is located in Bocagrande, a residential neighbourhood considered the safest in the city. Bocagrande is a peninsula, you will have the bay on one side and the beach on the other side, both within two and five minute walk.
Everything that you need will be within walking distance. You will find a supermarket 3 blocks away, restaurants all over, shops, cinemas, mall, pharmacies, clubs, tours, etc… 
If you have any questions feel free to contact me.
Along the bay there is el Malecón, a wide and comfortable esplanade to take a nice walk or jogging.
Juan Valdez is the equivalent in Colombia of Starbucks, and you have one with a nice terrace just around the corner to start the day.

The neighbourhood is very safe and you can enjoy it walking around. To go to the old city you can just stop a yellow taxi or use Uber. Is just a 5 minute ride and it shouldn’t cost you more than 3 dollars.

1. No visitors are allowed past the reception of the building.
2. Please check and respect the building rules manual, that you will find inside the apartment.

description:
Modern living meets an enchanted old City.  A newly constructed loft designed by Colombian architect Miguel Angel Cure, allows you the comfort of a modern space after enjoying the history within the walled city.  Located in El Centro just one block away from La Serrezuela, Plaza San Diego, Hotel Santa Clara. Where you can have a taste of Cartagenan Gastronomy while shopping for unique pieces made by Colombian designers.

The architecture allows you to feel an industrial lofty experience surrounded by elements like cement, wood, steel, and brick with a mix of tropical minimalistic detail. This space accommodates 4 with the option of a 5th person on a comfy couch. Enjoy high-quality linens and amenities, and daily housekeeping.

**Check out is at 12pm, and check-in is after 3pm. If no guests are coming in the same day check out and check-in can be flexible**

As in hotels, under rare circumstances, check-in might be a bit delayed. Please be aware of this.

Employee is for daily cleaning, and also a light breakfast can be arranged, (guests are responsible for food purchase) Lunch can be arranged for a small fee directly to the employee.

name: Red Palm House
summary: A charming 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom house in the heart of Getsemani, the bohemian part of Cartagena's Historic Center. The property is just a few steps from Plaza de la Trinidad, and a short walk from they city's coveted museums, restaurants, galleries and shops. The house includes a swimming pool, a large living room, dining area, kitchen and balcony overlooking picturesque, colonial streets. Housekeeping is included every other day (except Sundays & holidays), to ensure a stress-free stay.
amenities: Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Shampoo,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Hot water,Pack ’n Play/travel crib,Paid parking off premises,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Private entrance,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Patio or balcony,Fire extinguisher,Carbon monoxide alarm,Smoke alarm,First aid kit
description:
A charming 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom house in the heart of Getsemani, the bohemian part of Cartagena's Historic Center. The property is just a few steps from Plaza de la Trinidad, and a short walk from they city's coveted museums, restaurants, galleries and shops. The house includes a swimming pool, a large living room, dining area, kitchen and balcony overlooking picturesque, colonial streets. Housekeeping is included every other day (except Sundays & holidays), to ensure a stress-free stay.

As you walk through the private entrance, a large reception hall will open up to a small internal courtyard with a dining area and swimming pool with climbing vines. Once you stroll past the pool, on the left you will find two bedrooms, one bathroom and the kitchen. On the right of the reception hall, there is a staircase leading to the second floor landing, where the living room and additional bedrooms are located. The Master bedroom accommodates up to three guests, and boasts a full bathroom with a spacious independent shower. On the opposite side of the landing, a second bedroom with its own full bathroom lodges up to three guests. With its high ceilings, the living room is ideal for hosting visitors, who will undoubtedly be attracted to the balcony that runs the full length of the room offering views of the picturesque colonial streets below.

Guests have access to the entire house.

I am not always in Cartagena however it is possible that we might coincide, my family home is only a few blocks away.

Getsemani is a lively neighborhood, and the people that live there like to listen to music and can be seen in the streets playing dice games and partying. It is great fun to watch and they are all very friendly, however  it gets noisy, especially over the weekend. There is also a bar next door that plays live music until late almost every night of the week.

Just a few steps beyond the entrance of the house, you will find the Plaza de la Trinidad. And only a few blocks away, you will find my favorite pizza place, Trattoria Di Silvio. La Vitrola is a fantastic Cuban restaurant, which is a landmark in Cartagena. It boasts a spectacular live salsa band and signature mojitos. If you are feeling the music, continue on a short walk to the local salsa clubs Quiebra Canto and Cafe Havana.

When you hop in the taxi at the airport, please tell the driver to take you to "la esquina de la Calle del Pozo con el Callejón Ancho" (the corner of Calle del Pozo and Callejón Ancho) in Getsemaní. The best way to get around Getsemaní and the Old Town is by foot, otherwise I highly recommend hiring a horse drawn carriage for a tour of the beautiful colonial streets. When arriving from the airport, the local taxi service is a good option. They will be able to drop you off right in front of the house.

Housekeeping is included (every other day) in the rental price (except for Sundays and holidays). Sheets and towels are changed every other day, however if the that day falls on a Sunday (or holiday), they will be changed on the Monday (or following work day).

description:
marvellous penthouse apartment in Cartagena de Indias, Colombia
 
spend a dream holiday in one of the most romantic locations in the world. The ancient walled city of Cartagena de Indias with its wooden balconies covered in flowers takes you back in time to an era of pirates and noblemen. Crown your unforgettable journey by staying in this luxurious and unusual penthouse apartment
 
- 32nd floor with stunning views to the crystal waters of the Caribbean sea and all over the city,
- Loft style with 5 metre high windows overlooking the ocean,
- 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, huge livingroom with open kitchen,

- Cable Tv, fast WiFi internet
- private parking

- 600 metres to the walled city
on premises adult pool, childrens pool, Jaccuzi, sauna and turkish bath, gymnasium

name: Casa San Pedro - Exclusive 3BR Colonial Apartment in Centro Historico
summary:
Experience the ultimate luxury vacation in this stunning colonial loft apartment overlooking Plaza San Pedro, one of the most iconic churches in the heart of the old city. Every detail of this home has been hand-picked from travels around the world to reflect an eclectic, glamorous and multi-cultural atmosphere. The property features a 100 ft long colonial balcony facing calle san juan de dios and a private rooftop with breathtaking views of the city.

Designed for active family living, Casa San Pedro features a modern double-height open living room integrated with a fully equipped kitchen, with direct access to the colonial balcony and a comfortable hammock. The 3-story apartment has 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms located in the second level, and a terrace with 360 degree views of churches, Spanish-tile rooftops, mansions and the la popa convent, located in the third level. The property offers free WI-FI, Air Conditioning, Cable TV, and washer and dryer.

Casa San Pedro is the best located property in town, only meters away from the best restaurants, plazas, museums, and nightlife the city has to offer.
Room #1 - the master suite - is located on the second floor, has 1 queen size bed, an in-suite bathroom
Room # 2 is located on the second floor, has 1 queen size bed, and a bathroom shared with room # 3.
Room # 3 is located on the second floor, has 2 single beds, an additional bunk bed, and a bathroom shared with room # 2.

This beautiful property can host a maximum of 6 guests.

To make it a 5 star experience, Casa San Pedro offers daily housekeeping service and Huespedia's on-line professional concierge service line to help you with recommendations, restaurant reservations, boat rentals and assistance with other needs you might have during your visit.

Kindly note that do to Colombian Tourism Regulation all foreign visitors are required to provide a copy of their passports at the time of check-in.

Español
Experimente las mejores vacaciones de lujo en este increible apartamento loft colonial con vista a la Plaza San Pedro, una de las iglesias más emblemáticas en el corazón de la ciudad vieja. Cada detalle de este hogar ha sido cuidadosamente seleccionado en viajes alrededor del mundo para reflejar un ambiente ecléctico, glamoroso y multicultural. La propiedad cuenta con un balcón colonial de 10 metros de largo frente a la calle san juan de dios y una azotea privada con impresionantes vistas de la ciudad.

Diseñada para un estilo de vida familiar y activo, Casa San Pedro cuenta con una moderna sala de estar abierta de doble altura integrada con una cocina totalmente equipada, con acceso directo al gran balcón colonial con su cómoda hamaca y espectaculare vistas. 

El apartamento de 3 pisos tiene 3 dormitorios y 3 baños ubicados en el segundo nivel, y una terraza en el tercer nivel con vistas de 360 ​​grados de iglesias, tejados de teja española, y mansiones del centro historico. La propiedad ofrece WI-FI gratis, aire acondicionado, televisión por cable, y lavadora y secadora. No hay una propiedad en Cartagena mejor ubicada que Casa San Pedro, tan solo a metros de los mejores restaurantes, plazas, museos y vida nocturna que la ciudad tiene para ofrecer. 

Habitacion #1 - Suite Principal - se encuentra en el segundo piso, tiene una cama queen y un baño interno. 
Habitacion #2 está ubicada en el segundo piso, tiene una cama queen y un baño compartido con la habitación # 3. 
Habitacion #3 está ubicada en el segundo piso, tiene 2 camas snecillas, una cama camarote adicional, y un baño compartido con la habitación # 2. 

Esta hermosa propiedad puede alojar un máximo de 6 personas. 

Para garantizar una experiencia de cinco estrellas, Casa San Pedro ofrece servicio de limpieza diario y el servicio de conserjería profesional en línea de Huespedia para ayudarlo con recomendaciones, reservas de restaurantes, alquiler de botes y asistencia con otras necesidades que pueda tener durante su visita. 

Tenga en cuenta que, de acuerdo con el Reglamento de Turismo de Colombia, todos los visitantes extranjeros deben proporcionar una copia de sus pasaportes en el momento del check-in.

Centro Historico

description:
Large Duplex apartment, bright, comfortable located on Avenida Santander which runs along  Cartagena beach front. Conveniently situated 5 minutes from Cartagena Airport and a 10 minutes taxi ride from the Centro Historico de Cartagena de Indias. This apartment has great sea views with spectacular sunsets from the large full length balconies.

250 sq meters Duplex apartment. An open, bright, clean living space. It includes:
- 2 relaxing sofas and a TV area. 
- A big balcony which runs along the entire length of the apartment, giving a real sense of space and light. It is equipped with a great barbecue, dining table, sofas and a chilling hammock area.
- Large fitted kitchen, well equipped with a dining table for 8 guests. 
- On the floor below, the master bedroom offers a super King Bed, a balcony with hammock, superbe sea views, a large en-suite bathroom, cable TV, A/C and plenty of storage space.
- Bedroom 2 offers 2 single twin beds which can be joined together as a double bed. A/C, and en-suite bathroom.
- Bedroom 3 offers 2 single twin beds with breathtaking views of the beach below, A/C. 
- There is also Free Private parking.

The Apartment is located in the 11nd floor of the San Sebastián Terrazas. The building has the following facilities: 
Pool, Gym, 24 hour doorman, Reception room.

The entire apartment is private, it is not shared with anyone but you and your group.
The main area like Gym, Jacuzzi and Swimming pool are shared with the resident and guests of the 3 buildings.

I believe this is important to introduce Cartagena to my new guests, so I will always be happy to offer recommendations for restaurants and fun things to do in town and the islands nearby.

The neighbourhood of Marbella is safe (with common sense used in any big city). It runs along the Avenida Santander, the beautiful front beach Avenida leading to the Centro Historico de Cartagena. Taxis are cheap and always passing by, which makes the access to the Centro Histórico very quick and convenient.

You can catch easily taxis from the main Avenue Santander, Just in front of the apartment building, They are plenty passing by. It will cost you only 2.2 USD to any parts of the Centro Histórico or Bocagrande. 8000 cop per Taxi to the center.

Dear travelers, 
We want to inform you that on our property we are aware of how important cleaning and disinfection of our space is to you, and that’s why we join Airbnb's advanced cleaning program. We are committed to it and we are going to follow the steps recommended by the CDC's advanced cleaning program. To try to comply it in the best way, these are some of the cleaning procedures that we will have in all our properties: 

1.	Our entire work team will have the protective equipment while cleaning (personal items such as disposable gloves, aprons or gowns and face masks)
2.	All of our staff will be trained on measures to prevent the spread of germs. 
3.	Use of the appropriate disinfectant. (cleaning solutions with diluted household chlorine or at least 70% alcohol)
4.	All our linen goods will be washed at the highest temperature recommended by the manufacturer.

For more information on Airbnb's advanced cleaning program you can enter through this link (https://www.airbnb.com.co/resources/hosting-homes/a/cleaning-guidelines-to-help-prevent-the-spread-of-covid-19-163). In this site you can find the checklist on which we will base our work plan. It should be noted that on our property we will do everything possible to have our space free of infections, but we also ask our guests to be aware and responsible and follow the WHO recommendations.

The entire house is for you, 7 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, living room, Private Pool, kitchen.

description:

It is located half a block from the Santa Clara Hotel (Plaza San Diego), which is famous for its vibrant night scene and its many well-known restaurants. The house holds an open living room, open kitchen,dinning area, and splash pool.The second floor holds 2 en suite bedrooms. The third floor has the third en suite bedroom, a jacuzzi with lounging area as well as a bbq area.

You will be able to enjoy a pool located on the first floor as well as 360 views of the old town from its rooftop terrace jacuzzi. Inside, you will find a fully equipped kitchen with dining table and two common areas (living room and rooftop terrace).

All areas of the house are open for guests staying at the House.

We are available 24/7.

Cartagena's old-town is recognised for it beautiful architecture, top of the line hotels and amazing gastronomy. You will find all that Cartagena has to offer, at walking distance from Casa Allegra.

Casa Allegra is close to public transportation, city tours, shops, restaurants, docks and piers (in case you are interested in outside the city tours). Also, casa Allegra is 15 minutes (car ride) from the airport.

We do not accept wild, loud over the top parties at the house. There are many residential houses around and we will not tolerate any use of drugs or any kind of misbehavior that can’t put in danger not only your friends/families or can cause damages to the furniture, appliances, pool, jacuzzi, or any other areas of the house. 

Cartagena is unfortunately a city where there is a lot of sex tourism happening within many of the houses that are for rent so therefore we are completely against it and have a cero tolerance policy for sex tourism. 

You may have other guests that are not staying as guest at the house however they are not allowed to stay overnight, unless you communicate this to us and pay the extra fee per person ( keep in mind there is maximum capacity of 8 people that can stay overnight).

additional_house_rules:
Please reserve the smoking for the master bedroom balcony and the rooftop terrace. Also, We would like to highlight that the house has three floors and therefore lots of stairs. This means that young children should be looked after when it comes to using the stairs. Also, for children's safety, the first floor pool is deep and we suggest you take caution when using it. Please note that the room to room balconies located on the second floor should be kept closed and locked, also for children safety.

In addition, guests will be fully responsible for the set of keys provided. Failure to return full set of keys handed at check in will have an extra charge of $50 USD per set of keys.

Sex tourism is not allowed at Casa Allegra. Outsiders from the group of guests staying at the house are not allowed in. This is in order for us to ensure guest safety. 

The rental fee of the house includes the cleaning and laundry service, however the Cooking service has an extra fee of: Breakfast $50.000 COP ( Aprox: $ 20.00 USD) per group; Lunch $50.000 COP ( Aprox: $20.00 USD) per group; if you would like a personal professional chef to cook Dinner is $150.000  COP per group. These prices do not include paying for groceries.

Karina the house keeper has working hours between 8:00 am until 4:00 pm, however feel free to cancel Karina for the day or let us know if you would like her to come at a different hour, and if you need her to stay after 4:00 pm there's and extra charge of $10.00 USD per hour.

name: La Domínica, Hip Old Town Villa w/Rooftop Pool
summary: Have the best trip staying in this XVIII century old townhouse, recently restored and designed with a smooth blend of classic and modern elements. Located downtown at the iconic convergence of Getsemaní and San Diego, La Dominica is perfectly situated to experience the best of Cartagena's cultural, nightlife and music scene. Dip in the rooftop pool, relax and enjoy the sunset with a breathtaking view of the Old City.
amenities: Hair dryer,Wifi,Kitchen,Dedicated workspace,Cable TV,Iron,Dryer,Hangers,Pool,TV,Washer,Air conditioning,Essentials,Crib,Paid parking off premises,Paid parking on premises,Coffee maker,Cooking basics,Dishes and silverware,Dishwasher,Microwave,Oven,Refrigerator,Stove,Building staff,Luggage dropoff allowed,Long term stays allowed,Bed linens,Extra pillows and blankets,Patio or balcony,Garden or backyard,Fire extinguisher,First aid kit
description:
Have the best trip staying in this XVIII century old townhouse, recently restored and designed with a smooth blend of classic and modern elements. Located downtown at the iconic convergence of Getsemaní and San Diego, La Dominica is perfectly situated to experience the best of Cartagena's cultural, nightlife and music scene. Dip in the rooftop pool, relax and enjoy the sunset with a breathtaking view of the Old City.

ALSO, FEEL FREE TO CHECK OUT OUR SISTER PROPERTY:  *CASA MAYOR*

La Dominica is perfect for group trips. It has three floors, nine bed rooms, all with air conditioner and private bathrooms. The rooftop lounge has a very nice pool and beautiful sights of Cartagena, there are 2 living rooms, a fully equipped kitchen and a dinning patio.
Architectural details mimic the energy of the city’s historic past, while vibrant designs embody Cartagena's modern spirit.

The Villa has 2 living rooms, a dinning patio & rooftop terrace w/pool. The whole house is for you to enjoy.

For no additional cost, La Dominica includes a Buttler to spoil you and a housekeeper, whom upon request can buy groceries and cook. The house Manager is Sergio Torres, he'll be more than happy to help you out with any tips and information you might need.

- the once seedy neighborhood of Getsemaní has come into its own. A flurry of drinking dens, salsa clubs, tapas bars and boutique hotels are being carved out of the faded 18th-century buildings in this district, which extends from the city walls to the San Felipe de Barajas Fort-

New York Times

- Getsemaní has recently blossomed into a nightlife and restaurant hot spot to which in-the-know travelers are flocking-

Condé Nast Traveler

La Domínica is located within walking distance of all major museums, plazas, bars, restaurants and nightclubs. If you're willing to use public transportation, there's a Transcaribe station one block away.

If you want to hail a cab keep in mind to haggle before starting the ride, these are recommended tariffs:

- Taxi fare from the Airport $4.5 usd
- Taxi fare from Boquilla Beach $6 usd
- Taxi fare from Boca Grande $6 usd

*Please keep in mind you can use Uber or Indriver here in Cartagena, I strongly recommend it since the service is great and it's relatively cheap.

Additional:
- We offer boat rentals to Islas del Rosario
- Full stock of food if desired, you can pay upon arrival
- Airport transfer for a fee
- All bedrooms have safe box
- No hot water in the house

The accommodation of the rooms is as follows:

“SIETE INFANTES” Room: 
- 1 King bed
- 1 Single bed. 
Capacity 3 people. It has private bathroom, cable TV, air conditioning, Alarm Clock FM Radio Plus USB Port to Charge Any USB Device,  high end linens, Towels and bathroom amenities are provided.

- 1 Queen Bed
- 1 Single bed.

-1 Double bed
-1 Single bed.

-	2 living rooms

-	Dining Room
-	Social Bathroom

Third Floor:
It includes,
-	2 Rooms (“La Mantilla” and “Siete Infantes” Room)
-	Small Terrace

Fourth Floor:
It is a big terrace that includes the following:
-	Jacuzzi 
-	Dining room 
-	Sun tanning chairs
-	Social Bathroom with separated shower 

CASA AZZURRA offers 3 additional services (with cost):

-	Pick - up Service from and to the airport.
